en: In February, Hassans administration lifted bans on four media outlets: Mseto, Mawio, Mwanahalisi and Tanzania Daima.

xho: I-daffaires ye-Embassy yase-US e-South Sudan, itshilo kwingxelo ngoLwesibini, yongeza ukuba i-US ihlala ixhalabile kakhulu ngenkululeko yeendaba eSouth Sudan.
mt0: <pad> embassy in South Sudan, said in a statement Tuesday, adding that the U.S. remains deeply concerned about the state of press freedom in South Sudan.</s>

en: We have seen some of the local radio stations shut down over very trivial matters, Renz said. "And we also are aware that journalists of radio and television and even social media are self-censored" and wary of local and national governments actions "to penalize journalists who say things the government would prefer that they not say."
xho: “Sizibonile ezinye izikhululo zikanomathotholo zalapha ekhaya zivaliwe ngenxa yezinto ezingenamsebenzi,” utshilo uRenz. "Kwaye siyayazi ukuba iintatheli zikanomathotholo kunye nomabonwakude kunye nemithombo yeendaba zentlalo ziyazivavanya" kwaye zilumkele izenzo zoorhulumente basekhaya kunye nesizwe "zokohlwaya iintatheli ezithetha izinto urhulumente anokukhetha ukuba zingazithethi."
mt0: <pad> "Sibonile ukuba iindawo zokusebenza kweradio ziyafungwa ngenxa yeziganeko ezilula, kwaye sisaziqonda ukuba ababhali bendaba kwirediyo nakwi-intanethi bacinga ukuba umthetho kufuneka uthethe izinto ezingafunekiyo."</s>

en: Further complications from coup
xho: Ezinye iingxaki ezivela kubhukuqo-mbuso
mt0: <pad> Iindawo ezixhalabisayo ezingaphezulu evela kwi-complications.</s>

en: In Sudan, journalists in the capital city of Khartoum say harassment and threats have increased since the October 25 military takeover.
xho: ESudan, iintatheli kwikomkhulu laseKhartoum zithi ukuxhatshazwa kunye nezoyikiso zonyukile ukusukela oko kuthabathe umkhosi nge-25 ka-Okthobha.
mt0: <pad> In Sudan, journalists in the capital city of Khartoum say harassment and threats have increased since the October 25 military takeover.</s>

en: Shoggi Abdulazeem, an investigative journalist in Sudan, said he received a death threat in November and was warned not to speak to international media.
xho: UShoggi Abdulazeem, intatheli ephandayo eSudan, uthe wafumana isoyikiso sokufa ngoNovemba kwaye walumkiswa ukuba angathethi namajelo eendaba ehlabathi.
mt0: <pad> Shoggi Abdulazeem, i-journalist eSudan, uthe wafumana i-threats of death in November and was warned not to speak to international media.</s>

en: I was hosting live on Al Jazeera and after leaving their office, eight armed security men followed me in a pickup.
xho: “Bendisindleke bukhoma eAl Jazeera kwaye emva kokushiya iofisi yabo, amadoda asibhozo axhobileyo andilandela ngemoto.
mt0: <pad> Ndibe ndinikela live kwi Al Jazeera kwaye emva kokuba ndiphume kwiofisi yabo, abantu abantandathu abakhuseleko bamlandela ngemoto.</s>

en: They surrounded my car," Abdulazeem said.
xho: “Bayirhangqa imoto yam,” utshilo u-Abdulazeem.
mt0: <pad> They surrounded my car," Abdulazeem said.</s>

en: He told South Sudan in Focus he was blindfolded and moved around "for more than two hours" and was ordered "not to criticize the military again."
xho: Uxelele iSouth Sudan kuFocus ukuba wayevalwe amehlo kwaye ejikeleziswa "isithuba esingaphezu kweeyure ezimbini" kwaye wayalelwa ukuba "angaphinde agxeke umkhosi."
mt0: <pad> Uthe eSouth Sudan in Focus ukuba wabekwa "ngomehlweni" kwaye wahamba "ngaphezu kweeyure ezimbini" kwaye wathi akamele athethe ngayo i-arhente yakho.</s>

en: Covering pro-democracy protests in Sudan continues to be a dangerous endeavor, Abdulazeem said.
xho: Ukugubungela uqhanqalazo lwe-pro-demokhrasi eSudan isengumzamo onobungozi, utshilo u-Abdulazeem.
mt0: <pad> Covering pro-democracy protests in Sudan continues to be a dangerous endeavor, Abdulazeem said.</s>

en: Many newspapers, TV channels and radio stations received directives not to host or conduct interviews with some named individuals who criticize military leaders, Abdulazeem said.
xho: Amaphephandaba amaninzi, izitishi zikamabona kude kunye nezikhululo zikanomathotholo zifumene imiyalelo yokuba mazingabamba okanye aqhube udliwano-ndlebe nabantu abathile abagxeka iinkokeli zomkhosi, utshilo u-Abdulazeem.
mt0: <pad> Newspaper, TV channels and radio stations received directives not to host or conduct interviews with some named individuals who criticize military leaders, Abdulazeem said.</s>

en: He added, "There are intelligence officers who are assigned to monitor this situation."
xho: Wongeze ngelithi, “Kukho amagosa ezobuntlola abelwe ukubeka esweni le meko.
mt0: <pad> Uthe, "Kukho abakhokeli be-intelligence abaqeshwe ukuba bajongene nesimo esinjalo."</s>

en: Aisha Assamani, an executive member of the independent Sudanese Media Network, told South Sudan in Focus he has recorded more than 10 attacks on journalists and media houses since last year's coup.
xho: U-Aisha Assamani, ilungu elilawulayo le-Sudan Media Network ezimeleyo, uxelele i-South Sudan ku-Focus ukuba urekhode ngaphezu kwe-10 uhlaselo kwiintatheli kunye nezindlu zeendaba ukusukela kubhukuqo lonyaka ophelileyo.
mt0: <pad> Aisha Assamani, executive member of the independent Sudanese Media Network, told South Sudan in Focus he has recorded more than 10 attacks on journalists and media houses since last year's coup.</s>

en: "They are targeting freedom of speech with so much excessive force, Assamani said.
xho: “Bajonge inkululeko yokuthetha ngamandla agqithisileyo,” utshilo u-Assamani.
mt0: <pad> "Bahlasela ukukhululeka kokuthetha ngamandla amakhulu kakhulu, utsho Assamani.</s>

en: "The majority of our journalists now are fearful and their lives are in danger.
xho: “Uninzi lweentatheli zethu ngoku ziyoyika kwaye ubomi bazo busesichengeni.
mt0: <pad> "Uninzi lwethu iintatheli ziyaboyika kwaye ubomi babo bube sengozini.</s>

en: Most of them remain anonymous due to the danger of the situation."
xho: Uninzi lwabo luhlala lungaziwa ngenxa yobungozi bale meko. "
mt0: <pad> Most of them remain anonymous due to the danger of the situation.</s>

en: On December 30, Sudanese security forces stormed the offices of three television stations — al-Arabiya, al-Hadath and al-Sharq — firing tear gas, assaulting staff and destroying broadcast equipment, according to local news media.
xho: Nge-30 kaDisemba, imikhosi yezokhuseleko yaseSudan yangena kwii-ofisi zezikhululo ezintathu zikamabonwakude - i-al-Arabiya, i-al-Hadath kunye ne-al-Sharq - iqhumisa igesi yeenyembezi, ibetha abasebenzi kwaye itshabalalisa izixhobo zokusasaza, ngokutsho kweendaba zasekuhlaleni.
mt0: <pad> On December 30, Sudan security forces stormed the offices of three television stations — al-Arabiya, al-Hadath and al-Sharq — firing tear gas, assaulting staff and destroying broadcast equipment, according to local news media.</s>

en: That same day, security forces detained al-Sharq correspondents Maha Al-Talb and Sally
xho: Kwangolo suku lunye, imikhosi yezokhuseleko yavalela umnxibelelanisi we-al-Sharq uMaha Al-Talb noSally Othman iiyure phambi kokubakhulula.
mt0: <pad> Kwimini eyodwa, amagosa ezokhuseleko amangalelwe ababhalisi be-al-Sharq Maha Al-Talb and Sally.</s>

en: Othman for hours before releasing them.
xho: Nge-16 kaJanuwari, abasemagunyeni baseSudan barhoxisa ilayisenisi yosasazo yeAl Jazeera Live kwaye bavala iofisi yabo eKhartoum.
mt0: <pad> Ii-Othman zange zifumaneke kwindawo yokuhlala iiyure ngaphambi kokukhululwa.</s>

en: On January 16, Sudanese authorities withdrew the broadcast license of Al Jazeera Live and closed its office in Khartoum.
xho: Ileta evela kwi-Information Ministry eya kumlawuli we-TV ye-Al Jazeera e-Sudan iyalela unobangela wokuvala "okukusebenza ngendlela engafanelekanga" kunye nomxholo weendaba "owonakalisa umdla aphezulu welizwe kunye nokhuseleko lwelizwe."
mt0: <pad> NgoJanuwari 16, amagosa eSudan ayithatheli ilungelo lokusasaza i-Al Jazeera Live kwaye avala iofisi yayo eKhartoum.</s>

en: A letter from the Information Ministry to the director of Al Jazeera television in Sudan attributed the closing to an "unprofessional approach" and media content that "harmed the countrys higher interests and national security." The Doha-based network condemned the closure.
xho: Inethiwekhi esekwe eDoha ikugxekile okukuvalwa.
mt0: <pad> A ileta elivela kwi-Ministry of Information to the director of Al Jazeera television in Sudan lithetha ngokuvala ngenxa yendlela engaprofessional kunye neenkcazelo zeendaba ezichaphazela "iinjongo eziphezulu zezwekazi kunye nokhuseleko lwelizwe."</s>

en: In February, Sudanese authorities arrested a group of BBC reporters in Khartoum and questioned them for several hours before releasing them.
xho: NgoFebruwari, abasemagunyeni baseSudan babamba iqela leentatheli ze-BBC eKhartoum kwaye bababuza imibuzo iiyure ezininzi ngaphambi kokuba babakhulule.
mt0: <pad> Kwinyanga yeFebruwari, amagosa eSudan abamba iqela leBBC eKhartoum kwaye ababuza iiyure ezininzi ngaphambi kokubakhulula.</s>

en: VOA repeatedly called Sudans government for comment, but those calls — to Brigadier General Attahir Abu Haja, press advisor to military leader Abdul Fattah al-Burhan — went unanswered.
xho: I-VOA yabiza ngokuphindaphindiweyo urhulumente waseSudan ukuba anike izimvo, kodwa ezo fowuni - kuBrigadier General Attahir Abu Haja, umcebisi weendaba kwinkokeli yezempi u-Abdul Fattah al-Burhan - akazange aphendule.
mt0: <pad> VOA i-called Sudan's government several times for comment, but those calls — to Brigadier General Attahir Abu Haja, press advisor to military leader Abdul Fattah al-Burhan — went unanswered.</s>

en: Michael Atit reported from Khartoum, Sudan; Deng Ghai Deng and Manyang David Mayar reported from Juba, South Sudan.
xho: UMichael Atit unike ingxelo evela eKhartoum, eSudan; UDeng Ghai Deng kunye noManyang David Mayar babike bevela eJuba, eSouth Sudan.
mt0: <pad> Michael Atit reported from Khartoum, Sudan; Deng Ghai Deng and Manyang David Mayar reported from Juba, South Sudan.</s>

en: At Least 30 Burundian AU Soldiers Killed in Al-Shabab Attack, Official Says
xho: Ubuncinci ngama-30 amajoni e-AU aseBurundi abulawa kuhlaselo lwe-Al-Shabab, igosa litsho.
mt0: <pad> At Least 30 Burundian AU Soldiers Killed in Al-Shabab Attack, Official Says</s>

en: At least 30 Burundian soldiers were killed and 20 others injured in Tuesday's attack by al-Shabab militants on an African Union base in southern Somalia, according to a Burundian official.
xho: Ubuncinci amajoni angama-30 aseBurundi abulewe kwaye amanye angama-20 onzakele kuhlaselo lwangoLwesibini lwamajoni e-al-Shabab kwiziko le-African Union kumazantsi eSomalia, ngokutsho kwegosa laseBurundi.
mt0: <pad> 30 Burundian soldiers were killed and 20 others injured in Tuesday's attack by al-Shabab militants on an African Union base in southern Somalia, according to a Burundian official.</s>

en: The official, who requested anonymity because he is not allowed to speak to media, told VOA Somali that 10 soldiers died on the spot, and the rest of the soldiers succumbed to their wounds.
xho: Eli gosa, nelicele ukungachazwa igama lalo kuba lingavumelekanga ukuba lithethe noonondaba, lixelele iVOA Somali ukuba amajoni alishumi abhubhele apho, kwaye amanye abhubhela kumanxeba awo.
mt0: <pad> Umntu osebenza eSomalia, owacela ukuba angazibonakalisi, utshilo i-VOA Somali ukuba 10 amajoni afe apho, kwaye abanye abajoni bafa ngenxa yeentlungu zabo.</s>

en: He confirmed that other soldiers are still missing.
xho: Uye waqinisekisa ukuba amanye amajoni awakafumaneki.
mt0: <pad> Uqinisekisile ukuba kukho abanye abajoni abapheleleyo.</s>

en: Al-Shabab said it killed 173 soldiers in the attack on the AU base in the village of El-Baraf, about 150 kilometers north of Mogadishu.
xho: I-Al-Shabab ithi ibulale amajoni alikhulu elinamashumi asixhenxe anesithathu kuhlaselo lwesiseko se-AU kwilali yase-El-Baraf, malunga neekhilomitha ezili-150 kumntla weMogadishu.
mt0: <pad> Al-Shabab says it killed 173 soldiers in the attack on the AU base in the village of El-Baraf, about 150 kilometers north of Mogadishu.</s>

en: The casualty figure has not been independently verified.
xho: Inani elenzakeleyo alikaqinisekiswa ngokuzimeleyo.
mt0: <pad> I-casualty figure has not been independently verified.</s>

en: A separate source told VOA Somali that 161 soldiers were at the camp at the time of attack.
xho: Umthombo owahlukileyo uxelele iVOA Somali ukuba amajoni alikhulu elinamashumi amathandathu ananye ayesenkampini ngexesha lokuhlaselwa.
mt0: <pad> A source separately told VOA Somali that 161 soldiers were at the camp at the time of the attack.</s>

en: The Burundian official confirmed that number.
xho: Igosa laseBurundi liqinisekise elo nani.
mt0: <pad> Burundian official confirmed that number.</s>

en: The Burundian official told VOA Somali that the soldiers had intelligence al-Shabab was gathering in a nearby village about 48 hours prior to the attack.
xho: Igosa laseBurundi lixelele iVOA Somali ukuba amajoni anobuntlola be-al-Shabab bebehlanganisene kwilali ekufutshane malunga neeyure ezingama-48 phambi kohlaselo.
mt0: <pad> The Burundian official told VOA Somali that the soldiers had information al-Shabab was gathering in a nearby village about 48 hours prior to the attack.</s>

en: He said the soldiers prepared to defend themselves and dug trenches.
xho: Uthe amajoni azilungiselela ukuzikhusela omba imisele.
mt0: <pad> Uthe abakhonzi balungiselele ukuzikhusela kwaye bakhomba amadonga.</s>

en: He said what caught the soldiers by surprise was the enormity of al-Shabab explosives detonated at the camp. He said the militants used three truck bombs, one of which fell into a ditch.
xho: Uthe eyona nto yamangalisekayo amajoni bubuninzi beziqhushumbisi ze-al-Shabab eziqhunyiswe enkampini. Uthi aba bavukeli basebenzise iibhombu ezintathu zelori, enye yazo yawela emhadini.
mt0: <pad> Uthe eyona nto yamangalisa amajoni kukubaninzi kwe-al-Shabab explosives ezihlaselwa kwikampu.</s>

en: He estimated the militants detonated about 20 kilograms of explosives, and that 450 militants overran the camp.
xho: Uqikelele ukuba amajoni aqhushumba malunga neekhilogram ezingama-20 zeziqhushumbisi, kwaye amajoni angama-450 abhukuqa inkampu.
mt0: <pad> Ulinganise ukuba abaphembeleli basebenzise iikhilogram ezingama-20 ze-explosives, kwaye abanye abanekhulu abaphembeleli bahlasele ikampu.</s>

en: The official said the suicide truck bombs caused most of the casualties.
xho: Eli gosa lathi ezi lori eziziqhushumbisi zibangele uninzi lwamaxhoba.
mt0: <pad> A officials said the suicide truck bombs caused most of the casualties.</s>

en: Earlier, the government of Burundi reported 10 of their soldiers were killed, with five others missing and 25 injured.
xho: Kwangoko, urhulumente waseBurundi uxele ukuba i-10 yamajoni abo abulewe, abanye abahlanu belahlekile kwaye abangama-25 bonzakala.
mt0: <pad> Ngaphambi koko, urhulumente waseBurundi wabhala ukuba 10 abakhonzi babo babulawa, abanye abathandathu bangena kwaye 25 banokwenzakala.</s>

en: Burundi also said 20 al-Shabab militants were killed in the attack.
xho: IBurundi ikwathe kwabulawa amajoni angama-20 e-al-Shabab kolu hlaselo.
mt0: <pad> Burundi also said 20 al-Shabab militants were killed in the attack.</s>

en: On Twitter, Burundi President Evariste Ndayishimiye said there are no words strong enough to condemn the terrorist attack against the Burundian contingent.
xho: Kwi-Twitter, uMongameli waseBurundi u-Evariste Ndayishimiye uthe akukho mazwi anamandla ngokwaneleyo okugxeka uhlaselo lwabanqolobi ngokuchasene neqela laseBurundi.
mt0: <pad> On Twitter, Burundi President Evariste Ndayishimiye said there are no words strong enough to condemn the terrorist attack against the Burundian contingent.</s>

en: He wrote, "I join with all of Africa which has just lost sons and daughters … to console the hard-hit families."
xho: Ubhale wathi, "Ndijoyina yonke iAfrika esandul' ukuphulukana noonyana neentombi ... ukuthuthuzela iintsapho ezibethakeleyo."
mt0: <pad> Ubhala, "Ndibana nalo lonke iAfrika ethe yaphelelwa ngabantwana bakhe kunye neentombi... ukuthuthuzela amakhaya achaphazelekayo.</s>

en: The African Union, the Somali government and the embassy of the United States in Mogadishu have all strongly condemned the al-Shabab attack.
xho: IManyano yeAfrika, urhulumente waseSomalia kunye nonozakuzaku waseMelika eMogadishu bonke balugxeke kabukhali uhlaselo lwe-al-Shabab.
mt0: <pad> The African Union, the Somali government and the United States embassy in Mogadishu have all strongly condemned the al-Shabab attack.</s>

en: AU chief Moussa Faki Mahamat paid tribute to the Burundian soldiers killed, and said the "heinous" attack will not lessen support of AU forces to Somalia.
xho: Inkosi ye-AU uMoussa Faki Mahamat unike imbeko kumajoni aseBurundi abuleweyo, kwaye wathi olu hlaselo “loyikekayo” aluzukuyithoba inkxaso yemikhosi ye-AU eSomalia.
mt0: <pad> AU chief Moussa Faki Mahamat paid tribute to the Burundian soldiers killed, and said the "heinous" attack will not lessen support for AU forces in Somalia.</s>

en: The Somali ministry of foreign affairs called on the international community to increase and provide higher-end capability to Somali security forces and AU forces so they can effectively combat terrorism in Somalia.
xho: Umphathiswa wemicimbi yangaphandle yaseSomalia uhlabe ikhwelo kuluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe ukuba lwandise kwaye lubonelele ngesakhono esiphezulu kwimikhosi yokhuseleko yaseSomalia kunye nemikhosi ye-AU ukuze bakwazi ukulwa ngokufanelekileyo nobunqolobi eSomalia.
mt0: <pad> The Somali ministry of foreign affairs has urged the international community to increase and provide higher-end capability to the security forces of Somalia and AU forces so that they can effectively combat terrorism in Somalia.</s>

en: The U.S. embassy in Mogadishu said the U.S. extends condolences to the families of the troops killed and wished a quick recovery to those injured.
xho: Uzakuzo lwase-US eMogadishu lithe i-US idlulisa amazwi ovelwano kwiintsapho zamajoni abuleweyo kwaye inqwenela ukuchacha ngokukhawuleza kwabo bonzakeleyo.
mt0: <pad> U.S. embassy in Mogadishu said the U.S. extends condolences to the families of the troops killed and wished a quick recovery to those injured.</s>

en: The Mayor of El-Baraf, Abdullahi Haji Muhumed, told VOA that Tuesday's fighting at the camp was the heaviest the area has seen.
xho: USodolophu wase-El-Baraf, u-Abdullahi Haji Muhumed, uxelele iVOA ukuba umlo wangoLwesibini enkampini ngowona unzima akhe wabonwa.
mt0: <pad> Umongameli we-El-Baraf, uAbdullahi Haji Muhumed, uxelele i-VOA ukuba uqhankqalazo lwesiibini kwikampu ye-IDPs lulona lwangena kumandla ophezulu esiye nawo.</s>

en: Fighting like this never happened in this area, he said, explaining that the violence also killed two civilians and injured 10 others.
xho: “Umlo onje awuzange wenzeke kule ndawo,” utshilo, ecacisa ukuba olu dushe lukwabulele abantu ababini lonzakalisa abanye abalishumi.
mt0: <pad> Ubundlobongela obufana noko zange bubekho kule ndawo, watsho.</s>

en: It was heavy fighting.
xho: Ibingumlo onzima.
mt0: <pad> Kukho uqhankqalazo olukhulu.</s>

en: The incident marked the first major al-Shabab attack on AU forces since the mission changed its name and operational structures last month.
xho: Esi sehlo siphawule uhlaselo lokuqala olukhulu lwe-al-Shabab kumkhosi we-AU ukusukela oko eli phulo litshintshe igama kunye nezakhiwo zalo kwinyanga ephelileyo.
mt0: <pad> Incident marked the first major al-Shabab attack on AU forces since the mission changed its name and operational structures last month.</s>

en: The U.N. Security Council, which authorized the new mission called the African Union Transition Mission in Somalia, gave it a mandate to reduce the threat posed by al-Shabab, support the capacity building of Somali security forces, and conduct a phased handover of security responsibilities to the Somali government.
xho: IBhunga lezoKhuseleko le-UN, eligunyazise i-mission entsha ebizwa ngokuba yi-African Union Transition Mission eSomalia, linike igunya lokunciphisa isoyikiso esibangelwa yi-al-Shabab, ukuxhasa ukuxhotyiswa kwemikhosi yokhuseleko yaseSomalia, kunye nokunikezela ngezigaba uxanduva lokhuseleko. kurhulumente waseSomalia.
mt0: <pad> U.N. Security Council, which authorized the new mission called the African Union Transition Mission in Somalia, gave it a mandate to reduce the threat posed by al-Shabab, support the capacity building of Somali security forces, and conduct a phased handover of security responsibilities to the Somali government.</s>

en: The mission's mandate runs through the end of 2024.
xho: Umyalelo wemishini uqhuba ukuya ekupheleni kuka-2024.
mt0: <pad> I-Mission's mandate runs through the end of 2024.</s>

en: This story comes from VOA's Somali and Central African services.
xho: Eli bali liphuma kwiinkonzo zeVOA zaseSomalia nakuMbindi Afrika.
mt0: <pad> Ibali liza kuvela kwi-VOA's Somali and Central African services.</s>

en: South Africa Urges Africa’s First COVID-19 Vaccine Plant to Keep Its Doors Open
xho: UMzantsi Afrika Ubongoza iZiko lokuqala lase-Afrika lokugonya i-COVID-19 ukuba ligcine iingcango zaso zivulekile
mt0: <pad> South Africa Urges Africa's First COVID-19 Vaccine Plant to Keep Its Doors Open</s>

en: South African health officials are urging COVID-19 vaccine manufacturer Aspen to keep its plant in the Eastern Cape province open.
xho: Amagosa ezempilo eMzantsi Afrika abongoza umenzi wesitofu sokugonya i-COVID-19 i-Aspen ukuba igcine isityalo sayo sivulekile kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni.
mt0: <pad> South African officials are urging Aspen, the manufacturer of the COVID-19 vaccine, to keep its plant in the Eastern Cape province open.</s>

en: This follows a Reuters article quoting Aspens senior director saying they may have to shut down as there have been no orders for their rebranded COVID vaccine.
xho: Oku kulandela inqaku leReuters licaphula umlawuli omkhulu wakwa-Aspens esithi kungafuneka bavale njengoko kungakhange kubekho zi-odolo zesitofu sabo sogonyo se-COVID.
mt0: <pad> Ixesha ethethwa ngayo i-Reuters ithi i-Aspens inokuba kufuneka ivale njengoko akukho mveliso ithengise i-COVID-19 vaccine yabo.</s>

en: A South African-owned subsidiary of pharmaceutical giant Aspen struck a deal with American company Johnson & Johnson in March to package, price, sell and distribute its vaccine in Africa.
xho: Inkampani yaseMzantsi Afrika ephantsi kwenkampani enkulu samayeza i-Aspen yenze isivumelwano nenkampani yaseMelika iJohnson & Johnson ngoMatshi yokupakisha, ixabiso, ukuthengisa kunye nokusasaza isitofu sayo sokugonya e-Afrika.
mt0: <pad> A South African-owned subsidiary of the pharmaceutical giant Aspen struck a deal with American company Johnson & Johnson in March to package, price, sell and distribute its vaccine in Africa.</s>

en: This vaccine was rebranded as Aspenovax.
xho: Esi sitofu sathiywa ngokutsha njenge-Aspenovax.
mt0: <pad> I-vaccine ifumaneke njenge Aspenovax.</s>

en: The move was hailed by many as there had been much concern about Africas reliance on imported vaccines which were often costly and at times in short supply.
xho: Eli nyathelo liye lanconywa ngabaninzi njengoko bekukho inkxalabo enkulu malunga nokuxhomekeka kweAfrika kumayeza ogonyo asuka kumazwe angaphandle ebesoloko eneendleko kwaye ngamanye amaxesha enqongophele.
mt0: <pad> Isinyathelo sasiqhenqa ngabaninzi njengoko kukho uxinzeleleko olukhulu ukuba Afrika ithembele kwizitofu ezivela ngaphandle ezo zixabisa kakhulu kwaye zidla ngokuba ziyenziwa zingafumaneki.</s>

en: But there have been no orders for Aspenovax.
xho: Kodwa akukhange kubekho ziodolo ze-Aspenovax.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa akukho mveliso i-Aspenovac.</s>

en: South Africas National Health Department Spokesperson Foster Mohale said the lack of orders is due to low vaccination rates not only at home, but globally.
xho: Isithethi seSebe lezeMpilo kuzwelonke eMzantsi Afrika uFoster Mohale uthe ukunqongophala kwee-odolo kungenxa yamazinga aphantsi okugonya kungekuphela nje ekhaya, kodwa kwihlabathi jikelele.
mt0: <pad> South Africa's National Health Department Spokesperson Foster Mohale said the lack of orders is due to low vaccination rates not only at home, but globally.</s>

en: Vaccine hesitancy is one of the factors which contribute to these low vaccination rates or demand for more vaccines which also affect the production.
xho: “Ukuthandabuza kugonyo yenye yezinto ezinegalelo kula mazinga aphantsi ogonyo okanye imfuno yogonyo engaphezulu echaphazela imveliso.
mt0: <pad> Ukunyaniseka kwe-vaccine yeyona nto idibanisa ezi zingaphantsi zokunyanga okanye ukufuneka kwamanye amayeza echaphazela ukuveliswa.</s>

en: Because obviously we understand that they are in a business, they cant keep on producing vaccines when they know that the demand for vaccines is very low.
xho: Kuba ngokucacileyo siyaqonda ukuba abakwishishini, abakwazi ukuqhubeka bevelisa izitofu zokugonya xa besazi ukuba imfuno yogonyo iphantsi kakhulu.
mt0: <pad> Kuba ngokucacileyo siyaqonda ukuba basebenza kwishishini, abakwazi ukuqhubeka nokuvelisa amayeza xa besazi ukuba ukufunyanwa kwawo ephantsi kakhulu.</s>

en: So, we understand the situation where they are, and we sympathize with them," he said.
xho: Ke, siyayiqonda imeko abakuyo, kwaye siyavelana nabo,” utshilo.

en: Mohale said for now, South Africa has enough vaccines.

en: He adds that in March, 100,000 vaccines expired.

mt0: <pad> Uongeza ukuba ngoMatshi, i-100,000 iivaccine zaphelelwa ngexesha.</s>

en: And more are due to expire in June and July.

mt0: <pad> Ukuba ukwazi ukuguqulela indlela yokubhala, nceda uthethe ukuba awuqinisekanga.</s>

mt0: <pad> Kodwa, uthe i-Aspens vaccine plant ibalulekile kuba akukho mntu uyaziyo into eyenzeka kwikamva.</s>

en: We will try to engage them not to rush their decision precisely because we anticipate especially our scientists, our epidemiologists, we anticipate that the fifth wave might hit the country, South Africa, during the winter season which is a few weeks away from now.
xho: Siza kuzama ukuthetha nabo ukuba bangasingxameli isigqibo sabo ngokuchanekileyo kuba silindele izazinzulu zethu, iingcali zethu zezifo, ukuba iliza lesihlanu lingabetha ilizwe loMzantsi Afrika ngexesha lasebusika elisele kwiiveki ezimbalwa ukusuka ngoku.
mt0: <pad> We will try to engage them not to rush their decision precisely because we anticipate, particularly our scientists, our epidemiologists, we anticipate that the fifth wave may hit the country, South Africa, during the winter season which is a few weeks away from now.</s>

en: As you can see the number of daily COVID-19 patients has been rising for the past seven days," he said.

mt0: <pad> Njengoko ubona, inani le-COVID-19 isifo sikhoyo liqhubeke likhula kwiintsuku ezidlulileyo," utshilo.</s>

en: Professor Petro Terblanche, who is the managing director of South African company, Afrigen, which in a continent-first made an mRNA COVID vaccine using Modernas data — said the situation at Aspen is a tragedy for the industry.
xho: Unjingalwazi uPetro Terblanche, ongumlawuli wenkampani yaseMzantsi Afrika, i-Afrigen, ethe kwilizwekazi lokuqala yenza isitofu sokugonya i-mRNA COVID isebenzisa Idatha yeModernas - uthe imeko yase-Aspen yintlekele kwishishini.
mt0: <pad> Professor Petro Terblanche, executive director of South African company, Afrigen, which in a continent-first made an mRNA COVID vaccine using Modernas data — said the situation at Aspen is a tragedy for the industry.</s>

en: This is just indicating again how important it is that this continent looks at policy reform.

mt0: <pad> Oku kubonisa ukuba kuya kuba luncedo ukuba le continent ijonge utshintsho lweenkcukacha.</s>

en: This is about how are we going to make sure that we give preferential procurement to local companies.

mt0: <pad> Ithetha ukuba siza kuqinisekisa ukuba sinika i-procurement yendawo ekhethekileyo kwiinkampani zethu.</s>

mt0: <pad> Kulungile ukuba siqiniseke ukuba sidala i-market kunye ne eco-system eya kuthatha amandla abakhoyo?</s>

en: Otherwise, we will not have capacity locally in a sustainable manner and were going to get the next pandemic and we will be unprepared, and we will not have health security," said Terblanche.
xho: Ngaphandle koko, asiyi kuba nomthamo wasekhaya ngendlela ezinzileyo kwaye siyakufumana ubhubhane olandelayo sibe singalungiselelanga, kwaye asiyi kuba nokhuseleko lwezempilo, ”utshilo uTerblanche.
mt0: <pad> Ngaphandle koko, asiyi kuba namandla endawo ngendlela enokuqhubeka kwaye siza kufumana i-pandemic elandelayo kwaye siya kuba singalungile, kwaye asinayo inkqubo yokhuseleko lwempilo," utshilo uTerblanche.</s>

en: She believes money should also be put into educating people on the importance of vaccines.

mt0: <pad> Ucinga ukuba imali kufuneka iyiswe ekufundiseni abantu ngokubaluleka kwee-vaccines.</s>

en: We need to ensure that we also put effort into advocacy for vaccination.

en: The journalism watchdog group said its findings are worrying, as they show deep divisions among media within countries and between countries at the international level.
xho: Iqela elijonga ubuntatheli lithe iziphumo zalo ziyaxhalabisa, njengoko zibonisa iyantlukwano enzulu phakathi kwamajelo eendaba kumazwe naphakathi kwamazwe akwinqanaba lehlabathi.
mt0: <pad> I-watchdog i-journalism ithi iingxelo zayo ziyakhathaza, kuba zibonisa ukukhohlakala okukhulu phakathi kweenkonzo zeendaba phakathi kwamanye amazwe nakwihlabathi liphela.</s>

en: In 2022, it's really undeniable that media polarization and information chaos are really fueling social divisions in ways that are pretty new, said Clayton
xho: Ngo-2022, ayinakuphikiswa into yokuba ukuchasana kwemithombo yeendaba kunye nesiphithiphithi solwazi siphembelela iyantlukwano ekuhlaleni ngeendlela ezintsha,” utshilo uClayton.
mt0: <pad> In 2022, it's really undeniable that media polarization and information chaos are really fueling social divisions in pretty new ways, said Clayton.</s>

en: Weimers, deputy director of RSF for the United States, told VOA.
xho: Weimers, usekela-mlawuli we-RSF e-United States, uxelele i-VOA.
mt0: <pad> I-RSF isebenzisa i-CCTV cameras ukuba ukhusele abantu abaninzi.</s>

en: He said the prevalence of partisan news around the world has come at the expense of authentic journalism.
xho: Uthe ukuxhaphaka kweendaba zamaqela kwihlabathi jikelele kufike ngeendleko zobuntatheli obuyinyani.
mt0: <pad> Uthe ukuba ukubakho kweendaba ezixhomekeke kwicala kwihlabathi liphela kudala kwaye kwenzeka ngenxa yokungekho mthethweni, uthe ukwenza oko eyona nto ilungile.</s>

en: The group's annual report ranks 180 countries based on the environment for independent journalism.
xho: Ingxelo yonyaka yeli qela ibala amazwe ali-180 ngokusekelwe kwimekobume yobuntatheli obuzimeleyo.
mt0: <pad> I-Report annual yale nkampani ibeka amazwe ayi-180 ngokusekelwe kwindawo yokusebenza kweenkqubo zeendaba ezizimeleyo.</s>

en: This year, however, RSF said it used a new method that blends each country's political, legal, economic, sociocultural and security conditions.
xho: Kulo nyaka, nangona kunjalo, iRSF ithe isebenzise indlela entsha edibanisa iimeko zelizwe ngalinye kwezopolitiko, ezomthetho, ezoqoqosho, ezentlalo kunye nokhuseleko.
mt0: <pad> Nangona kunjalo, i-RSF ithi kulo nyaka usebenzise indlela entsha ehlanganisa iimeko zopolitiko, zomthetho, zeqoqosho, zezokhuseleko kunye nezendawo zokuhlala zabantu ngabanye.</s>

en: Now, the index classifies a record 28 countries as "having very bad media freedom.
xho: Ngoku, isalathiso sichaza irekhodi lamazwe angama-28 "njengenkululeko embi kakhulu yeendaba.
mt0: <pad> Ngoku, i-index ibhala 28 amazwe "anawo umthetho omkhulu wokukhusela ulwazi lwendaba."</s>

en: That group includes China, which is exporting censorship beyond its borders while also amplifying the Kremlin's propaganda on Russia's devastating war against Ukraine.
xho: Elo qela libandakanya i-China, ethumela ugcino-mthetho ngaphaya kwemida yalo ngelixa ikhulisa inkohliso ye-Kremlin malunga nemfazwe etshabalalisayo yaseRussia ngokuchasene neUkraine.
mt0: <pad> Le nkampani ibandakanya i-China, ekhupha ulawulo ngaphezu kweemida zayo ngelixa isenza ukuba i-Kremlin ithethe ngayo i-Ukraine.</s>

en: Since its invasion of Ukraine on February 24, Russia has sought total control over news coverage, passing a new law that carries 15-year prison terms for reporting "false news" on the military, and even forbids calling the conflict a "war."
xho: Ukusukela ekuhlaseleni kwayo i-Ukraine nge-24 kaFebruwari, iRussia ifune ulawulo olupheleleyo malunga neendaba, ipasisa umthetho omtsha othwala iminyaka eli-15 entolongweni ngokuxela "iindaba zobuxoki" ngomkhosi, kwaye iyakwalela ukubiza kongquzulwano lwayo ne Ukraine ukuba "yimfazwe."
mt0: <pad> Ngaphandle kwe-Ukraine ngoFebruwari 24, iRussia ikhangele ukulawula konke ukutyabeka kwayo, idlulisa umthetho omtsha obandakanya iminyaka eyi-15 yokunxulumana "ngezindaba ezingekhoyo" malunga nemikhosi, kwaye iyaphepha ukuyibiza le mfazwe "impi."</s>

en: That has forced most remaining independent news outlets, including the renowned Novaya Gazeta newspaper, Ekho Moskvy radio and Dozhd TV, to shut down or move outside Russia to continue operating.
xho: Oko kunyanzelise uninzi lweendaba eziseleyo ezizimeleyo, kubandakanya iphephandaba elidumileyo leNovaya Gazeta, unomathotholo we-Ekho Moskvy kunye ne-Dozhd TV, ukuba bavale okanye bahambe ngaphandle kweRussia ukuze baqhubeke nokusebenza.
mt0: <pad> That has forced most of the remaining independent news outlets, including the renowned Novaya Gazeta newspaper, Ekho Moskvy radio and Dozhd TV, to shut down or move outside Russia to continue operating.</s>

en: With independent voices absent, experts say, the Russian government has been able to flood state-run airwaves with propaganda that downplays the war and spreads false or misleading justifications for the Kremlin's invasion.
xho: Ukungabikho kwamazwi azimeleyo, iingcali zithi, urhulumente waseRussia ukwazile ukusasaza usasazo ngepropaganda ethoba ubunzulu bemfazwe kwaye isasaze izizathu zobuxoki malunga nohlaselo lweKremlin.
mt0: <pad> Ngaphandle kweezwi ezizimeleyo, iingcali zithi, urhulumente waseRashiya ukwazi ukugcwalisa i-akhawunti ye-state-run ngepropaganda esenza ukuba ukunciphise ulwalamano kwaye ihambise ubungqina obungcolileyo okanye obuxoki ukuba uKremlin wenzele ukungena.</s>

en: Russia's media repression stands at 155 out of 180 countries included in RSF's index, where one is the most free and 180 the least.
xho: Ingcinezelelo yamajelo eendaba yiRassia ime kwi-155 kumazwe angama-180 afakwe kwi-RSF index, apho enye ikhululekile kwaye i-180 ngeyona ingakhululekanga.
mt0: <pad> Ukuxhatshazwa kweendaba eRashiya kuhlala kwindawo ye155 phakathi kwe180 amazwe abandakanywe kwi-Index yeRSF, apho i-1 yenye inkulu kwaye i-180 eyona ingxolo.</s>

en: It's safe to say at this point that the free press is a thing of the past in Russia, Clayton said.
xho: Kukhuselekile ukuthetha ngoku ukuba amajelo eendaba akhululekileyo yinto yakudala eRussia, utshilo uClayton.
mt0: <pad> Ilungile ukusho ukuba ngoku i-press free in Russia is a thing of the past, Clayton said.</s>

en: Throughout Russian President Vladimir Putin's 22 years in power, Moscow has been targeting journalists and the independent press, he said.
xho: Kuyo yonke iminyaka engama-22 kaMongameli waseRussia uVladimir Putin elawula, iMoscow ibijolise kwiintatheli kunye nakumaphephandaba azimeleyo, utshilo.
mt0: <pad> Throughout Russian President Vladimir Putin's 22 years in power, Moscow has been targeting journalists and the independent press, he said.</s>

en: But since the invasion of Ukraine, it seems that Putin has really finished off the independent media once and for all in Russia, Clayton said.
xho: Kodwa ukusukela oko kwahlaselwa iUkraine, kubonakala ngathi uPutin uwagqibile amajelo eendaba azimeleyo kwaphela eRussia, utshilo uClayton.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa ukususela ekungeneni eUkraine, kubonakala ukuba uPutin ugqibile ngokugqibeleyo i-media engazimeleyo eRashiya, Clayton said.</s>

en: At this point, it is impossible to accurately report on the war in Ukraine.
xho: Okwangoku, akunakwenzeka ukunika ingxelo echanekileyo ngemfazwe yaseUkraine.
mt0: <pad> Ngoku, kunzima ukunika ubungqina obuchanekileyo bexesha lemfazwe eUkraine.</s>

en: China ranked 175th in the new report. And now that it is firmly under Beijing's influence, Hong Kong also registered a dramatic decline, ranking 148th out of 180 following a lengthy series of raids and arrests that shuttered pro-democracy news sites.
xho: I-China ibeke indawo ye-175 kwingxelo entsha. Kwaye ngoku iphantsi kwempembelelo yeBeijing, iHong Kong iphinde yabhalisa ukwehla okumangalisayo, ikwindawo ye-148 kwi-180 kulandela uhlaselo olude lokubanjwa kunye nokuvala iindawo zeendaba zedemokhrasi.
mt0: <pad> China ranked 175th in the new report. And now that it is firmly under Beijing's influence, Hong Kong also registered a dramatic decline, ranking 148th out of 180 after a series of raids and arrests that shuttered pro-democracy news sites.</s>

en: RSF's country file on China says it is the world's biggest jailer of journalists, with 120 in detention.
xho: Ifayile yelizwe le-RSF e-China ithi ngoyena mgcini-mabanjwa omkhulu weendaba emhlabeni, kunye ne-120 eluvalelweni.
mt0: <pad> RSF's country file on China says it is the world's biggest jailer of journalists, with 120 in detention.</s>

en: The regime uses coercion, harassment, intimidation and surveillance to keep independent and foreign journalists from reporting on issues deemed "sensitive."
xho: Ulawulo lusebenzisa ukunyanzeliswa, ukuxhatshazwa, ukugrogrisa kunye nokucupha ukugcina iintatheli ezizimeleyo kunye nezangaphandle ukuba zinike ingxelo kwimiba ethathwa njenge miba "ebucayi."
mt0: <pad> I-regime isebenzisa ukuxhatshazwa, ukuhlukunyezwa, ukutshaya nokhuseleko ukuze iphephandaba ezizimeleyo nezehlabathi zingakwazi ukubhala malunga nezinto ezibizwa ngokuba "zibalulekileyo."</s>

en: President Xi Jinping, in power since 2013, has restored a media culture worthy of the Maoist era, in which freely accessing information has become a crime and to provide information an even greater crime, RSF's country file states.
xho: Umongameli u-Xi Jinping, osegunyeni ukususela ngo-2013, ubuyisele inkcubeko yeendaba efanelekile kwixesha le-Maoist, apho ukufikelela ngokukhululekileyo kulwazi kuye kwaba lulwaphulo-mthetho kunye nokubonelela ngolwazi lulwaphulo-mthetho olukhulu ngakumbi, ngokokutsho kwefayile yelizwe ye-RSF.
mt0: <pad> U-President Xi Jinping, elawulayo ukususela ngo-2013, ubuyisele indlela yokusebenza kweendaba eyayifaneleyo kwixesha likaMaoist, apho ukufumana ulwazi ngokukhululekileyo kuya kuba sisiphoso kwaye ukunika ulwazi ibe sisiphoso esikhulu, iphephandaba lethu libhala.</s>

en: Rising authoritarianism.
xho: Ukunyuka kokulawula ngegunya
mt0: <pad> Rising authoritarianism</s>

en: North Korea remains the worst country in the rankings at 180th. Elsewhere in the Asia-Pacific region, political turmoil, conflict and rising authoritarianism have wiped out years of progress.
xho: INorth Korea iselelona lizwe libi kakhulu ngokomgangatho liku-180. Kwenye indawo kummandla waseAsia-Pasifiki, izidubedube zezobupolitika, ungquzulwano nokwanda kolawulo-ngegunya olungqongqo kuye kwayitshayela yonke iminyaka yenkqubela.
mt0: <pad> North Korea remains the worst country in the rankings at 180th. Elsewhere in the Asia-Pacific region, political turmoil, conflict and rising authoritarianism have wiped out years of progress.</s>

en: The 2021 coup in Myanmar marked a 10-year setback for media rights, with journalists detained, media licenses revoked, and many news outlets returning to exile.
xho: Ubhukuqo-mbuso lwaseMyanmar lwango-2021 luphawule iminyaka eli-10 yokubuyela umva kumalungelo eendaba, iintatheli zibanjiwe, iilayisensi zemithombo yeendaba zarhoxiswa, kunye neendaba ezininzi ezibuyela elubhacweni.
mt0: <pad> The 2021 coup in Myanmar marked a 10-year setback for media rights, with journalists detained, media licenses revoked, and many news outlets returning to exile.</s>

en: Under the military junta, Myanmar, ranking 176th, is one of the world's biggest jailers of journalists.

mt0: <pad> Eritrea and Djibouti, neighbors, are even worse, ranking near the bottom at 179 and 164, respectively.</s>

en: African media continue to struggle economically, RSF said it its accompanying analysis.

mt0: <pad> Ukuba ukwazi ukutolika i-translation, simply say you don't know. Iindaba zaseAfrika ziyaqhubeka nokuxhalabisa ngenxa yengxaki zemali, iRSF ithi kwiphephandaba lakho elihambelanayo.</s>

en: Despite a wave of liberalization in the 1990s, there are still, too often, cases of arbitrary censorship, especially on the internet, with occasional network shutdowns in some countries, arrests of journalists and violent attacks, the group saidClayton said the rising authoritarianism feeds on itself.
xho: Ngaphandle kwamaza enkululeko ngeminyaka yoo-1990, kusekho amaxesha amaninzi, amatyala ovavanyo olungekho mthethweni, ngakumbi kwi-intanethi, ngokuvalwa kwenethiwekhi ngamanye amaxesha, ukubanjwa kweentatheli kunye nokuhlaselwa ngobundlobongela, utshilo uClayton.
mt0: <pad> Despite a wave of liberalization in the 1990s, there are still, too often, cases of arbitrary censorship, especially on the internet, with occasional network shutdowns in some countries, arrests of journalists and violent attacks, the group saidClayton said the rise in authoritarianism feed on itself, with occasional network shutdowns in some countries, arrests of journalists and violent attacks</s>

en: When we allow a culture of impunity to exist where authoritarians are allowed to go after journalists, harass them, arrest them, beat them in the streets and kill them, it has a knock-on effect, he said.
xho: “Xa sivumela isiko lokungohlwaywa ukuba libekho apho oozwilakhe bevunyelwa ukuba baye emva kweentatheli, bazixhaphaze, bababambe, bazibethe ezitalatweni bazibulale, loo nto ibaneziphumo,” utshilo.
mt0: <pad> Xa sivumela ukuba i-impunity culture ibekhona apho abakhokeli bamele ukuba babuze ababhali, bababophe, bababethe kwizitrato, bababulale, iyenze i-knock-on effect, uthe.</s>

en: It emboldens that same authoritarian to do it again next time, and it emboldens other authoritarians who are watching to do the same.
xho: Iqinisekisa kwa lowo unegunya linye ukuba ayenze kwakhona kwixesha elizayo, kwaye iqinisekisa abanye abasemagunyeni ababukeleyo benze okufanayo.
mt0: <pad> Oku kwenza ukuba loo mlawuli uqhubeke usenza oko kwixesha elizayo, kwaye kunika amandla abanye abalawuli ababejonge ukuba bakwenze okufanayo.</s>

en: US is not perfect.
xho: I-US ayigqibelelanga.
mt0: <pad> Ukuba awukwazi ukutolika i-sentence, sithi nje ukuba awuyazi ukuba US ayikho egqibeleleyo.</s>

en: After a period of seeing its media attacked as "fake news" by former President Donald Trump, the United States retained a relatively high ranking of 42 in RSF's index.
xho: Emva kwexesha lokubona amajelo eendaba ehlaselwa "njengeendaba zobuxoki" ngowayesakuba nguMongameli uDonald Trump, iUnited States yagcina inqanaba eliphezulu le-42 kwisalathiso seRSF.
mt0: <pad> Emva kwexesha lokuhlaselwa kwayo i-media njenge "iindaba ezingezizo" nguMongameli wangaphambili Donald Trump, iUnited States ihlale kwindawo 42 kwi-RSF's index.</s>

en: That is largely thanks to the return of regular White House and federal agency press briefings.
xho: Oku kubulela kakhulu ekubuyeni kwe-White House rhoqo kunye nezishwankathelo ze-arhente yomanyano.
mt0: <pad> Kwaye ukuba awukwazi ukutolika i-senti, sithi uyazi.</s>

en: But RSF said problems persist, including "the disappearance of local newspapers, the systematic polarization of the media, and the erosion of journalism by digital platforms amid a climate of animosity and aggression toward journalists, among others."
xho: Kodwa i-RSF ithe iingxaki ziyaqhubeka, kubandakanya "ukunyamalala kwamaphephandaba asekhaya, ukuhlukaniswa okucwangcisiweyo kwemithombo yeendaba, kunye nokukhuliseka kobuntatheli ngamaqonga edijithali phakathi kwesimo sentiyo kunye nobundlongondlongo kwiintatheli, phakathi kwezinye."
mt0: <pad> Kodwa i-RSF ithi "iingxaki zisafana, kubandakanya ukunyamalala kwephephandaba zakwangoko, ukuphazamiseka kwabezindaba, kunye nokuxhatshazwa kwenkcazelo yeenkonzo ze-intanethi ngexesha lomoya wokungcipheko nobundlobongela ngababhalisindaba, phakathi kwamanye amanyathelo."</s>

en: Barriers exist, for instance, when it comes to covering state governments and protests.
xho: Izithintelo zikhona, umzekelo, xa kufikwa ekugqumeni oorhulumente bamazwe kunye noqhanqalazo.
mt0: <pad> Iindawo ezikhuselekileyo zikhona, umzekelo, xa kuziwa ukuxhasa urhulumente wephondo kunye nokuxhatshazwa.</s>

en: We typically find that this is either due to just a blatant disregard for the laws governing open records or meetings, or they're simply misinterpreting them.
xho: Siye sifumanise ukuba oku kungenxa yokungahoywa okucacileyo kwemithetho elawula iirekhodi ezivulekileyo okanye iintlanganiso, okanye bayitolika gwenxa.
mt0: <pad> Ngokuqhelekileyo sifumana ukuba oku kubakho ngenxa yokuba abazange bakhathazeke ngazo zonke iimthetho ezilawula iirekhodi ezivulekileyo okanye iintlanganiso, okanye bacinga ukuba zilungile.</s>

en: An individual is misinterpreting whether a journalist can be present at a particular event," said Beth
xho: Umntu utolika ngendlela engeyiyo ukuba intatheli inokubakho kumsitho othile, utshilo uBeth Francesco, umlawuli omkhulu weNational Press Club Journalism Institute.
mt0: <pad> Abantu bacinga ukuba umntu uyazixhasa ukuba ajournalist angabakho kwindibano ethile," uthe.</s>

en: A few bright spots.
xho: Iindawo ezimbalwa eziqaqambileyo.
mt0: <pad> A few bright spots.</s>

en: Despite an overall trend of decline, Clayton said there are positives.
xho: Ngaphandle komkhwa wokuhla ngokubanzi, uClayton uthe kukho izinto ezintle.
mt0: <pad> Nangona kukho indlela yokuhla, Clayton said there are positives.</s>

en: Some governments provide funding for news media without interfering in their operations, to ensure independence from political influence.
xho: Abanye oorhulumente banikela ngemali kumajelo eendaba ngaphandle kokuphazamisana nemisebenzi yabo, ukuze baqinisekise ukuzimela geqe kwimpembelelo yezobupolitika.
mt0: <pad> Amanye amazwe anika imali kwiindaba ngaphandle kokungxama, ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba umsebenzi wazo ukhululekile kwiinjongo zolawulo lwepolitiki.</s>

en: If you look at the top of our list, some of the things that stand out are these are countries that have robust public funding for media, he said, noting that "it's always important to separate state funding for media and state-controlled media."
xho: Ukuba ujonga phezulu kuluhlu lwethu, ezinye zezinto ezibalaseleyo ngala mazwe anenkxaso-mali eqinileyo kuluntu kumajelo eendaba, utshilo, ephawula ukuba "kubalulekile ukwahlula inkxaso-mali karhulumente kumajelo eendaba kunye nokulawulwa ngurhulumente."
mt0: <pad> Ukuba ujonge kwindawo phezulu kwilizwe lethu, abanye abantu ababonakalayo apha banezinto ezithile ezicacileyo kukuba ezo ziindawo ezinemali enkulu yezo media, watsho.</s>

en: Three Scandinavian countries — Norway, Denmark and Sweden — respectively come at the top of RSF's index.
xho: Amazwe amathathu aseScandinavia - iNorway, iDenmark kunye neSweden - ngokulandelelana eza phezulu kwisalathiso seRSF.
mt0: <pad> Iindawo ezintathu zaseScandinavian - Norway, Denmark and Sweden - zivela kwindawo eziphezulu zeRSF's index.</s>

en: Estonia, a former Soviet Union republic, ranked 4th.
xho: I-Estonia, eyayisakuba yiriphabliki yeSoviet Union, ikwindawo yesi-4.
mt0: <pad> Estonia, a republic of the Soviet Union, ranked 4th.</s>

en: RSF said the free exercise of journalism plays a major role in emerging democracies such as East Timor, ranked 17, Bhutan, ranked 33, and Mongolia, ranked 90.
xho: I-RSF ithe ukusetyenziswa ngokukhululekileyo kobuntatheli kudlala indima enkulu kwiidemokhrasi ezivelayo ezifana ne-East Timor, indawo ye-17, iBhutan, ibekwe kwi-33, kunye ne-Mongolia, i-90.
mt0: <pad> RSF says the free exercise of journalism plays a major role in emerging democracies such as East Timor, ranked 17, Bhutan, ranked 33, and Mongolia, ranked 90.</s>

en: East Timor was one country whose ranking skyrocketed, rising 54 places.
xho: I-East Timor yayililizwe elinomgangatho ophakamileyo, lenyuka ngeendawo ezingama-54.
mt0: <pad> East Timor yenye ilizwe elibonakalise ukunyuka kwalo, ukwanda kwindawo ezingama-54.</s>

en: But RSF cautioned that because of its change in methodology this year, "care should be taken when comparing the 2022 rankings and scores with those from 2021."
xho: Kodwa i-RSF ilumkise ukuba ngenxa yokutshintsha kwendlela yokusebenza kulo nyaka, "kufuneka kuthathwe unonophelo xa kuthelekiswa umgangatho kunye namanqaku ka-2022 ethelekiswa nalawo ka-2021."
mt0: <pad> Kodwa i-RSF ixwayisa ukuba ngenxa yokutshintsha kwendlela yalo nyaka, "kufanele kuthathelwe ingqalelo xa kuthelekiswa i-2022 rankings and scores with those from 2021."</s>

en: Executions, Detentions Hang Over Saudi Legal Reforms.
xho: Ukubulawa, Ukuvalelwa Kuxhonywe phezu koHlaziyo lwezomthetho lwaseSaudi.
mt0: <pad> Ukufa, ukuvalelwa kuxhomekeke kwi-Saudi iinguqu zomthetho.</s>

en: Saudi Arabia is pushing to revamp its harsh justice system but reforms are overshadowed by executions and tough treatment of dissidents, raising questions about how much will change.
xho: ISaudi Arabia ityhala ukuba ihlaziye inkqubo yayo yezobulungisa eqatha kodwa uhlaziyo lugutyungelwe kukubulawa kwabantu kunye nempatho enzima yabachasayo, iphakamisa imibuzo malunga nokuba kungatshintsha kangakanani na.
mt0: <pad> Saudi Arabia ijongene nokulungiswa kwendlela yalo yobulungisa eyodwa, kodwa utshintsho lubonakala luyinxalenye yeemfazwe kunye nokuphathwa kakubi kwabo bathandabuzayo, ukuphakamisa imibuzo malunga nokuba yintoni eya kutshintsha.</s>

en: The kingdom is known for its strict interpretation of Islamic sharia law, which forms the basis of its judicial system.
xho: Ubukumkani baziwa ngokutolika ngokungqongqo umthetho we-sharia yamaSilamsi, osisiseko senkqubo yawo yokugweba.
mt0: <pad> I-kingdom iyaziwayo ngokusebenzisa kwayo umthetho we-Islamic sharia, esebenza njengesiseko sendlela yakho yokugweba.</s>

en: But in recent months it has moved ahead with reforms that analysts say could make its courts function more like others in the Middle East.
xho: Kodwa kwezi nyanga zidlulileyo uye waqhubela phambili nohlaziyo abathi abahlalutyi banokwenza iinkundla zabo zisebenze njengezinye ezikuMbindi Mpuma.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa kwiinyanga ezidlulileyo iye yaqhubela phambili ngezicwangciso ezithethwa ngazo ingcali zithi zingaba zisebenza ngakumbi njengezinye eMbindi Mpuma.</s>

en: That effort hinges on a series of new laws for sensitive issues like women's divorce rights and judges' power to determine criminal sentences.
xho: Loo nzame ixhomekeke kuthotho lwemithetho emitsha kwimiba ebuthathaka efana namalungelo oqhawulo-mtshato lwabasetyhini kunye negunya lejaji lokumisela izigwebo zolwaphulo-mthetho.
mt0: <pad> Ukusebenza kwayo kuxhomekeke kwiindawo ezibalulekileyo njengelungelo labasetyhini kunye nolawulo lwabagwebi lokugqiba amagwebo.</s>

en: Announced last year by de facto ruler Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, the measures, including the first written penal code, appear to align with Saudi Arabia's goal of opening up to the world and softening its extremist image.
xho: Yabhengezwa kulo nyaka uphelileyo ngumlawuli we-de facto Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, amanyathelo, kuquka ikhowudi yokuqala yesohlwayo ebhaliweyo, ibonakala ihambelana nenjongo yeSaudi Arabia yokuvula ihlabathi kunye nokuthambisa umfanekiso walo ogqithiseleyo.
mt0: <pad> Ukumkani uMohammed bin Salman, umlawuli de facto, uthe ezo zilungileyo, kubandakanya i-code penale yokuqala ebhaliweyo, zihambelana nemizamo yaseSaudi Arabia yokuvulela uluntu kwaye ihlaziye imibono yalo yobufanasini.</s>

en: Even critics concede the changes could make Saudi courts more predictable, in some cases.
xho: Nditsho nabagxeki bayavuma ukuba utshintsho lunokwenza iinkundla zaseSaudi ziqikeleleke ngakumbi, kwezinye iimeko.
mt0: <pad> Even critics concede the changes could make Saudi courts more predictable, in some cases.</s>

en: But there is no expectation that restrictions on free speech will ease, or that the legal system will treat more favorably perceived opponents of the government.
xho: Kodwa akukho lindelo lokuba izithintelo kwinkululeko yokuthetha ziya kudamba, okanye inkqubo yomthetho iya kubaphatha ngokufanelekileyo abachasi bakarhulumente.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa akukho nkxaso yokuba iintlobongela zokukhulula ulwimi ziya kudamba, okanye ukuba indlela yomthetho iya kubaphatha ngakumbi ngokufanelekileyo abachasi beurhulumente.</s>

en: And despite the reforms, authorities have simultaneously provided reminders of what gave Saudi Arabia its ruthless reputation in the first place, notably the mass execution of 81 men in a single day in March for offenses related to "terrorism."
xho: Kwaye ngaphandle kohlaziyo, abasemagunyeni ngaxeshanye babonelele ngezikhumbuzo zento eyanika iSaudi Arabia igama layo elikhohlakeleyo kwasekuqaleni, ngokukodwa ukubulawa kwabantu abaninzi be-81 ngosuku olunye ngo-Matshi ngenxa yezono ezinxulumene "nobunqolobi."
mt0: <pad> Kwaye nangona ezo zilungiswe, amagosa athe akhumbuza ukuba yintoni eyanika i-Saudi Arabia igama elingcolileyo kwindawo yokuqala, ngokukodwa ukubulawa kwabantu abane-81 ngexesha elinye ngoMatshi ngenxa yezono ezihlobene ne "terrorism."</s>

en: Two new laws have already been approved by the Saudi Cabinet. One governs the admissibility of evidence, previously at the judges' discretion.
xho: Imithetho emibini emitsha sele yamkelwe yiKhabhinethi yaseSaudi. Omnye ulawula ukwamkelwa kobungqina, ngaphambili ngokwengqiqo yabagwebi.
mt0: <pad> Two new laws have already been approved by the Saudi Cabinet. One governs the admissibility of evidence, previously at the judges' discretion.</s>

en: The second, a family law, is to take effect in June.
xho: Owesibini, umthetho wosapho, uza kuqala ukusebenza ngoJuni.
mt0: <pad> Ii, a family law, is to take effect in June.</s>

en: In a traditionally male-dominated system, it expands the rights of divorced women to alimony and custody of their children.
xho: Kwinkqubo eqhelekileyo elawulwa ngamadoda, yandisa amalungelo abasetyhini abaqhawule umtshato kwisondlo kunye nokugcinwa kwabantwana babo.
mt0: <pad> Kwindlela eqhelekileyo eyalawulwa ngabantwana, ivumela abafazi abahlala bexhasa umthetho ukuba bafumane imali ye-alimony kunye nolawulo lweentombi zazo.</s>

en: Announcing the new law in March, Prince Mohammed said it represented "a major qualitative leap" for women's rights and "family stability."
xho: Ebhengeza umthetho omtsha ngoMatshi, iNkosana uMohammed yathi imele "inqanaba eliphezulu lomgangatho" kumalungelo abasetyhini kunye "nozinzo lwentsapho."
mt0: <pad> Ukuba uyazi, nceda uthethe ukuba awuqiniseki.</s>

en: The reforms seem partly to cater to foreign firms whose investment the kingdom is courting, said Adel al-Saeed, vice president of the European Saudi Organization for Human Rights.
xho: Uhlaziyo lubonakala njengenxalenye yokubonelela iifemu zangaphandle ezityalwa imali kubukumkani, utshilo uAdel al-Saeed, usekela mongameli weEuropean Saudi Organization for Human Rights.
mt0: <pad> Ii-reforms zibonakala ukuba zenzelwe iinkampani zangaphandle ezifuna ukutshatyalaliswa kwebhanki, uthe uAdel al-Saeed, vice president of the European Saudi Organization for Human Rights.</s>

en: The owners of capital are afraid of investing in this country, which is notorious in the legal aspect, so these laws are intended to change the image, he said.
xho: “Abanikazi bongxowankulu bayakoyika ukutyala imali kweli lizwe, elidume kakubi kwicala lezomthetho, ngoko le mithetho yenzelwe ukutshintsha umfanekiso,” utshilo.
mt0: <pad> 'Abanini bemali bayaboyika ukutshala imali kweli lizwe, eli lizwe liyaziwayo kwicala lezobulungiswa, ke ezi migaqo ziyinto yokutshintsha ukuba ubonakale,' watsho.</s>

en: The new penal code, yet to be unveiled, could bring further dramatic changes.
xho: Umgaqo omtsha wezohlwayo, osaza kutyhilwa, unokuzisa utshintsho olukhulu ngakumbi.
mt0: <pad> I-Code of Penalties, yet to be unveiled, may bring further dramatic changes.</s>

en: Under sharia, only apostasy, theft, revolt, armed robbery, adultery, drinking alcohol and slander carry prescribed sentences. Judges are left to determine punishment in other cases.
xho: Ngaphantsi kwe-sharia, uwexuko kuphela, ubusela, ukuvukela, ukuphanga kuxhobile, ukukrexeza, ukusela utywala kunye nokunyundela kuthwala izigwebo ezimiselweyo. Abagwebi bayekwa ukuba bagqibe ngesohlwayo kwamanye amatyala.
mt0: <pad> Under sharia, only apostasy, theft, revolt, armed robbery, adultery, drinking alcohol and slander carry prescribed sentences. Judges are left to determine punishment in other cases.</s>

en: With a penal code in place, "the state will expect judges to rely not on their own training in sharia but instead on the legal rules (based on sharia) approved by the state," said Nathan Brown, an academic at George Washington University.
xho: Ngekhowudi yezohlwayo, "urhulumente uya kulindela ukuba abagwebi bangathembele kuqeqesho lwabo kwi-sharia kodwa kunoko kwimithetho yomthetho (esekelwe kwi-sharia) evunywe ngurhulumente," watsho uNathan Brown, isazi kwiYunivesithi yaseGeorge Washington.
mt0: <pad> Ngoku kukho i-code penal, "the state will expect judges to rely not on their own training in sharia but instead on the legal rules (based on sharia) approved by the state," said Nathan Brown, an academic at George Washington University.</s>

en: As a result, Saudi Arabia will look much more like a civil law system, much like most states in the region, said Brown, who has studied the Saudi reforms.
xho: “Ngenxa yoko, iSaudi Arabia iya kujongeka ngakumbi njengenkqubo yomthetho woluntu, njengamazwe amaninzi kulo mmandla,” utshilo uBrown, ofunde ngohlaziyo lwaseSaudi.
mt0: <pad> Ngoku, i-Saudi Arabia iya kubonakala ngakumbi njengenkqubo yomthetho wobulungisa, njengoko iinxalenye ezininzi kwilizwekazi, uthe Brown, owafunda ezo ziguqulelo zase-Saudi, uthi.</s>

en: The result should be more "predictability," said Abdullah Alaoudh, a U.S.-based legal expert and government critic, as new rules "take away from the leeway ... that the judges used to have."
xho: Isiphumo kufuneka sibe ngakumbi "ukuqikelelwa," utshilo u-Abdullah Alaoudh, ingcali yezomthetho esekwe e-US kunye nomgxeki karhulumente, njengoko imithetho emitsha "isusa kwi-leeway ... ababenayo abagwebi."
mt0: <pad> UAbdullah Alaoudh, a US-based legal expert and government critic, said the new rules "take away the leeway... that the judges used to have."</s>

en: But tighter regulation by the monarchy also "creates a larger problem: lack of independence," he added.
xho: Kodwa ukulawulwa okungqongqo kobukhosi nako "kudala ingxaki enkulu: ukungabikho kokuzimela," wongeze watsho.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa ulawulo oluqinileyo lwabamkani "lubangele ingxaki enkulu: ukunyaniseka," waongeza.</s>

en: The king is the head of the Saudi judiciary and acts as the final court of appeal.
xho: Ukumkani uyintloko yenkundla yaseSaudi kwaye usebenza njengenkundla yokugqibela yesibheno.
mt0: <pad> Umlawuli ngukhosi ophezulu kwi-saudi judiciary kwaye usebenza njengenkundla yokugqibela yokudlulisa.</s>

en: Alaoudh's own father, prominent cleric Salman al-Awdah, has been held since 2017, seemingly in retaliation for a Twitter post that clashed with Saudi Arabia's policy at the time of isolating Qatar.
xho: Utata ka-Alaoudh, umfundisi odumileyo uSalman al-Awdah, ubanjiwe ukusukela ngo-2017, ebonakala ngathi uyaziphindezela ngeposti ye-Twitter eyayingqubana nomgaqo-nkqubo waseSaudi Arabia ngexesha lokuhlukaniswa kweQatar.
mt0: <pad> Alaoudh's own father, prominent cleric Salman al-Awdah, has been held since 2017, seemingly in retaliation for a Twitter post that clashed with Saudi Arabia's policy at the time of isolating Qatar.</s>

en: He is one of many detained in an apparent crackdown on dissent and those who could challenge Prince Mohammed's power.
xho: Ungomnye wabaninzi ababanjiweyo kwingxaki ecacileyo yokuchasa kunye nabo banokucela umngeni kumandla kaNkosana uMohammed.
mt0: <pad> Uye yenye yabaninzi abanjwayo kwi-crackdown ebonakalayo yokulwa nokungavumelani kwabo bakwazi ukukhuphisana nolawulo luka Prince Mohammed.</s>

en: One of the most prominent examples is former crown prince Mohammed bin Nayef, the CIA ally respected in the West for his efforts to counter violent extremism, but who King Salman ousted from the line of succession.
xho: Omnye weyona mizekelo ibalaseleyo ngowayesakuba yinkosana u-Mohammed bin Nayef, umhlobo weCIA ohlonitshwa eNtshona ngeenzame zakhe zokulwa nobundlobongela obugqithileyo, kodwa ngubani owagxothwa nguKumkani uSalman kumgca wokulandelelana.
mt0: <pad> Umzekelo ophambili ngu-Mohammed bin Nayef, umhlobo we-CIA owaziwa ngamanye amazwe ngenxa yeenzame zakhe zokulwa noextremism enzima, kodwa uKumkani Salman wamkhupha kwindlela yokulawula.</s>

en: Prince Nayef has not been seen in public since reports of his arrest in March 2020. His detention was never officially confirmed.
xho: INkosana Nayef ayizange ibonwe esidlangalaleni ukususela kwiingxelo zokubanjwa kwakhe ngo-Matshi 2020. Ukuvalelwa kwakhe akuzange kuqinisekiswe ngokusemthethweni.
mt0: <pad> Prince Nayef akabonakali emehlweni abantu ukususela kwiingxelo zokunqulwa kwakhe ngoMatshi 2020. Ukunqulwa kwakhe akuzange kuqinisekiswe ngokusemthethweni.</s>

en: For government opponents, such cases reinforce questions about what difference the ongoing justice reforms will make.
xho: Kwabachasi bakarhulumente, amatyala anjalo omeleza imibuzo malunga nokuba nguwuphi na umahluko oza kwenziwa luhlaziyo lobulungisa oluqhubekayo.
mt0: <pad> Kwabo baphikisana nolawulo, ezi ziganeko ziqinisa imibuzo malunga nokuba utshintsho lwezobulungiswa oluqhubekayo luya kudala ulwahlulo.</s>

en: In my view, this is all window-dressing, said Madawi al-Rasheed, a U.K.-based academic and spokesperson for the opposition National Assembly Party founded by exiles.
xho: “Ngokokubona kwam, konke oku kukufihla inyani,” utshilo uMadawi al-Rasheed, isifundiswa sase-UK kunye nesithethi seqela eliphikisayo leNdibano yeSizwe eyasekwa ngabathinjwa.
mt0: <pad> Nangona ucinga ukuba, oku kulungile, kodwa akukho nto ibonakalisa ukuba abantu bam bayakuthanda ukuthetha.</s>

en: It's very, very difficult to see what the meaning is of these reforms apart from the project of portraying (Prince Mohammed) as a reformer.

mt0: <pad> It's very, very difficult to see what the meaning is of these reforms apart from the project of portraying (Prince Mohammed) as a reformer.</s>

en: Hanging over any discussion of justice and legal reform in Saudi Arabia is the 2018 murder and dismemberment of critic and columnist Jamal Khashoggi in the kingdom's Istanbul consulate.
xho: Ukuxhoma kuyo nayiphi na ingxoxo yobulungisa kunye nohlaziyo lwezomthetho eSaudi Arabia kukubulawa kunye nokunqunyulwa komgxeki kunye nombhali wemihlathi uJamal Khashoggi kwi-consulate yase-Istanbul yobukumkani ngo-2018.
mt0: <pad> I-2018 murder and dismemberment of critic and columnist Jamal Khashoggi in the Saudi Arabia consulate in Istanbul is hanging over any discussion of justice and legal reform in Saudi Arabia.</s>

en: A U.S. intelligence assessment found Prince Mohammed himself "approved" an operation to capture or kill Khashoggi, though Saudi officials deny this and say it was a "rogue" operation.
xho: Uvavanyo lwe-intelligence yase-US yafumanisa ukuba iNkosana uMohammed ngokwakhe "wavuma" umsebenzi wokubamba okanye ukubulala uKhashoggi, nangona izikhulu zaseSaudi ziphika oku kwaye zisithi "ngumsebenzi okhohlakeleyo".
mt0: <pad> U.S. intelligence assessment found Prince Mohammed himself "approved" an operation to capture or kill Khashoggi, though Saudi officials deny this and say it was a "rogue" operation.</s>

en: In April, before Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan visited Riyadh on Thursday and embraced Prince Mohammed, Turkey transferred the trial in absentia of 26 suspects in the Khashoggi case to Saudi Arabia.

mt0: <pad> Kwinyanga yeNkanga, ngaphambi kokuba uRhulumente waseTurkey uRecep Tayyip Erdogan ahambe e-Riyadh ngoLwesibini kwaye aphathwe nguKumkani Mohammed, iTurkey yadlulisela ukuxoxwa kwe-26 abarhanelwa kwicala likaKhashoggi e-Saudi Arabia.</s>

en: Turkey's decision drew anguished protest from lawyers and Khashoggi's fiancée, who insisted Saudi courts couldn't possibly hold a credible trial.
xho: Isigqibo saseTurkey sitsale uqhanqalazo olunxungupheleyo lwamagqwetha kunye nentombi kaKhashoggi, eyanyanzelisa ukuba iinkundla zaseSaudi azinakukwazi ukumisa ityala elinesihlahla.
mt0: <pad> Ukugqiba kweTurkey kwabangela uqhankqalazo olukhulu kwigqwetha leKhashoggi, i-lawyers and Khashoggi's fiancee, who insisted Saudi courts couldn't possibly hold a credible trial.</s>

en: For the loved ones of those locked away, Khashoggi's killing fuels a uniform fear of speaking out.
xho: Kwabo banabantu ababathandayo abavalelwa kude, ukubulawa kukaKhashoggi kunyusa uloyiko olufanayo malinga nokuthetha ngokukhululekileyo.
mt0: <pad> Kwabo bathandayo ababhukudwa, ukubulawa kukaKhashoggi kuqhubela phambili ukutya koko kungathethwa.</s>

en: I want to, many do, but we're scared, said a friend of Prince Salman bin Abdulaziz, who has been detained along with his father since 2018.
xho: “Ndiyafuna, abaninzi bayayenza, kodwa siyoyika,” watsho umhlobo weNkosana uSalman bin Abdulaziz, ovalelwe noyise ukusukela ngo-2018.
mt0: <pad> I want to, many do, but we're scared, said a friend of Prince Salman bin Abdulaziz, who has been detained along with his father since 2018.</s>

en: Everyone knows what happened to Khashoggi.

en: Captured in Turkey and extradited to Morocco, he is serving a 10-year prison term on terrorism charges.

en: Now the former fighter has graduated with 14 other prisoners convicted of terror offenses from a Morocco de-radicalization program that might make them more eligible for an early release.

mt0: <pad> Ngoku i-ex-fighter graduated with 14 other prisoners convicted of terror offenses from a Morocco de-radicalization program that may make them more eligible for an early release.</s>

en: The Associated Press and other media were invited to observe their graduation ceremony Thursday in a prison in Sale near the Moroccan capital, Rabat.

mt0: <pad> The Associated Press and other media were invited to observe their graduation ceremony Thursday in a prison in Sale near the Moroccan capital, Rabat.</s>

en: And to interview some prisoners under monitored and controlled conditions. Prison administration officials picked out three men they said were willing to be interviewed.

en: Officials stipulated that the inmates shouldn't be identified by their full names and that their faces mustn't be shown, citing privacy reasons.
xho: Amagosa amisela ukuba amabanjwa akufunekanga achazwe ngamagama awo apheleleyo kwaye ubuso bawo bungaboniswa, echaza izizathu zokufihlwa kwabo.

en: But prison officials didn't listen to the interviews or intervene to shut down media lines of questioning or inmates' answers.
xho: Kodwa amagosa entolongo akazange amamele udliwano-ndlebe okanye angenelele ukuvala imigca yemithombo yeendaba yemibuzo okanye iimpendulo zamabanjwa.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa abaphathi bejele zange bave ezo interview, okanye bathethelele ukuvala indlela zendaba zokubuza okanye iimpendulo zabantu abaneentlawulelo.</s>

en: The 15 inmates in crisp shirts and trousers stood solemnly for Morocco's national anthem and were handed certificates.

en: Prison officials said the de-radicalization program consisted of three months of classes in prison on religion, law and economics, and that inmates also received training on how to start a business.
xho: Amagosa entolongo athi inkqubo yotshintsho yayibandakanya iinyanga ezintathu zokufundiswa ngonqulo entolongweni, umthetho nezoqoqosho, kwaye amabanjwa nawo afumana uqeqesho ngendlela yokuqalisa ishishini.

en: These most recent graduates were the ninth batch since the program started in 2017.

mt0: <pad> These most recent graduates were the ninth batch since the program began in 2017.</s>

en: Moulay Idriss Agoulmam, the director of social-cultural action and prisoner reintegration at Morocco's prison administration, said the program is entirely voluntary and works with inmates "to change their behavior and improve their life path."
xho: UMoulay Idriss Agoulmam, umlawuli weSocial-Cultural Action and Prisoner Reintergration kwintolongo yaseMorocco, uthe le nkqubo yeyabo bafunayo kwaye isebenza namabanjwa "ukutshintsha indlela yokuziphatha kunye nokuphucula indlela yabo yokuphila."
mt0: <pad> Moulay Idriss Agoulmam, director of social-cultural action and prisoner reintegration at the Morocco's prison administration, said the program is entirely voluntary and works with inmates "to change their behavior and improve their life path."</s>

en: It enables prisoners to form an awareness of the gravity of their mistakes, he said.

en: Graduating from the program doesn't make inmates automatically eligible for early release, but does increase their chances of getting a royal pardon or a reduced sentence.

mt0: <pad> Ukugqiba iprogram ayenzi abarhanelwa bafaneleke ngokuzenzekelayo ukukhululwa kwabo, kodwa kuyanyusa amathuba abo ukuba bafumane uxolo lwamakhulu okanye ixesha labo licuthiwe.</s>

en: That's been the case for just over half the program's 222 graduates so far, the prison administration says.

en: Since 2019, the training has also been offered to women convicted under Morocco's Anti-Terrorism Act.

en: Called "Moussalaha," meaning "reconciliation" in Arabic, the program is offered to prisoners who have demonstrated a readiness to disavow extremism.

mt0: <pad> Ngoku ekumnyadala, iminyaka engama-38 ithi akasekho lo mfanatike wakhe wangaphambili, ebuhlungu ngenxa yokuba engathanda ukubulala non-Muslims.</s>

en: Captured in Turkey and extradited to Morocco, he is serving a 10-year prison term on terrorism charges.
xho: Ubanjelwe eTurkey waza wathunyelwa eMorocco, uthothoza iminyaka elishumi entolongweni ngezityholo zobunqolobi.

en: Now the former fighter has graduated with 14 other prisoners convicted of terror offenses from a Morocco de-radicalization program that might make them more eligible for an early release.
xho: Ngoku lo wayesakuba ngumlwi uphumelele kunye namanye amabanjwa ali-14 agwetywe kulwaphulo-mthetho lwenkqubo yase-Morocco yotshintsho enokuthi ibenze bafaneleke ngakumbi ukukhululwa phambi kwexesha.
mt0: <pad> Ngoku i-ex-fighter graduated with 14 other prisoners convicted of terror offenses from a Morocco de-radicalization program that may make them more eligible for an early release.</s>

en: The Associated Press and other media were invited to observe their graduation ceremony Thursday in a prison in Sale near the Moroccan capital, Rabat.
xho: I-Associated Press kunye namanye amajelo eendaba amenyiwe ukuba abukele umsitho wabo wokuphumelela ngoLwesine kwintolongo eseSale kufutshane nekomkhulu laseMorocco, iRabat.
mt0: <pad> The Associated Press and other media were invited to observe their graduation ceremony Thursday in a prison in Sale near the Moroccan capital, Rabat.</s>

en: And to interview some prisoners under monitored and controlled conditions. Prison administration officials picked out three men they said were willing to be interviewed.
xho: Kwaye enze udliwano-ndlebe namanye amabanjwa phantsi kweemeko ezibekwe esweni nezilawulwayo. Amagosa olawulo lwentolongo akhetha amadoda amathathu athi akulungele ukuba nodliwano-ndlebe.
mt0: <pad> Kwaye ukuxoxa iingxoxo kunye nabanye abarhanelwa kwiimeko ezilawulwa kwaye zilawulwa. Abaphathi bejele ezintathu abathi bazimisele ukuxoxwa.</s>

en: Officials stipulated that the inmates shouldn't be identified by their full names and that their faces mustn't be shown, citing privacy reasons.
xho: Amagosa amisela ukuba amabanjwa akufunekanga achazwe ngamagama awo apheleleyo kwaye ubuso bawo bungaboniswa, echaza izizathu zokufihlwa kwabo.
mt0: <pad> Abasemagunyeni bagqibe ukuba abarhanelwa bangabhaqwa ngegama labo elipheleleyo kwaye abakhoyo babo bangabonakale, besithi zizathu zokhuseleko.</s>

en: But prison officials didn't listen to the interviews or intervene to shut down media lines of questioning or inmates' answers.
xho: Kodwa amagosa entolongo akazange amamele udliwano-ndlebe okanye angenelele ukuvala imigca yemithombo yeendaba yemibuzo okanye iimpendulo zamabanjwa.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa abaphathi bejele zange bave ezo interview, okanye bathethelele ukuvala indlela zendaba zokubuza okanye iimpendulo zabantu abaneentlawulelo.</s>

en: The 15 inmates in crisp shirts and trousers stood solemnly for Morocco's national anthem and were handed certificates.
xho: Amabanjwa ali-15 anxibe iihempe neebhulukhwe ema ngokundilisekileyo ephulaphule umhobe wesizwe waseMorocco kwaye anikwa iziqinisekiso.
mt0: <pad> 15 iinmates, ekwi-shirts neentsimbi ezicacileyo, wema solemnly for the national anthem of Morocco and were handed certificates.</s>

en: Prison officials said the de-radicalization program consisted of three months of classes in prison on religion, law and economics, and that inmates also received training on how to start a business.
xho: Amagosa entolongo athi inkqubo yotshintsho yayibandakanya iinyanga ezintathu zokufundiswa ngonqulo entolongweni, umthetho nezoqoqosho, kwaye amabanjwa nawo afumana uqeqesho ngendlela yokuqalisa ishishini.
mt0: <pad> Abasemagunyeni e-Jail bathi iprogram yokususa uradikalismo yayiquka izifundo ezithatha inyanga ezintathu kwijele ngeenkohliso, umthetho neenkcubeko, kwaye abarhanelwa bafundiswa ukuba baqala ibhizinisi.</s>

en: These most recent graduates were the ninth batch since the program started in 2017.
xho: Aba basanda kuphumelela bebeyibhetshi yethoba ukusukela oko yaqala inkqubo ngo-2017.
mt0: <pad> These most recent graduates were the ninth batch since the program began in 2017.</s>

en: Moulay Idriss Agoulmam, the director of social-cultural action and prisoner reintegration at Morocco's prison administration, said the program is entirely voluntary and works with inmates "to change their behavior and improve their life path."
xho: UMoulay Idriss Agoulmam, umlawuli weSocial-Cultural Action and Prisoner Reintergration kwintolongo yaseMorocco, uthe le nkqubo yeyabo bafunayo kwaye isebenza namabanjwa "ukutshintsha indlela yokuziphatha kunye nokuphucula indlela yabo yokuphila."
mt0: <pad> Moulay Idriss Agoulmam, director of social-cultural action and prisoner reintegration at the Morocco's prison administration, said the program is entirely voluntary and works with inmates "to change their behavior and improve their life path."</s>

en: It enables prisoners to form an awareness of the gravity of their mistakes, he said.
xho: “Ivumela amabanjwa ukuba aqonde ubunzulu beempazamo zawo,” utshilo.
mt0: <pad> It allows prisoners to form an awareness of the gravity of their mistakes, he said.</s>

en: Graduating from the program doesn't make inmates automatically eligible for early release, but does increase their chances of getting a royal pardon or a reduced sentence.
xho: Ukuthweswa isidanga kule nkqubo akuwenzi amabanjwa afanelekele ukukhululwa kwangoko, kodwa konyusa amathuba awo okufumana uxolelo lwasebukhosini okanye isigwebo esincitshisiweyo.
mt0: <pad> Ukugqiba iprogram ayenzi abarhanelwa bafaneleke ngokuzenzekelayo ukukhululwa kwabo, kodwa kuyanyusa amathuba abo ukuba bafumane uxolo lwamakhulu okanye ixesha labo licuthiwe.</s>

en: That's been the case for just over half the program's 222 graduates so far, the prison administration says.
xho: Kube njalo ngaphezu kwesiqingatha sabafundi abaphumeleleyo abangama-222 ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, utshilo abaphathi bentolongo.
mt0: <pad> Iyi nto ethethwa ngaphezu kwe-half ye-222 abagqibileyo ukuba bahlale ejele, ulawulo lwejele lithi.</s>

en: Since 2019, the training has also been offered to women convicted under Morocco's Anti-Terrorism Act.
xho: Ukusukela ngo-2019, olu qeqesho lunikezelwe kwabasetyhini abagwetywe phantsi koMthetho waseMorocco ochasene nobunqolobi.
mt0: <pad> Ukususela ngo-2019, uqeqesho lukwanikezelwa kwakhona kumadoda athethwa ngeMigaqo yoKulwa noTerrorism yaseMorocco.</s>

en: Ten women have graduated so far — all of them since released, including eight with pardons.
xho: Abasetyhini abalishumi baye baphumelela ukuza kuthi ga ngoku - bonke ukusukela oko bakhululwe, kuquka nabasibhozo abaxolelwe.
mt0: <pad> 10 abantu abafazi bagqibe ukufunda - bonke babo baza kukukhululwa, kubandakanya i-8 eyakhululwa.</s>

en: Called "Moussalaha," meaning "reconciliation" in Arabic, the program is offered to prisoners who have demonstrated a readiness to disavow extremism.
xho: Ibizwa ngokuba yi-“Moussalaha,” elithetha “uxolelwaniso” ngesiArabhu, le nkqubo inikezelwa kumabanjwa abonakalise ukulungela ukuchasa iimbono ezibaxiweyo.
mt0: <pad> Igama "Moussalaha," ethetha "ukubuyisana" ngesi-Arabhu, le program inikezelwa kubatyholwa ababonisileyo ukukulungela ukunqanda ubufanasini.</s>

en: Mohsin said he left to fight in Syria in 2012.
xho: UMohsin uthe wemka waya kulwa eSyria ngo-2012.
mt0: <pad> Mohsin said he left to fight in Syria in 2012.</s>

en: A school dropout as a teen, he said he "was virtually illiterate and couldn't discern good from bad."
xho: Njengowayeka isikolo ngethuba wayekwishumi elivisayo, wathi "wayengafundanga kwaye engakwazi ukwahlula okulungileyo kokubi."
mt0: <pad> A teenager, he said he "was virtually illiteracy and couldn't discern good from bad."</s>

en: He said he was radicalized by people who showed him extremist videos "about the divine obligation to battle those who don't follow Islamic principles and to murder non-Muslims."
xho: Wathi watshintshwa ngabantu ababembonisa iividiyo eziyingozi "malunga nembopheleleko yobuthixo yokulwa nabo bangayilandeliyo imigaqo yamaSilamsi kunye nokubulala abangengawo amaSilamsi."
mt0: <pad> Uthe u radicalized ngabantu abambonisa amavidiyo amaxoki "nge- Divine Obligation to battle those who don't follow Islamic principles and to kill non-Muslims."</s>

en: In Syria, "I saw massacres, rapes, and thefts," he said. "I concluded after a time that the fight being conducted in the name of Islam had nothing to do with our religion."
xho: ESyria, “ndibone ukubulawa kwabantu, ukudlwengulwa, nobusela,” watsho. “Emva kwexesha ndagqiba kwelokuba umlo owawuqhutywa egameni lamaSilamsi awunanto yakwenza nonqulo lwethu.
mt0: <pad> "Ndiya kuqonda ukuba umthetho owenziwa phantsi kwegama le-Islam awunandaba nalo mntu, ngoko ke ndagqiba kwelokuba umthetho owenziwa phantsi kwegama le-Islam awunandaba nalo mntu."</s>

en: He escaped to Turkey in 2018 and was detained for a year there before being extradited to Morocco.
xho: Wabalekela eTurkey ngo-2018 kwaye wavalelwa unyaka apho ngaphambi kokuba athunyelwe eMorocco.
mt0: <pad> Ubalekela eTurkey ngo-2018 kwaye wabanjwe iminyaka emibini apho ngaphambi kokuba abuyele eMorocco.</s>

en: He says he has now disavowed extremism.
xho: Uthi ngoku uzichasile iimbono ezibaxiweyo.
mt0: <pad> Uthi uthe ngoku uye waxhasa i-extremism.</s>

en: That period of my life has passed, he said.
xho: “Elo xesha lobomi bam lidlulile,” watsho.
mt0: <pad> Ixesha lam lelo lidlulile, wathi.</s>

en: Numerous Moroccans have traveled to Syria, Iraq and elsewhere to join extremist groups.

en: Morocco has also experienced multiple attacks itself. Five suicide
