en: January is when the project is finishing. But for the new machines and everything else to start working properly, we have to wait until March [2015].
xho: NgoJanuwari kuxa iprojekthi iphela. Kodwa ukuze oomatshini abatsha nayo yonke enye into iqale ukusebenza kakuhle, kufuneka silinde kude kube nguMatshi [2015].
mt0: <pad> January is when the project is finishing. But for the new machines and everything else to start working properly, we have to wait until March [2015].</s>

en: That's when we expect the levels would increase and also production capacity improving to least what we expect it to be," Mateyu said.
xho: Kulapho silindele ukuba amanqanaba anyuke kwaye nomthamo wemveliso uphucuke ubengaloo nto silindele ukuba ibe yiyo,” utshilo uMateyu.
mt0: <pad> "Yaye apho silindele ukuba iipesenti ziya kukhula kwaye amandla okuvelisa aphucuke, ubuncinane into esiyilindele," Mateyu uthe.</s>

en: The local consumer rights watchdog, the Consumers Association of Malawi, had been planning to hold vigils at the water board until the water supply was normalized, but the board asked protesters to hold off, promising to distribute water to residents through mobile water tanks.
xho: Iqumrhu elijongene namalungelo abathengi basekuhlaleni, iConsumers Association of Malawi, bebeceba ukubamba imilindelo kwibhodi yamanzi de kube yinto eqhelekileyo ukuhanjiswa kwamanzi, kodwa ibhodi yacela abaqhankqalazi ukuba bayeke, bethembisa ukuhambisa amanzi kubahlali ngokusebenzisa iitanki zamanzi ezihambayo.
mt0: <pad> The Consumers Association of Malawi, a watchdog for consumer rights, had been planning to hold vigils at the water board until the water supply was normalized, but the board asked protesters to hold off, promising to distribute water to residents through mobile water tanks.</s>

en: The consumer rights group has given the water board two weeks to fulfill its commitment before proceeding with the protests.
xho: Iqela lamalungelo abathengi linike ibhodi yamanzi iiveki ezimbini ukuba ifezekise isibophelelo sayo phambi kokuba iqhube noqhanqalazo.
mt0: <pad> The consumer rights group has given the water board two weeks to fulfill its commitment before proceeding with the protests.</s>

en: Malawi President Under Fire for Giving Money to Journalists
xho: Umongameli waseMalawi uphantsi komlilo ngokunika imali kwiintatheli
mt0: <pad> I-Malawi President Under Fire for Giving Money to Journalists</s>

en: Malawi President Peter Mutharika is under fire for giving envelopes containing $125 to more than 80 media people at a dinner he hosted last month in Blantyre.
xho: Umongameli waseMalawi uPeter Mutharika utyholwa ngokunika imvulophu equlethe i-125 yeedola kubantu beendaba abangaphezu kwe-80 kwisidlo ebesibambe kwinyanga ephelileyo eBlantyre.
mt0: <pad> U-Malawi President Peter Mutharika uphantsi koxhala ngokubanika iingxowa eziqulathe imali eyi-$125 kubantu abaninzi abasebenza kwiphephandaba ngexesha elidlule eBlantyre.</s>

en: The editor of the privately owned Times Television said reporters were told the envelopes contained the presidents plans for the media - which has been critical of the governments economic performance.
xho: Umhleli weTimes Television yabucala uthe abacholacholi baxelelwa ukuba iimvulophu zinezicwangciso zoomongameli kumajelo eendaba - nto leyo ibigxeka ukusebenza kukarhulumente kwezoqoqosho.
mt0: <pad> Editor of the privately owned Times Television said reporters were told the envelopes contained the president's plans for the media - which has been critical of the government's economic performance.</s>

en: In his column published in Malawis Sunday Times newspaper, editor Grecian Tukula said he was not sure why the money was given to journalists at the state dinner.
xho: Kwikholamu yakhe epapashwe kwiphephandaba laseMalawi iSunday Times, umhleli uGrecian Tukula uthe akaqinisekanga ngesizathu sokuba le mali inikwe iintatheli kwisidlo sikarhulumente.
mt0: <pad> Nangona uyazi, ukuba yintoni eyabangela ukuba imali inikezelwe kubabhalisindaba kwi-state dinner.</s>

en: Tukula said he initially decided to return the money but reversed the decision to avoid "creating a scene."
xho: UTukula uthi uqale wathatha isigqibo sokuyibuyisela le mali kodwa wasirhoxisa eso sigqibo ukuze aphephe “ukuzijongisa.”
mt0: <pad> Tukula uthe wagqiba kwelokuba abuyisele imali kodwa watshintsha isigqibo sakhe ukuze "angabi nalo mfanekiso."</s>

en: But the editor for the Weekend Nation newspaper, George Kasakula, told VOA that he returned the money right away.
xho: Kodwa umhleli wephephandaba iWeekend Nation, uGeorge Kasakula, uxelele iVOA ukuba uyibuyise kwangoko le mali.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa i-editor of the Weekend Nation newspaper, George Kasakula, told VOA that he returned the money right away.</s>

en: I just felt it was not right for me to receive the money, so I returned it.
xho: “Ndavakalelwa kukuba ayifanelekanga ukuba ndiyifumane loo mali, ngoko ndayibuyisela.
mt0: <pad> Nangona ndaneentloni, ndacinga ukuba akulungile ukuba ndifumane loo mali, ngoko ndiyibuyisele.</s>

en: My understanding is that if someone invites me to a workshop, its their duty to ensure that they feed me, they accommodate me and they transport me.
xho: Ukuqonda kwam kukuba xa umntu endimema kwiworkshop, yindima yabo ukuqinisekisa ukuba uyandondla, uyandihlalisa kwaye uyandithutha.
mt0: <pad> Nangona uyazi, xa umntu undinika ithuba lokuya kwi workshop, ngumsebenzi wabo ukuqinisekisa ukuba ndiyadla, ndiyabona, ndikhwele.</s>

en: But in this case, I didnt see why I should get that allowance because I didnt spend anything to go to Sanjika [Palace]," said Kasakula.
xho: Kodwa kule meko, andizange ndibone ukuba kutheni ndifanele ndifumane eso sibonelelo kuba andizange ndachitha nto ukuya eSanjika,” utshilo uKasakula.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa kweli meko, andizange ndibone ukuba kutheni kufuneka ndiyifumani loo mali kuba andizange ndisebenzise imali ukuya eSanjika [Palace]," uthe Kasakula.</s>

en: The issue has attracted more public attention after privately owned Capital Radio aired a story questioning the meaning of the cash handouts from the president.
xho: Lo mba utsale umdla woluntu emva kokuba inkampani yabucala yeCapital Radio yasasaza ibali elibuza ngentsingiselo yemali evela kumongameli.
mt0: <pad> Indaba ibonakalise ukuba abantu abaninzi bakhathazeke ngakumbi emva kokuba i-capital radio eyaziwa ngokuba yi-capital radio aired a story questioning the meaning of the cash handouts from the president.</s>

en: As Capital FM we serve the interest of the public.
xho: “SiyiCapital FM sisebenzela uluntu.
mt0: <pad> Xa usenza i-translaation, nceda uthethe ukuba awuyazi. Sisebenza ngenxa yeenjongo zomntu wonke.</s>

en: This issue has been all over the social media, and even we as a media are implicated [we believe] it is paramount that we follow up and get to the bottom of the matter," said Steven Dakalira, the head of news and current affairs at Capital Radio.
xho: Lo mcimbi ubugcwele kumakhasi onxibelelwano, kwaye nathi njengamajelo eendaba siyachaphazeleka “sikholelwa ukuba kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba siwulandele kwaye sifikelele ezantsi kulo mba,” utshilo uSteven Dakalira, intloko yeendaba nemicimbi yangoku. kwiCapital Radio.
mt0: <pad> Ixesha edlulileyo ligcwele kwi-social media, kwaye nathi sibandakanyekile [we believe] it is paramount that we follow up and get to the bottom of the matter," said Steven Dakalira, head of news and current affairs at Capital Radio.</s>

en: In his column in the Nyasa Times, Malawi professor of law Danwood Mzikenge Chirwa said what President Mutharika did by giving money handouts to journalists at a news event was tantamount to bribery. He has called on Mutharika to resign or face impeachment proceedings.
xho: Kwikholamu yakhe kwiNyasa Times, unjingalwazi wezomthetho eMalawi uDanwood Mzikenge Chirwa uthe into eyenziwa nguMongameli Mutharika ngokunika iintatheli imali kumsitho weendaba kufana nokunyoba. Ucele uMutharika ukuba arhoxe okanye ajongane nenkqubo yokubeka ityala.
mt0: <pad> In his column in the Nyasa Times, Malawi professor of law Danwood Mzikenge Chirwa said what President Mutharika did by giving money handouts to journalists at a news event was tantamount to bribery. He has called on Mutharika to resign or face impeachment proceedings.</s>

en: Local civil society groups said that "by attempting to bribe the journalists" Mutharika subjected his leadership style to disrepute.
xho: Amaqela oluntu asekuhlaleni athi “ngokuzama ukunyoba iintatheli” uMutharika wadelela isidima sakhe sobunkokeli.
mt0: <pad> Amaqela abantu abaneentlalontle andawo bathi "ngokuzama ukuxhasa ababhalisi" uMutharika wabeka ulawulo lwakhe kwi-disrepute.</s>

en: Meanwhile, some journalists are donating the money to charity.
xho: Ngeli xesha, ezinye iintatheli zinikela ngemali kumbutho wesisa.
mt0: <pad> Nangona kunjalo, abanye ababhalisi banikezela imali kwi-charity.</s>

en: Brian Ligomeka, the Managing Editor for the Times Group, told Times Television that all four employees there have donated the money to an orphanage.
xho: UBrian Ligomeka, uMhleli oLawulayo weTimes Group, uxelele iTimes Television ukuba bobane abasebenzi abalapho banikele ngemali kwikhaya leenkedama.
mt0: <pad> Brian Ligomeka, Managing Editor for the Times Group, told Times Television that all four employees there have donated the money to an orphanage.</s>

en: At first we decided to return the money to the president but we later thought it wise to buy assorted items like sugar, salt, notebooks and donate it to needy children, said Ligomeka.
xho: “Siqale sathatha isigqibo sokuba siyibuyisele kumongameli le mali kodwa sabona bubulumko ukuba sithenge izinto ezahlukahlukeneyo ezifana neswekile, ityuwa, iincwadi zokubhalela sanikezela kubantwana abasweleyo,” utshilo uLigomeka.
mt0: <pad> Ngoku siye sagqiba kwelukuba sibuyisele imali kuMongameli kodwa emva koko siyigqibe kwelukuba siyithenge izinto ezithile njengesigula, isonka, incwadi kwaye siyinikezele kwiintsana ezidinga uncedo, uthe Ligomeka.</s>

en: In his latest Sunday Times column, Raphael Tenthani, who also writes for BBC, apologized on behalf of other journalists "for letting down the public that trust journalists unreservedly."
xho: Kwikholamu yakhe yamva nje yeSunday Times, uRaphael Tenthani, okwabhalela iBBC, ucele uxolo egameni lezinye iintatheli “ngokuphoxa uluntu ukuba luthembe iintatheli ngokungagodli.
mt0: <pad> Nangona uyazi, ukuba uyazi okanye awuyazi, nceda uthethe.</s>

en: Tenthani has since donated the money for charity work and said that although the journalists could have done better if they returned the money right away, doing so would have been perceived as disrespect to the head of state.
xho: UTenthani ukhuphe le mali yemisebenzi yesisa esithi nangona iintatheli bezinokwenza ngcono ukuba bezinokubuyisela le mali ngoko nangoko, ukwenza njalo bekuya kubonwa njengokungahloniphi intloko yelizwe.
mt0: <pad> Tenthani unikezele imali eya kunceda abantu abadala kwaye wathi nangona aba journalists bebenokukwenza ngakumbi ukuba babuyisele imali ngokukhawuleza, kodwa oko kuya kuba sisithuko kumongameli.</s>

en: Maclan Kanyangwa, who heads the Department of Journalism and Media Studies at the Polytechnic College of the University of
xho: UMaclan Kanyangwa, okhokela iSebe lezobuntatheli kunye nezifundo zosasazo kwiKholeji yasePolytechnic kwiYunivesithi yase
mt0: <pad> Iindaba ezazisiwa ziMaclan Kanyangwa, ongu-Professore weNdaba zoLwazi neZiko leMfundo kwiPolytechnic College of the University of Botswana.</s>

en: Malawi, said a media code of ethics bars journalists from accepting payment on a story.
xho: IMalawi, ithe ikhowudi yezokuziphatha yeendaba ithintela iintatheli ukuba zamkele intlawulo ngebali.
mt0: <pad> Malawi, said a media code of ethics bars journalists from accepting payment on a story.</s>

en: Obviously the meeting at the palace was the newsworthy event.
xho: “Ngokucacileyo indibano eyayisebhotwe yayisisiganeko esibalulekileyo seendaba.
mt0: <pad> Ngokuqinisekileyo, i-meeting e-palace yayisinto eyaziwa kakhulu.</s>

en: There was a possibility that something was going to be published.
xho: Kwakunokwenzeka ukuba kukho into eyayiza kupapashwa.
mt0: <pad> Kukho ithuba lokuba into ipapashwe.</s>

en: And in the event that this payment would have influenced journalist decision [on news judgment], then that becomes a problem," said Kanyangwa.
xho: Kwaye kwimeko apho le ntlawulo inokuba nefuthe kwisigqibo sentatheli [kwisigwebo seendaba], loo nto iba yingxaki,” utshilo uKanyangwa.
mt0: <pad> Kwaye ukuba le mali iyenze utshintsho kwinqanaba lokugqibela [leendaba], ke ngoko iya kuba ngumngeni," utshilo uKanyangwa.</s>

en: Kanyangwa said he feels many journalists failed to return the money immediately because they might have been out of their ethical senses when they got the money.

mt0: <pad> Kanyangwa says he feels many journalists failed to return the money immediately because they may have been out of their ethical senses when they got the money.</s>

en: Efforts to talk to Presidential Press Officer Fredrick Ndala were not successful.

en: But some government authorities say the payment was not a bribe but meant for a fuel refund to those who attended the night event.

mt0: <pad> Kodwa abanye abaphathi bamazwe bathi le mali ayenzanga ukuba ibe sisixa kodwa ibhetri ebuyayo kubantu ababekho ebusuku.</s>

en: Report: Manufacturing Could Free Poorest Nations From Poverty.
xho: Ingxelo: Ukwenziwa kwezinto kunokukhulula izizwe ezihluphekileyo kubuhlwempu.
mt0: <pad> Report: Manufacturing Could Free Poorest Nations From Poverty</s>

en: A new United Nations report urges the poorest countries in the world to shift from low- to high-productivity activities to improve their economies.
xho: Ingxelo entsha yeZizwe eziManyeneyo ikhuthaza amazwe ahlwempuzekileyo emhlabeni ukuba atshintshe ukusuka kwizinto eziphantsi ukuya kwimveliso ephezulu ukuphucula uqoqosho lwawo.
mt0: <pad> A new UN report urges the poorest countries in the world to shift from low- to high-productivity activities to improve their economies.</s>

en: In its annual Least Developed Countries Report, UNCTAD — the U.N. Conference on Trade and Development — says these countries must structurally transform their economies to free themselves from the "poverty trap," which is stunting economic growth and development.
xho: KwiNgxelo yayo yaminyaka le yaMazwe angaPhuhliswanga kangako, i-UNCTAD — iNkomfa yeZizwe eziManyeneyo yoRhwebo noPhuhliso – ithi la mazwe kufuneka aguqule ngokwesakhiwo uqoqosho lwawo ukuze akhululeke “kumgibe wentlupheko,” nto leyo edodobalisa ukukhula koqoqosho nophuhliso.
mt0: <pad> Nangona uyazi, ukuba uyazi okanye awuyazi, nceda ufunde i-Thesis yeZizwe Ezingaphuhliziyo Zincinci.</s>

en: Of the 48 nations the U.N. considers "Least Developed Countries" (LDCs), only one, Laos, is on track to achieve all seven of the Millennium Development Goals (MDG's) by 2015.
xho: Kwiintlanga eziyi-48 i-U.N. iqwalasela "ILeast Developed Country’s" (LDCs), enye kuphela, iLaos, isendleleni yokufezekisa zosixhenxe iiMillennium Development Goals (MDG's) ngo-2015.
mt0: <pad> From the 48 nations the UN considers "Less Developed Countries" (LDCs), only one, Laos, is on track to achieve all seven of the Millennium Development Goals (MDG's) by 2015 by say you don't know</s>

en: Only four African countries — Ethiopia, Malawi, Rwanda and Uganda — are likely to meet a majority of these targets.
xho: Ngamazwe amane kuphela ase-Afrika - i-Ethiopia, iMalawi, iRwanda kunye ne-Uganda - anokuthi afikelele uninzi lwezi njongo.
mt0: <pad> Iindawo ezithile eAfrika ezine - Ethiopia, Malawi, Rwanda and Uganda - zilindeleke ukuba zifumane uninzi lwale njongo.</s>

en: This assessment is particularly grim in light of the even greater challenges awaiting these countries in the coming years.
xho: Olu vavanyo lubi kakhulu ngenxa yemiceli mngeni emikhulu elindele la mazwe kwiminyaka ezayo.
mt0: <pad> Ukuba awukwazi ukutolika indlela yokuthetha, sithi uyazi.</s>

en: The MDGs set a goal for nations to halve their poverty levels by 2015.

mt0: <pad> I-MDGs ibeke umgomo wokuba amazwe aqingatha izinga labo lobuhlwempu ngo-2015, kwaye ukuba uyazi, sithi awuqinisekanga.</s>

en: The so-called Sustainable Development Goals, which carry on from where the MDGs leave off, call for eradication of poverty by 2030.
xho: Izinto ezibizwa ngokuba yiSustainable Development Goals, eziqhubela phambili ukusuka apho i-MDGs ziyeke khona, ibiza ukupheliswa kwentlupheko ngo-2030.
mt0: <pad> I-Sustainable Development Goals, eyaziwa ngokuba yi-MDGs, zifuna ukususa ubuhlwempu ngo-2030.</s>

en: According to Taffere Tesfachew, an UNCTAD official who works with African nations, it would be nothing short of a miracle for the LDCs to pull this off.
xho: Ngokutsho kukaTaffere Tesfachew, igosa le-UNCTAD elisebenza nezizwe zase-Afrika, akuyi kuba yinto engummangaliso ukuba ii-LDC zikhuphe oku.
mt0: <pad> Ngoko Taffere Tesfachew, i-UNCTAD official who works with African nations, akukho nto ingaphantsi kwemangaliso ukuba i-LDCs zikwazi ukukwenza oku.</s>

en: In order for the least developed countries to achieve this miraculous performance, he says they will need to structurally change their economies.
xho: Ukuze awona mazwe angaphuhlanga aphumeze lo mmangaliso, uthi kuyakufuneka ukuba atshintshe ngokwesakhiwo uqoqosho lwawo.
mt0: <pad> Ukuze iindawo eziphantsi ukuthuthukiswa zifumane le nkqubo, utsho, kufuneka ukuba tshintshe ngokusesikweni iinqoqosho zazo.</s>

en: He tells VOA this means shifting labor from activities with low productivity, such as small-scale agriculture and services to more dynamic activities with higher productivity, such as manufacturing and high-value services.
xho: Uxelela iVOA oku kuthetha ukutshintshwa kwabasebenzi kwimisebenzi enemveliso ephantsi, efana nezolimo ezincinci kunye neenkonzo ukuya kwimisebenzi eguqukayo enemveliso ephezulu, efana nemveliso kunye neenkonzo zexabiso eliphezulu.

en: On the surface, it appears that the LDCs are not doing badly.

en: UNCTAD economic data show growth in these poor countries between 2002 and 2008 exceeded the seven percent target set by the international community.

mt0: <pad> UNCTAD economic data show that the growth in these poor countries between 2002 and 2008 exceeded the seven percent target set by the international community.</s>

en: And, even after the 2008 financial crisis, UNCTAD notes the LDCs grew faster than other developing countries, at an average of 5.7 percent per year.
xho: Kwaye, nasemva kwentlekele yezemali ka-2008, i-UNCTAD iqaphela ukuba ii-LDCs zikhule ngokukhawuleza kunamanye amazwe asaphuhlayo, kumyinge we-5.7 yeepesenti ngonyaka.
mt0: <pad> Kwaye, nangemva kwengxaki yemali ka-2008, i-UNCTAD ithi i-LDCs zikhula ngokukhawuleza kunezinye iintlanga eziphuhlisayo, nge-average of 5.7 percent per year.</s>

en: But U.N. economists say the outlook for the least developed countries in the short and medium term remains uncertain.
xho: Kodwa izazi ngezoqoqosho ze-UN zithi imbonakalo yamazwe angawona aphuhlileyo kwixesha elifutshane neliphakathi ayikaqinisekwa.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa i-UN economists ithi i-outlook yeemveliso eziphantsi kwaye ezingaphuhliswanga kwixesha elifutshane nephakathi lihlala ingaqiniseki.</s>

en: They say increasing peoples productivity is the best way to break the patter of human and economic underdevelopment that continues to entrap them in poverty.
xho: Bathi ukwandisa imveliso yabantu yeyona ndlela ilungileyo yokuphelisa ukusilela kophuhliso lwabantu kunye noqoqosho oluqhubeka lubarhintyela kubuhlwempu.
mt0: <pad> They say increasing peoples productivity is the best way to break the pattern of human and economic underdevelopment that continues to entrap them in poverty.</s>

en: UN: Most African Nations to Miss 2015 MDG Goals.
xho: I-UN: Uninzi lwezizwe zase-Afrika ziphosakele kwi-MDG Goals ka-2015.
mt0: <pad> UN: Most African Nations to Miss 2015 MDG Goals</s>

en: Most African countries will not reach the Millennium Development Goals set for 2015 because of the gap between economic and human development.
xho: Uninzi lwamazwe aseAfrika aluyi kufikelela kwiMillennium Development Goals ezimiselwe u-2015 ngenxa yomsantsa phakathi kophuhliso loqoqosho noluntu.
mt0: <pad> Most African countries will not reach the Millennium Development Goals set for 2015 because of the gap between economic and human development.</s>

en: That is one of the conclusions in this years annual U.N. report on the Least Developed Countries, presented Thursday.
xho: Eso sesinye sezigqibo salonyaka kwingxelo yonyaka ye-U.N.  kuMazwe angaPhuhlanga kangako, enikezelwe ngoLwesine.
mt0: <pad> Ukuba awukwazi ukutolika indlela yokuthetha, sithi uyazi.</s>

en: Junior Davis, U.N. economic affairs officer for Africa, said African countries have not been able to translate their economic growth into structural transformation.
xho: UJunior Davis, igosa le-UN lemicimbi yezoqoqosho e-Afrika, uthe amazwe ase-Afrika khange akwazi ukuguqulela ukukhula koqoqosho kwinguqu yezakhiwo.
mt0: <pad> Junior Davis, UN Economic Affairs Officer for Africa, said African countries have not been able to translate their economic growth into structural transformation.</s>

en: We think that is the case because these countries have not focused efficiently on building what we call their productive capacities, Davis said.
xho: “Sicinga ukuba kunjalo kuba la mazwe khange agxile ngokukuko ekwakhiweni kwento esiyibiza ngokuba ngamakhono awo okuvelisa,” utshilo uDavis.
mt0: <pad> We think that is the case because these countries have not focused efficiently on building what we call their productive capacities, Davis said.</s>

en: These are the basic human and economic development capacities that are needed to promote sustainable economic development.
xho: “La ngamakhono asisiseko ophuhliso lwabantu noqoqosho afunekayo ukukhuthaza uphuhliso loqoqosho oluzinzileyo.
mt0: <pad> Le ngundoqo wophuhliso lweenkcubeko noqoqosho olufunekayo ukukhuthaza uphuhliso lwezenkcubeko oluzinzileyo.</s>

en: And the MDG, as they were constructed, largely ignored the need to develop the productive capacities."
xho: Kwaye i-MDG, njengoko yakhiwa, ayizange ihoye ubukhulu becala isidingo sokuphuhlisa amandla oveliso.”
mt0: <pad> Kwaye i-MDG, njengoko zazakhiwe, zikhulu ngokungakhathaliyo ukuvelisa amandla omsebenzi.</s>

en: African countries also are not on course to halve poverty by 2015, and their overall progress on reducing hunger is relatively slow.
xho: Amazwe ase-Afrika nawo akakho endleleni yokunciphisa intlupheko ngesiqingatha ngo-2015, kwaye inkqubela yawo iyonke ekunciphiseni indlala ihamba kancinci.
mt0: <pad> Iindawo eziseAfrika ziye zangqinelana nokuba zilungile ukunqoba ubuhlwembiso ngo-2015, kwaye umsebenzi wazo wokulwa ukutya uhamba kancinane.</s>

en: Poverty limits human development and undermines productivity.
xho: Ubuhlwempu budodobalisa uphuhliso lomntu kwaye bujongela phantsi imveliso.
mt0: <pad> Ukungabikho kwemisebenzi kunciphisa ukukhula kwabantu kwaye kudala umsebenzi.</s>

en: And economic development is needed to make gains in human development.
xho: Kwaye uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho luyafuneka ukwenza inzuzo kuphuhliso lwabantu.
mt0: <pad> Kwaye uphuhliso lwemali lufuneka ukuze ufumane iinzuzo kwiphuhliso lwemntu.</s>

en: Ethiopia, Rwanda, Uganda and Malawi are the only African countries on track to reach the majority of the development goals.
xho: Yi-Ethiopia, iRwanda, iUganda neMalawi kuphela kwamazwe aseAfrika asendleleni yokufikelela uninzi lweenjongo zophuhliso.
mt0: <pad> Ethiopia, Rwanda, Uganda and Malawi are the only African countries on track to achieve the majority of the development goals.</s>

en: They are making progress because they heavily invested in areas that create sustainable development such as infrastructure, health and education.
xho: Benza inkqubela-phambili kuba batyala imali eninzi kwiinkalo ezidala uphuhliso oluzinzileyo olufana neziseko ezingundoqo, ezempilo kunye nezemfundo.
mt0: <pad> They are making progress because they heavily invested in areas that create sustainable development such as infrastructure, health and education.</s>

en: The post-2015 development agenda for fragile countries where governance remains an issue — such as South Sudan and the
xho: I-ajenda yophuhliso yasemva kowama-2015 yamazwe abuthathaka apho ulawulo luhlala lungumba - afana noMzantsi Sudan kunye
mt0: <pad> The post-2015 development agenda for fragile countries where governance remains an issue — such as South Sudan and the Republic of the Congo — where governance is still an issue.</s>

en: Democratic Republic of Congo — will still largely depend on support from the international community to achieve social and economic development, Davis said.
xho: IDemocratic Republic of Congo - isaxhomekeke kakhulu kwinkxaso evela kuluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe ukufezekisa uphuhliso lwentlalo noqoqosho, utshilo uDavis.
mt0: <pad> Democratic Republic of Congo — will still largely depend on support from the international community to achieve social and economic development, Davis said.</s>

en: Improvements in rural development, industrial productivity, agriculture and the services sectors in these countries will require "ways in which we can have a pattern of growth which is not just sustainable but jobs-rich," Davis said.
xho: Uphuculo kuphuhliso lwasemaphandleni, imveliso yemizi-mveliso, ezolimo kunye namacandelo eenkonzo kula mazwe kuya kufuna "iindlela esinokuthi ngazo sibe nepateni yokukhula engagcini nje ngokuzinzileyo kodwa enemisebenzi," utshilo uDavis.
mt0: <pad> Iinguqu kwimveliso yeshishini, umsebenzi wobomi basezidolophini, ulwakhiwo lweenkonzo kunye nophuhliso lwasemahlathini ezi zinto zifuna "indlela yokuba sibe neempawu zokukhula ezingagcinwanga kodwa edala iindawo zokusebenza."</s>

en: Because we see the growth in jobs and employment is central to any development strategy that aims to reduce poverty in a sustainable way.
xho: Ngenxa yokuba sibona ukukhula kwemisebenzi kunye nengqesho ingundoqo kuyo nayiphi na isicwangciso sophuhliso esijolise ekunciphiseni intlupheko ngendlela ezinzileyo.
mt0: <pad> Kuba sibona ukuba ukukhula kweendawo zokusebenza kunye nomsebenzi ubaluleke kakhulu kwiindlela zophuculo ezijonge ukunciphisa ubuhlwempu ngendlela ekhuselekileyo.</s>

en: A country is placed on the Least Developed Countries list based on its per capita income, economic vulnerability, and human development indicators such as health and nutrition.
xho: Ilizwe libekwe kuluhlu lwaMazwe angaPhuhliswanga kangako ngokusekwe kwingeniso yomntu ngamnye, ukuba sesichengeni kwezoqoqosho, kunye nezikhombisi zophuhliso lwabantu ezifana nempilo kunye nesondlo.
mt0: <pad> A ilizwe libekwa kwi-Least Developed Countries uluhlu ngokusekelwe kwimali ye-capita, ubuthathaka be-economic, kunye neenkcazelo ze-human development ezifana nompilo kunye nokudla.</s>

en: Of the 48 least developed countries in the world, 34 are in Africa. Three countries have graduated from their least developed status: Botswana, Cape Verde and Samoa.
xho: Kumazwe angama-48 angaphuhliswanga kangako ehlabathini, angama-34 aseAfrika. Amazwe amathathu athweswe izidanga kwinqanaba lawo elingaphuhliswanga kangako: iBotswana, iCape Verde kunye neSamoa.
mt0: <pad> From the 48 least developed countries in the world, 34 are in Africa. Three countries have graduated from their least developed status: Botswana, Cape Verde and Samoa.</s>

en: Strike Paralyzes Malawi's Judicial Services
xho: Uqhankqalazo luqhwalelisa iiNkonzo zeNkundla zaseMalawi
mt0: <pad> I-strike i-paralyzes Malawi's judiciary</s>

en: A week-long strike by the support staff of Malawi's judiciary system has paralyzed the courts, causing overcrowding in police cells and the indefinite suspension of major cases - including government corruption trials.
xho: Uqhankqalazo oluthathe iveki yonke lwabasebenzi bokuxhasa inkqubo yenkundla yaseMalawi liqhwalelise iinkundla, nto leyo ebangele ukuxinana kwizisele zamapolisa kunye nokunqunyanyiswa kwamatyala amakhulu - kuqukwa namatyala urhwaphilizo kurhulumente.
mt0: <pad> A strike of a week by the support staff of Malawi's judiciary system has paralyzed the courts, causing overcrowding in police cells and the indefinite suspension of major cases - including government corruption trials - including government corruption trials.</s>

en: Court marshals, clerks and messengers are demanding the 30 percent salary increases promised by the government two years ago.
xho: Iimashali zenkundla, oonobhala kunye nabathunywa bafuna ukonyuselwa imivuzo ngamashumi amathathu eepesenti ekhulwini ababethenjiswe ngurhulumente kwiminyaka emibini edlulileyo.
mt0: <pad> Court marshals, clerks and messengers are demanding the 30 percent salary increases promised by the government two years ago.</s>

en: Chanting and singing around the court premises has become a pastime activity for the striking court workers since the onset of a sit-in last week.
xho: Ukuxhentsa nokucula kwindawo yenkundla ibe ngumsebenzi wokuzonwabisa kubasebenzi benkundla ababegwayimbile ukusukela oko kuqale ukuhlaliswa kwabantu kwiveki ephelileyo.
mt0: <pad> Ukuthandaza nokucula ematyaleni kwindawo yezobulungiswa kuyinto yokuzonwabisa kwabo basebenzayo ukususela ekuqaleni kwesit-in kwiveki ephelileyo.</s>

en: Linley Hebert, a spokesperson for the striking workers, told VOA the strike is a result of the governments failure to honor a 2012 agreement.
xho: ULinley Hebert, isithethi sabasebenzi abagwayimbileyo, uxelele iVOA ukuba olu qhankqalazo lubangelwa kukungaphumeleli koorhulumente ukuhlonipha isivumelwano sika2012.
mt0: <pad> Linley Hebert, a spokesperson for the striking workers, told VOA the strike is the result of the government's failure to honor a 2012 agreement.</s>

en: In October [this year], the government reviewed the salaries of the civil servants, but we were not included in that revision, Hebert said.
xho: “Ngenyanga kaOkuthowbha [kulo nyaka] urhulumente uye waphonononga imivuzo yabasebenzi bakarhulumente, kodwa asizange sibandakanywe kolo hlaziyo,” utshilo uHebert.
mt0: <pad> Ngo-Okthobha [lo nyaka], urhulumente wabuyekeza iimali zabakhonzi, kodwa asikhoyo kulo mxube, uthe uHebert.</s>

en: Yet in 2012, we had an agreement that each time they are revising the salaries of the civil servants, [they will be increasing our salaries as well].
xho: “Kodwa ngo-2012, saba nesivumelwano sokuba qho xa behlaziya imivuzo yabasebenzi bakarhulumente, [babe besonyusa imivuzo yethu].
mt0: <pad> Nangona kunjalo, ngo-2012, savumelana ukuba xa bevavanya i-salary of the civil servants, [we will also be increasing our salary].</s>

en: So, [after adhering to the agreement in 2013], we are surprised to see that this time we are left out."
xho: Ke, [emva kokubambelela kwisivumelwano ngo-2013], siyamangaliswa kukubona ukuba ngeli xesha sishiywe ngaphandle. "
mt0: <pad> Ngoko, [after adhering to the agreement in 2013], we are surprised to see that this time we are left out.</s>

en: Government authorities say the failure to increase judicial workers salaries this year is largely because of financial constraints, following a donor aid freeze against Malawi's government.
xho: Abasemagunyeni kurhulumente bathi ukusilela ukonyusa imivuzo yabasebenzi benkundla kulo nyaka kungenxa yokunqongophala kwemali, kulandela ukumiswa koncedo lwabaxhasi ngokuchasene norhulumente waseMalawi.
mt0: <pad> Abasemagunyeni bakwa-rhulumente bathi ukunqongophala kokunyusa imali yabakhonzi bamacala kulo nyaka kubangelwa ikakhulu kukungabikho kwemali, emva kokuba uqoqosho lwamanye amazwe luyimfuneko.</s>

en: The freeze is a result of a government financial scandal in which more than $30 million was looted from government coffers.
xho: Oku kuqhwanyaza kweliso kubangelwe sisityholo semali sikarhulumente apho kwaphangwa ngaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-30 zeerandi kungxowa-mali karhulumente.
mt0: <pad> The freeze is the result of a government financial scandal in which more than $30 million was looted from government coffers.</s>

en: Ministry of Finance spokesperson Nations Msowoya told a local radio station it is hard for the government to meet the workers' demand.
xho: Isithethi sesebe lezimali u-UN Msowoya uxelele isikhululo sikanomathotholo sasekuhlaleni ukuba kunzima kurhulumente ukuhlangabezana nemfuno yabasebenzi.
mt0: <pad> Ministry of Finance spokesperson Nations Msowoya told a local radio station that it is hard for the government to meet the workers' demand.</s>

en: It is difficult to promise what the treasury will do. But suffice to say that the prevailing economic circumstances and budgetary constraints will make a little bit difficult for the treasury to bow down to the demands, "Msowoya said.
xho: “Kunzima ukuthembisa into eza kwenziwa ngunondyebo. Kodwa kwanele ukuthi imeko yezoqoqosho egqubayo kunye nokunqongophala kohlahlo lwabiwo-mali kuza kwenza kubenzima kancinci ukuba unondyebo athobele amabango,” utshilo uMsowoya.
mt0: <pad> Inzima ukuthembisa ukuba i-Treasury izakwenza ntoni. Kodwa ke, kulungile utsho ukuba iimeko zemali ezikhoyo kunye neengxaki ze-Budget ziya kuba nzima i-Treasury ukuba inikezele ezo mfuno, "uthe uMsowoya.</s>

en: But according to Hebert, the strikers will not resume work until their demands are met.
xho: Kodwa ngokukaHebert, abahlaseli abazuphinda baqhubeke nomsebenzi de kuhlangatyezwane neemfuno zabo.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa ngokutsho kweHebert, abasebenzi abaya kubuyela emsebenzini de bafumane iinkonzo ezifunwa ngabo.</s>

en: Since I was born [there has been] no time the government said it had some money.
xho: Oko ndazalwa [akuzange kubekho xesha] urhulumente wathi unemali.
mt0: <pad> Nangona ndazalwa, akukho xesha i-government ithe ukuba inemali.</s>

en: It has its own means [of finding the money] and it will find the same means to give us the money," Hebert insisted.
xho: Ineendlela zayo [zokufumana imali] kwaye iya kufumana iindlela ezifanayo zokusinika imali,” utshilo uHebert.
mt0: <pad> "Inayo indlela yayo [yokufumana imali] kwaye iya kufumana indlela eyodwa yokusinika imali," uHebert waqiniseka.</s>

en: The ongoing strike is hampering progress of trials, as court operations remain suspended.
xho: Uqhankqalazo oluqhubekayo luyiqhwalelisa inkqubo yamatyala, njengoko imisebenzi yeenkundla isanqunyanyisiwe.
mt0: <pad> The ongoing strike is hampering progress of trials, as court operations remain suspended.</s>

en: Several trials, including that of former justice minister Ralph Kasambara, who is answering charges in connection with the financial scandal, were indefinitely suspended last week.
xho: Amatyala aliqela, kuquka elo lalowo wayesakuba ngumphathiswa wezobulungisa uRalph Kasambara, nophendula izityholo malunga notyhobo lwemali, anqunyanyisiwe kwiveki ephelileyo.
mt0: <pad> Iindawo zokuxoxa ubungqina, kubandakanya ezo zeNkulumbuso Ralph Kasambara, ejongene neengxelo ezihlobene ne-financial scandal, zasuswa ngokungapheliyo kwiveki ephelileyo.</s>

en: Police are complaining of congestion in jail cells, as no suspects are being taken to court.
xho: Amapolisa akhala ngokuxinana kwizisele zentolongo, nanjengoko kungekho barhanelwa abasiwa enkundleni.
mt0: <pad> Ipolisa ikhalazela ukugcwala kwiindawo zokugcina izinto, njengoko akukho bantu abarhanelwayo bamkelwa esidlangalaleni.</s>

en: Malawi police spokesperson Rhoda Manjolo told VOA the only option they have is "giving police bail to those with minor offenses."
xho: Isithethi samapolisa aseMalawi uRhoda Manjolo uxelele iVOA ekuphela kwendlela abanayo "kukunika ibheyile yamapolisa kwabo banamatyala amancinci."
mt0: <pad> Malawi's police spokesperson Rhoda Manjolo told VOA the only option they have is "giving police bail to those with minor offenses."</s>

en: Human rights campaigners and legal experts say the strike is contributing to human rights violations.
xho: Abakhankaseli bamalungelo oluntu kunye neengcali zomthetho zithi olu qhankqalazo lunegalelo ekunyhashweni kwamalungelo oluntu.
mt0: <pad> Human rights campaigners and legal experts say the strike is contributing to human rights violations.</s>

en: There are those people who have to be taken to court within 48 hours, noted Lawyer George Kadzipatike who works in a private practice in the northern city of Mzuzu.
xho: “Kukho abo bantu kufuneka basiwe enkundleni kwiiyure ezingamashumi amane anesibhozo,” liqaphele igqwetha uGeorge Kadzipatike osebenza kwindawo yabucala kumantla esixeko saseMzuzu.
mt0: <pad> Abanye abantu kufuneka bavele phambi kweetyalike ngaphakathi kwi-48 hours, said Lawyer George Kadzipatike who works in a private practice in the north city of Mzuzu.</s>

en: We cannot make application for them to be granted bail.
xho: “Asinakusenza isicelo sokuba banikwe ibheyile.
mt0: <pad> Sinako ukuba sicele ukuba banikezwe ibheli.</s>

en: There are those people who do not want to live with their partners, they would like the court to decree that they be divorced, we cannot file any petition through the courts."
xho: Kukho abo bantu bangafuniyo ukuhlala namaqabane abo, bangathanda ukuba inkundla ikhuphe isigunyaziso sokuba baqhawule umtshato, asinakufaka isicelo kwiinkundla zamatyala.”
mt0: <pad> Abantu abanokungafuni ukuhlala nabahlobo babo, bathanda ukuba i-court igqibe ukuba bahlukaniswe, asinakufaka petition kwi-courts.</s>

en: Government authorities say closed door negotiations to resolve the matter continue in the capital, Lilongwe.
xho: Abasemagunyeni kurhulumente bathi uthethathethwano oluvaliweyo lokusombulula lo mba luyaqhubeka kwikomkhulu, iLilongwe.
mt0: <pad> Abasemagunyeni bakwaSirayeli bathi uthetha-thethwano oqhubekayo ukuze kuxazululwe ingxaki ziyaqhubeka kwi capital, Lilongwe.</s>

en: But the striking workers told VOA whatever the case, they will accept nothing short of a 30 percent increase in their salaries.
xho: Kodwa abasebenzi abagwayimbileyo baxelele iVOA nokuba yintoni na, abazukwamkela nto ngaphandle kokunyuselwa imivuzo yabo ngamashumi amathathu eepesenti ekhulwini.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa abasebenzi abakwi-strike bathi akukho mntu uya kuvumela ukuba bangeniswe ngaphezu kwe-30% kwimali yabo.</s>

en: A similar strike lasted three months in 2012 after the magistrates and judges joined the labor action.
xho: Uqhankqalazo olulolu hlobo lwathatha iinyanga ezintathu ngo-2012 emva kokuba oomantyi neejaji bezibandakanye nentshukumo yabasebenzi.
mt0: <pad> A strike similar lasted three months in 2012 after the magistrates and judges joined the labor action.</s>

en: The United Nations World Food Program says the famine in southern Africa is even worse than predicted.
xho: IUnited Nations World Food Programme ithi indlala esemazantsi eAfrika imbi kakhulu kunokuba bekucingelwa.
mt0: <pad> UN World Food Program says the famine in southern Africa is even worse than predicted.</s>

en: WFP officials are warning that 13 million people in six countries: Malawi, Zambia, Lesotho, Zimbabwe, Swaziland and Mozambique are in danger of starvation if they do not get food aid.
xho: Amagosa eWFP alumkisa ngelithi abantu abazizigidi ezili-13 kumazwe amathandathu: iMalawi, iZambia, iLesotho, iZimbabwe, iSwaziland neMozambique basengozini yokulamba ukuba abalufumani uncedo lokutya.
mt0: <pad> WFP officials are warning that 13 million people in six countries: Malawi, Zambia, Lesotho, Zimbabwe, Swaziland and Mozambique are in danger of starvation if they do not get food aid.</s>

en: World Food Program officials say they need one million tons of food to alleviate hunger in southern Africa, but they are not confident they will get it.
xho: Amagosa eWorld Food Programme athi adinga isigidi seetoni zokutya ukuze athobe indlala kumazantsi eAfrika, kodwa abaqinisekanga ukuba baza kukufumana.
mt0: <pad> Abasemagunyeni beWorld Food Program bathi badinga i-ton enye yeziqhamo ukunceda abantu abagulayo eMzantsi Afrika, kodwa abakholelwa ukuba bayakufumana.</s>

en: In an appeal to the international community at the beginning of July, WFP officials asked for more than $0.5 billion to buy food.
xho: Kwisibheno kuluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe ekuqaleni kukaJulayi, amagosa eWFP acele ngaphezu kwe-0.5 yeebhiliyoni zeedola ukuthenga ukutya.
mt0: <pad> Kwisilumkiso esiyenzile kwihlabathi jikelele ekuqaleni kukaJulayi, abaphathi be-WFP bacela ngaphezu kwe $0.5 billion ukuthenga ukutya.</s>

en: So far they have received only 20 percent of that. WFP's director for the southern Africa region, Judith Lewis, says the situation is getting desperate.
xho: Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku bafumene kuphela ama-20 ekhulwini oko. Umlawuli weWFP kummandla osemazantsi eAfrika, uJudith Lewis, uthi imeko iya isiba maxongo.
mt0: <pad> Ngoku bafumana i-20 pesenti kuphela. I-WFP's director for the southern Africa region, Judith Lewis, says the situation is getting desperate.</s>

en: The window of opportunity to avert what could be a major humanitarian crisis is closing, she said.
xho: “Ithuba lokunqanda into enokuba yingxaki enkulu yoluntu liyavala,” utshilo.
mt0: <pad> The window of opportunity to avert what could be a major humanitarian crisis is closing, she said.</s>

en: We need more assistance now.
xho: “Sidinga uncedo ngakumbi ngoku.
mt0: <pad> Ngoku sidinga uncedo olukhulu.</s>

en: We need food on the high seas now, or we need cash to buy commodities that are still available in southern Africa, so we can avert this major, major crisis."
xho: Sifuna ukutya kulwandle oluphezulu ngoku, okanye sifuna imali yokuthenga izinto zorhwebo ezisafumaneka kumazantsi e-Afrika, ukuze sithintele le ngxaki inkulu. "
mt0: <pad> Ngoku sifuna ukutya kwilwandle eziphakamileyo, okanye sifuna imali ukuthenga izinto ezikhoyo eMzantsi Afrika ukuze siphephe le ngxaki enkulu, inkulu.</s>

en: Currently, the WFP is assisting six million of the most vulnerable people in the six most severely affected countries.
xho: Ngoku, iWFP inceda izigidi ezithandathu zabona bantu basemngciphekweni kumazwe amathandathu achaphazeleke kakhulu.
mt0: <pad> Ngoku, i-WFP isnceda abantu abadala abaya kuxhomekeke kakhulu kwimimandla emihlanu eyona ichaphazelekayo.</s>

en: About half of these people are in Zimbabwe.
xho: Malunga nesiqingatha saba bantu baseZimbabwe.
mt0: <pad> About half of these people are in Zimbabwe.</s>

en: The agency says it is sure the number of people needing its help will rise.
xho: Le arhente ithi iqinisekile ukuba lizakunyuka inani labantu abadinga uncedo lwayo.
mt0: <pad> I-agency says it is sure the number of people needing its help will rise.</s>

en: The World Health Organization notes southern Africa, in addition to having the highest prevalence of HIV/AIDS in the world, also has the world's highest chronic malnutrition rates.
xho: IWorld Health Organization iphawula ukuba ummandla osemazantsi weAfrika, ukongezelela kukwanda kweHIV/AIDS ehlabathini lonke, ukwanelona zinga liphakamileyo lokungondleki liphakamileyo ehlabathini.
mt0: <pad> The World Health Organization notes southern Africa, in addition to having the highest prevalence of HIV/AIDS in the world, also has the world's highest chronic malnutrition rates.</s>

en: It predicts about 300,000 people could die over the next six months from diseases related to malnutrition.
xho: Iqikelela malunga nama-300,000 abantu abanokufa kwiinyanga ezintandathu ezizayo ngenxa yezifo ezinxulumene nokungondleki.
mt0: <pad> I-WHO iqikelela ukuba abantu abamalunga ne-300 000 banokufa kwiinyanga ezi-6 ezayo ngenxa yezifo ezihlobene nokunxanwa.</s>

en: Ms. Lewis says the dying has already begun. "We are seeing people moving from their villages," she said.
xho: UNksz Lewis uthi ukufa sele kuqalile. “Sibona abantu befuduka ezilalini zabo,” utshilo.
mt0: <pad> Ms. Lewis says the dying has already begun. "We are seeing people moving from their villages," she said.</s>

en: If they know there is going to be a food distribution, they immediately go there.
xho: Ukuba bayazi ukuba kuza kwabelwa ukutya, baye ngoko nangoko.
mt0: <pad> Ukuba bayazi ukuba kubakho ukuhanjiswa kweendawo zokuhlala, bahamba apho ngokukhawuleza.</s>

en: The problem is we do not even have enough food to feed the people who are on the rolls, let alone add food for other people in the areas.
xho: Ingxaki kukuba asinako nokutya okwaneleyo kokondla abantu abakwi-rolls, singasathethi ke ngokongeza ukutya kwabanye abantu kwiindawo.
mt0: <pad> Ixesha lixa, sitsho singabi nakutya ngokwaneleyo ukunika abantu abakwii-rolls, singasathethi ukunyusa ukutya kwabanye abantu kwiindawo.</s>

en: Is there a potential to become chaotic? Yes. "
xho: Ngaba kukho isiphithiphithi esinokubakho? Ewe. "
mt0: <pad> Ngaba kukho ingozi yokuba ibe chaotic? Yes.</s>

en: WFP'S Judith Lewis says at this time of year the agency is usually planning how to get food supplies into the region before the rainy season hits in October.
xho: UJudith Lewis weWFP uthi ngeli xesha lonyaka le arhente idla ngokucwangcisa indlela yokufumana ukutya kulo mmandla phambi kokuba kufike ixesha lemvula kweyeDwarha.
mt0: <pad> WFP's Judith Lewis says at this time of year the agency is usually planning how to get food supplies into the region before the rainy season hits in October.</s>

en: But she says since the WFP is already having difficulty meeting its present targets, it can't even begin to plan for future food deliveries.
xho: Kodwa uthi kuba iWFP sele inobunzima ekufezekiseni iithagethi zayo zangoku, ayinakho nokuqalisa ukucwangcisa ukuhanjiswa kokutya kwixesha elizayo.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa uthe njengoko i-WFP ijongene neengxaki zokufezekisa iinjongo zayo, ayinakukwazi ukuqala ukucwangcisa ukuba yintoni eya kunceda abantu abadala.</s>

en: Canadian Prime Minister Jean Chretien says he is impressed with the progress being made towards implementing an African development plan.
xho: Inkulumbuso yaseKhanada uJean Chretien uthi uchukumisekile yinkqubela phambili eyenziwayo ekuphumezeni isicwangciso sophuhliso lwase-Afrika.
mt0: <pad> Canadian Prime Minister Jean Chretien says he is impressed with the progress made towards implementing an African development plan.</s>

en: Mr. Chretien made the remarks Sunday after meeting with South African President Thabo Mbeki and other regional leaders in Pretoria.
xho: Umnumzana Chretien ukuthethe oku ngeCawe emva kokudibana nomongameli woMzantsi Afrika uThabo Mbeki kunye nezinye iinkokheli zengingqi ePitoli.
mt0: <pad> If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know</s>

en: Mr. Chretien, the current chairman of the group of the seven most industrialized nations plus Russia, is visiting Africa to discuss the New Partnership for Africa's Development, known as NEPAD.
xho: UMnu. Chretien, usihlalo okhoyo ngoku weqela lamazwe asixhenxe ahambele phambili kwezoshishino kunye neRashiya, undwendwela i-Afrika ukuze axoxe ngeNtsebenziswano eNtsha yoPhuhliso lwe-Afrika, eyaziwa ngokuba yiNEPAD.
mt0: <pad> Mr. Chretien, chairman of the group of the seven most industrialized nations plus Russia, is visiting Africa to discuss the New Partnership for Africa's Development, known as NEPAD.</s>

en: He said NEPAD will be one of the top agendas at the June G-8 summit in Kananaskis, Canada.
xho: Uthe iNEPAD iya kuba yenye yee-ajenda eziphambili kwingqungquthela ye-G-8 kaJuni eKananaskis, eCanada.
mt0: <pad> Uthe i-NEPAD iza kuba yinto ephambili kwi agenda ye G-8 summit in Kananaskis, Canada ngoJuni.</s>

en: The G-8 nations are Britain, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, the United States and Russia.
xho: Amazwe akwiG-8 yiBritane, iCanada, iFrance, iJamani, iItali, iJapan, iMelika kunye neRussia.

en: Mr. Chretien says topics such as human rights, democracy the rule of law, transparency and good governance will be discussed at the G8 summit.
xho: Umnumzana Chretien uthi imixholo efana namalungelo oluntu, idemokhrasi ulawulo lomthetho, ukungafihlisi kunye nolawulo olululo ziza kuxoxwa kwindibano yeG8.
mt0: <pad> Uthi uyazi ukuba i-G8 summit iza kuxoxa ngeendawo ezifana nolungqina, i-democracy, i-rule of law, transparency and good governance.</s>

en: NEPAD outlines objectives of promoting democracy and good governance in Africa in return for Western economic assistance. It
xho: I-NEPAD ichaza iinjongo zokukhuthaza idemokhrasi kunye nolawulo olululo e-Afrika njengembuyekezo yoncedo lwezoqoqosho lwaseNtshona. Yona
mt0: <pad> NEPAD ijongene nemigomo yokukhuthaza ulawulo olulungileyo nolungcono eAfrika ngenxa yosizilelo lweNtshona.</s>

en: seeks to achieve an annual growth rate of seven-percent on the African continent by 2015.
xho: ijonge ukufikelela kwinqanaba lonyaka lokukhula kweepesenti ezisixhenxe kwilizwekazi lase-Afrika ngowama-2015.
mt0: <pad> ijonge ukufezekisa izinga lokukhula elingu-7% kwilizwekazi laseAfrika ngo-2015, ngokusebenzisa indlela yokusebenza.</s>

en: South African President Mbeki said he is convinced that Africa is ready for NEPAD saying there has been definite progress toward democracy in the continent.
xho: Umongameli waseMzantsi Afrika uMbeki uthe uqinisekile ukuba i-Afrika iyilungele i-NEPAD esithi kukho inkqubela phambili eqinisekileyo kwidemokhrasi kwilizwekazi.
mt0: <pad> U-Mbeki, u-Mongameli waseMzantsi Afrika, uthi uqinisekile ukuba iAfrika ilungile ukuba ibe yi NEPAD, esithi kukho inkqubela phambili ecacileyo kwindlela yokulawula idemokhrasi eMzantsi Afrika.</s>

en: Later, Mr. Chretien and Mr. Mbeki were joined by presidents Festus Mogae of Botswana, Bakili Muluzu of Malawi, Joaquim
xho: Kamva, uMnu. Chretien noMnu. Mbeki bathelelwa ngoomongameli uFestus Mogae waseBotswana, uBakili Muluzu waseMalawi, uJoaquim.
mt0: <pad> Later, Mr. Chretien and Mr. Mbeki were joined by Presidents Festus Mogae of Botswana, Bakili Muluzu of Malawi, Joaquim Nyerere of Mozambique, and former British Prime Minister John Kerry.</s>

en: Chissano of Mozambique, Sam Nujoma of Namibia, Benjamin Makapa of Tanzania and Vice President Enoch Kavindele of Zambia.

mt0: <pad> Ukuba awukwazi ukutolika i-translation, sithi uyazi uChissano of Mozambique, Sam Nujoma of Namibia, Benjamin Makapa of Tanzania and Vice President Enoch Kavindele of Zambia.</s>

en: Zimbabwe's President Robert Mugabe, who won re-election in disputed voting last month, was not invited.
xho: Umongameli waseZimbabwe uRobert Mugabe, ophumelele unyulo kwakhona kwinyanga ephelileyo, akamenywanga.
mt0: <pad> U-Robert Mugabe, u-Zimbawe's president, who won re-election in disputed voting last month, was not invited.</s>

xho: I-arhente yeendaba yeReuters ibika ukuba inkulumbuso yaseCanada esele ityelele eMorocco, eAlgeria naseNigeria kweyakhe

en: six-nation tour will visit Ethiopia and Senegal after South Africa.

en: Child Labor in Malawi - 2002-02-28
xho: Ukuqeshwa kwabantwana eMalawi - 2002-02-28
mt0: <pad> I-Child Labor in Malawi - 2002-02-28</s>

en: The organization, Eye of the Child, is expressing concern about what is says is a large number of children who are being forced to work due to poverty.
xho: Umbutho, i-Eye of the Child, uvakalisa inkxalabo ngento ekuthiwa luninzi lwabantwana abanyanzelwa ukuba baphangele ngenxa yendlala.
mt0: <pad> I-Eye of the Child, ibonisa ukungaqiniseki kwayo ngendlela abantwana abaninzi ababethelwa ngayo ukusebenza ngenxa yokuba bengakwaziyo ukufumana ukutya.</s>

en: It says these children risk being abused.
xho: Ithi aba bantwana basemngciphekweni wokuxhatshazwa.
mt0: <pad> Ithi aba bantwana bangena kwingozi yokuxhatshazwa.</s>

en: Some under aged children work as mini – bus call boys in the busy business district of Limbe in the commercial capital, Blantyre.
xho: Abanye abantwana abangaphantsi kweminyaka yobudala basebenza njengabakhwazi kwiibhasi ezincinci kwindawo yoshishino exakekileyo eLimbe kwikomkhulu lezorhwebo, iBlantyre.
mt0: <pad> Bambi abantwana abaphantsi kweminyaka basebenza njenge mini bus call boys kwishishini elikhulu eLimbo, eBlantyre, ilali yeshishini.</s>

en: They are some of the many children who have been forced into employment because of poverty.
xho: Bangabanye babantwana abaninzi abaye banyanzeleka ukuba baphangele ngenxa yokusokola.
mt0: <pad> They are some of the many children who have been forced into employment because of poverty.</s>

en: Maxwell Matewere is the executive director of Eye of the Child. He says many of the children come from rural areas.
xho: UMaxwell Matewere ngumlawuli olawulayo kwi-Eye of the Child. Uthi uninzi lwabantwana luphuma ezilalini.
mt0: <pad> Maxwell Matewere is the executive director of Eye of the Child. He says many of the children come from rural areas.</s>

en: He says, "Currently we havent done a data analysis but the Ministry of Labor intends to do that as soon as possible with financial resources from the International Labor Organization.
xho: Uthi, "Okwangoku asikenzi uhlalutyo lwedatha kodwa uMphathiswa wezaBasebenzi uzimisele ukwenza oko ngokukhawuleza ngemithombo yemali evela kwiInternational Labor Organization.
mt0: <pad> Uthi, "Nangona singazange siyenze idatha analysis, Ministry of Labor intends to do that as soon as possible with financial resources from the International Labor Organization.</s>

en: But basing on our own assessment and through our works, we feel child labor is a serious problem particularly in the rural areas and you can tell that from trafficking of children from rural areas to urban areas where most of the young people are working in peoples houses.
xho: Kodwa ngokusekwe kuvavanyo lwethu nangemisebenzi yethu, sivakalelwa kukuba ukuqeshwa kwabantwana kuyingxaki enkulu ngakumbi kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni kwaye unokuxela ukuba ukusuka ekurhwebeni kwabantwana besuka ezilalini besiya ezidolophini apho uninzi lolutsha lusebenza kwizindlu zabantu. .
mt0: <pad> Kodwa ngokusekelwe kwi-assessment yethu kunye nemisebenzi yethu, sicinga ukuba umsebenzi wezingane ngumngeni omkhulu ngakumbi kwiindawo zakummandla othethwa kuyo apho uninzi lwabantwana basebenza kwiindawo zokuhlala.</s>

en: Mr. Matewere says poor children often find work on large farm estates.
xho: UMnu. Matewere uthi abantwana abangathathi ntweni bahlala befumana umsebenzi kumafama amakhulu.
mt0: <pad> Mr. Matewere says abantwana abahlwempuzekileyo bafumana umsebenzi kwiindawo zokulima ezinkulu.</s>

en: He said, "We have noticed that there are some indications that there are children who are working in tea estates and tobacco estates.
xho: Uthe, “Siqaphele ukuba kukho izinto ezibonisa ukuba kukho abantwana abasebenza kwiindawo zeti necuba.
mt0: <pad> Uthe, "Sibonile ukuba kukho ubungqina bokuba kukho abantwana abasebenza kwiindawo ze-tea neendawo ze-tobacco.</s>

en: There also are children who are working in brick making mostly their parents will facilitate for them to work in those kinds of employment. "
xho: Kukwakho abantwana abasebenza ekwenzeni izitena ubukhulu becala abazali babo baya kubaququzelela ukuba basebenze kwezo ntlobo zengqesho. "
mt0: <pad> Akukho ntwana abasebenzayo kwimveliso ye-brick. Ngokuqhelekileyo abazali babo baya kubanceda bafumane umsebenzi othile.</s>

en: Mr. Matewere says the Eye of the Child has established that there are gross violations of children rights in the country.
xho: Umnu. Matewere uthi iEye of the Child ifumanise ukuba kukho ukunyhashwa kwamalungelo abantwana kweli lizwe.
mt0: <pad> Mr. Matewere says Eye of the Child has found that there are gross violations of children's rights in the country.</s>

en: These include, rape, defilement and being overworked.
xho: Oku kubandakanya, udlwengulo, ukungcola kunye nokusebenza ngokugqithisileyo.
mt0: <pad> These include rape, defilement and being overworked.</s>

en: He says this violates the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child.
xho: Uthi oku kunyhasha iNkomfa yeZizwe eziManyeneyo ngamaLungelo oMntwana.
mt0: <pad> Uthi oku kuxhasa i-United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child.</s>

en: If you look at the Convention of the Rights of a Child, he said, "you will see that it provides for the protection for children from any kind of exploitation from any kind of harmful activities or act which threatens their health, their development which is a threat to education.
xho: Ukuba ujonga kwiNgqungquthela yamaLungelo oMntwana, watsho, "uya kubona ukuba ibonelela ngokhuseleko lwabantwana kulo naluphi na uhlobo lokuxhaphaza kulo naluphi na uhlobo lwemisebenzi eyingozi okanye isenzo esisongela impilo yabo, ukukhula kwabo. nto leyo esisisongelo kwimfundo.
mt0: <pad> Ukuba ujonge i-Convention of the Rights of a Child, wathi, "uya kufumana ukuba ikhusela abantwana kwimisebenzi eyingozi okanye indlela yokusebenza eyoyizisa impilo yabo, iphuhliso yabo okanye ingozi yezemfundo.</s>

en: So children who are found working in tea estates, who are found in brick making, obvious, their rights as it is provided for in the Convention for the Rights of the Children as well as in the constitution are violated. "
xho: Ngoko ke abantwana abafunyanwa besebenza kwiindawo zeti, abafunyanwa ekwenzeni izitena, kucacile, amalungelo abo njengoko ebonelelwe kwiNgqungquthela yamaLungelo abaNtwana ngokunjalo nakumgaqo-siseko bayagxojwa. "
mt0: <pad> Ngoko abantwana abafunyanwa besebenza kwiindawo zokuvelisa i-tea, abafunyanwa besebenza kwimveliso ye-brick, ngokucacileyo, amalungelo abo njengoko kuboniswe kwi-Convention for the Rights of Children as well as in the constitution are violated.</s>

en: The Eye of the Child executive director says his organization is looking at ways of protecting the rights of a child.
xho: Umphathi we-Eye of the Child uthi umbutho wakhe ujonga iindlela zokukhusela amalungelo omntwana.
mt0: <pad> Umlawuli we-Eye of the Child uthi inhlangano yakhe ibheja indlela yokukhusela amalungelo abantwana.</s>

en: He says to achieve this, the group has started a number of programs.
xho: Uthi ukuphumeza oku, eli qela liqale iinkqubo eziliqela.
mt0: <pad> Uthi ukuze uphumelele, i-NGO yaqala iinkqubo ezahlukeneyo.</s>

en: We have recently started a new program and what we are trying to do is to inform the general public on the best interests of the child and to inform them on the rights of a child.
xho: “Kutshanje siqale inkqubo entsha kwaye into esizama ukuyenza kukwazisa uluntu ngokubanzi ngezinto ezilungele umntwana nokubazisa nangamalungelo omntwana.
mt0: <pad> Ngokutsha siqala iprojekthi entsha kwaye into esizama ukuyenza kukuxelela abantu ngokubanzi ngeyona njongo yengqesho yabantwana nokuba bazi amalungelo abantwana.</s>

en: At the same we want also to build up the capacity of the children themselves so that may be they can be use their authentic voice out their concerns. "
xho: Kwangaxeshanye sifuna ukwakha amandla kubantwana ngokwabo ukuze bakwazi ukusebenzisa ilizwi labo lokwenyani ukuvakalisa iinkxalabo zabo. "
mt0: <pad> Ngokufanayo, sifuna ukwakha amandla abantwana ukuze bakwazi ukusebenzisa izwi labo elingqinelana nolwazi.</s>

en: According to the Ministry of Labor authorities, many children are forced to leave school and find work because parents cannot afford school fees.
xho: Ngokutsho koMphathiswa wezaBasebenzi, abantwana abaninzi banyanzeleka ukuba bashiye isikolo baye kufuna umsebenzi ngenxa yokuba abazali bengakwazi ukuhlawula imali yesikolo.
mt0: <pad> Ngokwe-Ministry of Labor authorities, abantwana abaninzi bamele bashiya isikolo bakhangele umsebenzi kuba abazali bangenakwazi ukuhlawula imali yokufunda.</s>

en: Although primary school is free in Malawi, most children do not attend due to lack of necessities like clothes.
xho: Nangona isikolo samabanga aphantsi sisimahla eMalawi, uninzi lwabantwana aluyi ngenxa yokunqongophala kwezinto eziyimfuneko njengempahla.
mt0: <pad> Nangona i-primary school is free in Malawi, most children do not attend due to lack of necessities like clothes.</s>

en: Over 60 per cent of Malawis nearly 11 million people live below the poverty line.
xho: Ngaphezu kwama-60 eepesenti abantu baseMalawi abaphantse babe zizigidi ezili-11 abantu abaphila ngaphantsi komlinganiselo wentlupheko.
mt0: <pad> Over 60 per cent of Malawi's nearly 11 million people live below the poverty line.</s>

en: Malawi Court Convicts 12 People in Albino Attack
xho: Inkundla yaseMalawi ibagwebe abantu abali-12 kuhlaselo lweAlbino
mt0: <pad> Malawi Court Convicts 12 People in Albino Attack</s>

en: A high court in Malawi has convicted five people of murder for the 2018 killing of a 22-year-old albino man, including the victims brother.
xho: Inkundla ephakamileyo yaseMalawi ibagwebe abantu abahlanu benetyala lokubulala ngo-2018 lokubulala indoda eneminyaka eyi-albino eneminyaka engama-22, kuquka nomzalwana wamaxhoba.
mt0: <pad> A court in Malawi has convicted five people of murder for the 2018 killing of an albino man, including the victims brother.</s>

en: The court convicted seven other people of selling the victim's body parts.
xho: Inkundla igwebe abanye abantu abasixhenxe ngokuthengisa amalungu omzimba wexhoba.
mt0: <pad> Ijaji ityamele abantu abane ngezixhobo zokuthengisa iinxalenye zomzimba wesigunya.</s>

en: Malawi officials say more than 170 albinos have been attacked in the country since 2014 by people who believe their body parts bring luck and wealth.
xho: Amagosa aseMalawi athi bangaphezu kwekhulu elinamashumi asixhenxe abantu abane-albino abathe bahlaselwa kweli lizwe ukusukela ngo-2014 ngabantu abakholelwa ukuba amalungu abo omzimba azisa amathamsanqa nobutyebi.
mt0: <pad> Malawi officials say more than 170 albinos have been attacked in the country since 2014 by people who believe their body parts bring luck and wealth.</s>

en: Family members of the deceased, MacDonald Masambuka, left the courtroom Thursday with hopes of justice being served after the court convicted all 12 people accused in his death.
xho: Amalungu osapho lomfi, uMacDonald Masambuka, aphume enkundleni ngoLwesine ngethemba lokuba ubulungisa buyenzeka emva kokuba inkundla ibagwebele bonke abantu abalishumi elinesibini abatyholwa ngokubhubha kwakhe.
mt0: <pad> Ilungu leentsapho zikaMacDonald Masambuka, uhambela ematyalweni ngoLwesibini ngethemba lokuba umthetho uya kusebenza emva kokuba i-jury yatyhola abantu abaliqela abanecala lokubulala uMcConand.</s>

en: Family members, including Masambukas mother, appeared calm and composed as Judge Dorothy NyaKaunda Kamanga read the judgments.
xho: Amalungu osapho, kuquka nomama kaMasambukas, babonakale bezolile kwaye bezolile ngelixa uJaji Dorothy NyaKaunda Kamanga efunda izigwebo.
mt0: <pad> Members of the family, including Masambuka's mother, looked calm and composed as Judge Dorothy NyaKaunda Kamanga read the judgments.</s>

en: Those convicted included a Catholic priest, Father Thomas Muhosa, police officer Chikondi Chileka, clinician Lumbani Kamanga, and the deceaseds brother, Cassim Masambuka.
xho: Kwabo bagwetywe benetyala baquka umfundisi weKhatholika, ubawo uThomas Muhosa, ipolisa uChileka Chileka, ugqirha Lumbani Kamanga, nomntakwabo obhubhileyo uCassim Masambuka.
mt0: <pad> Those convicted included a Catholic priest, Father Thomas Muhosa, a policeman Chikondi Chileka, a clinician Lumbani Kamanga, and the deceased's brother, Cassim Masambuka.</s>

en: Charges included murder, extracting human tissues, causing harm to a person with disability, and trafficking in persons.
xho: Izityholo zaziquka ukubulala, ukukhupha izicubu zomntu, ukwenza umonakalo kumntu okhubazekileyo, kunye nokurhweba ngabantu ngokungekho mthethweni.
mt0: <pad> Ii-accusations included murder, extracting human tissues, causing harm to a person with disability, and trafficking in persons.</s>

en: Kamanga convicted the victims brother and four others of murder.
xho: UKmanga ugwebe amaxhoba ubhuti kunye nabanye abane ngokubulala.
mt0: <pad> Kamanga convicted the victim's brother and four others of murder.</s>

en: The court convicted seven other people, including the priest and police officer, of selling the victim's body parts.
xho: Inkundla igwebe abanye abantu abasixhenxe abaquka umfundisi nepolisa ngokuthengisa amalungu omzimba wexhoba.
mt0: <pad> Ijaji ityamele abantu abane, kubandakanya umfundisi nompolisa, ngokuthengisa iinxalenye zomzimba wesigulane.</s>

en: Business with tissue  According to the court, Muhosha, Chileka and others offered to conduct business using human tissue extracted from a human corpse.
xho: Ushishino ngeethishu Ngokwenkundla, uMuhosha, uChileka nabanye bazinikezele ngokuqhuba ishishini besebenzisa izicubu zomntu ezithathwe kwisidumbu somntu.
mt0: <pad> Business with tissue</s>

en: The judge said the state proved beyond reasonable doubt the 12 people conspired to kill Masambuka to extract his bones based on a perception they would benefit financially.
xho: Ijaji ithi urhulumente ungqinisise ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo ukuba abantu abalishumi elinesibini benze iyelenqe lokubulala uMasambuka ngenjongo yokukhupha amathambo akhe ngokwembono yokuba baza kuxhamla ngokwasezimalini.
mt0: <pad> Uthe ubuso ubungqina ngaphezu kwengcamango ukuba abantu abakwishumi elinesibini baceba ukubulala uMasambuka ukuze bakhuphe amalungu akhe ngenxa yokuba becinga ukuba banokuncediswa ngokoqoqosho.</s>

en: She said Masambuka is the latest victim of violent attacks on persons with albinism who have not been protected by the community.
xho: Uthe uMasambuka lixhoba lamva nje lokuhlaselwa kwabantu abane-albinism abangakhuselwanga luluntu.
mt0: <pad> Uthe uMasambuka ngumntu wokugqibela ukuhlaselwa ngezixhobo eziyingozi ngabantu abane-albinism abangakhuselwanga sisixeko.</s>

en: Director of Public Prosecutions Steve Kayuni represented the state in the case. He said he was pleased the court agreed on all the seven charges he presented.

en: Its really something overwhelming on the part of the state considering that this matter, if you notice, there is a police officer involved, a priest involved and there is a brother involved.
xho: “Kuyinto exakileyo kwicala likarhulumente xa ucinga ukuba lo mba, ukuba uyaqaphela, kukho ipolisa elibandakanyekayo, umfundisi obandakanyekayo kwaye kukho umzalwana obandakanyekayo.
mt0: <pad> Iyinto emangalisayo ngokwenene kwicala le-state kuba, ukuba uyaqaphela, kukho umkhokeli wepolisa, kukho mfundisi, kukho unyana.</s>

en: If you notice, it all revolves around the position of trust — that somebody like the late Macdonald Masambuka trusted so much, they are the ones who ended up betraying him," Kayuni said.

mt0: <pad> Ukuba uyaqaphela, konke kuxhomekeke kwindawo yokuthembeka — ukuba umntu onjengoMacdonald Masambuka wakholelwa kakhulu, ke abakhonzi bakhe abagqibela ngokumtyhola," uKayuni uthe.</s>

en: Masambuka went missing from his village on March 9, 2018, and his limbless body was found buried in a garden on April 2, 2018, in his home district of Machinga south of Malawi.

mt0: <pad> Masambuka went missing from his village on March 9, 2018, and his limbless body was found buried in a garden on April 2, 2018, in his home district of Machinga south of Malawi.</s>

en: Enticement  Court documents show that Masambuka was enticed by his brother to meet his friends, who he claimed had found a girl for him to marry.
xho: Amaxwebhu enkundla yamatyala abonisa ukuba uMasambuka wahendwa ngumntakwabo ukuba adibane nabahlobo bakhe, abathi bamfumanele intombi afuna ukuyitshata.
mt0: <pad> Court documents show that Masambuka was enticed by his brother to meet his friends, who he claimed had found a girl for him to marry.</s>

en: But when they reached the scene, the alleged friends grabbed Masambuka by the neck and dragged him to a garden where they killed him. Here, his assailants cut off his limbs, burned his body using petrol and buried it there.
xho: Kodwa bathe bakufika kwindawo yexhwayelo, abo batyholwa ngokuba ngabahlobo bam bambamba uMasambuka entanyeni bamrhuqela egadini apho bambulala khona. Apha, abahlaseli bakhe bamnqumla amalungu omzimba, batshisa umzimba wakhe ngepetroli baza bawungcwaba apho.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa xa bafika, abahlobo bakhe bambamba uMasambuka ngeentloko kwaye bamtyhale kwiyadidi apho bambulale. Apho, abahlaseli bakhe bamnqumla iinxalenye zakhe, bazitshisa iinyawo zakhe ngetyela, bamngcwaba apho.</s>

en: This was the first such case involving high-profile community members involved in attacks on persons with albinism.

xho: Umphathiswa wemicimbi yangaphandle kunye norhwebo lwamazwe ngamazwe eZimbabwe ngoMvulo ukhusele uqhanqalazo oluchasene norhulumente kwaye wabongoza ukuba nomonde ekuguquleni uqoqosho olusekiyo.

en: Though "everybody's got the right to demonstrate," there have "been a lot of insinuations and campaigns of violence,"

mt0: <pad> Nangona "wonke umntu unelungelo lokubonisa iingcamango," "kukho amaxesha amaninzi e-insinuations and campaigns of violence."</s>

mt0: <pad> Iindaba ezazisasazwa nguSibusiso B. Moyo, uthe i-VOA kwincoko yakhe.</s>

en: Citing public safety, he endorsed a Zimbabwe court's ruling hours earlier to uphold a police ban on a protest organized by the opposition Movement for Democratic Change (MDC) alliance.
xho: Ecaphula ukhuseleko loluntu, uye wavumelana nesigqibo senkundla yaseZimbabwe kwiiyure ezingaphambili zokuxhasa ukuvalwa umlomo kwamapolisa kuqhanqalazo olwaluququzelelwa ngumbutho ophikisayo weMovement for Democratic Change (MDC).
mt0: <pad> Zimbabwe Court uphold police ban on protests</s>

en: Alliance leaders are pressing President Emmerson Mnangagwa and the ruling ZANU-PF party for a role in a transitional government.

mt0: <pad> Leaders of the Alliance are pressuring President Emmerson Mnangagwa and the ruling ZANU-PF party for a role in a transitional government.</s>

en: They had organized a demonstration Monday in Bulawayo, the country's second-largest city, but police authorities banned it hours before its intended start.
xho: Bebeququzelele uqhanqalazo ngoMvulo koBulawayo, isixeko sesibini ngobukhulu kweli lizwe, kodwa amapolisa aluvala kwiiyure ezimbalwa phambi kokuba luqale.
mt0: <pad> They had organized a demonstration Monday in Bulawayo, the country's second-largest city, but police authorities banned it hours before its intended start.</s>

en: Two other opposition demonstrations still are planned this week: for the central city of Gweru on Tuesday and the southeastern city of Masvingo on Wednesday.
xho: Eminye imiqhankqalazo emibini yenkcaso isacwangcisiwe kule veki: kumbindi wesixeko saseGweru ngoLwesibini nakwisixeko esikumazantsi mpuma eMasvingo ngolwesithathu.
mt0: <pad> Two more demonstrations by the opposition are still planned this week: for the central city of Gweru on Tuesday and the southeastern city of Masvingo on Wednesday.</s>

en: Hundreds of MDC supporters ignored the ban, leading to clashes between civilians and police.

en: Video and photographs showed police hitting and kicking some demonstrators among actions that drew complaints of excessive force from civil and human rights groups, including the United Nations human rights office.

mt0: <pad> Video and photos showed police hitting and kicking some demonstrators among actions that draw complaints of excessive force from civil and human rights groups, including the United Nations human rights office.</s>

en: Police, not demonstrators, showed up in force on Bulawayo streets Monday, with foot patrols wielding shields, batons and, in some cases, pistols.

mt0: <pad> A young man in Bulawayo, identifying himself only as James, told VOA that negotiations between the government and opposition leaders were even more important than demonstrations.</s>

en: Honestly, to demonstrate, we can end up being hurt by being beaten, being chased around.

en: Moyo, the foreign minister, told VOA the administration is "undertaking economic reforms [that] are fundamental and they are key to ensuring that even the youth would finally have jobs created for them, so that we can create an environment where investors and the capital will find it easy to come into this country, where jobs will be created, and the youth will be part and parcel of economic activity."
xho: UMoyo, umphathiswa wezangaphandle, uxelele iVOA ukuba ulawulo "lwenza utshintsho lwezoqoqosho olusisiseko kwaye lungundoqo ekuqinisekiseni ukuba nolutsha ekugqibeleni luya kudalelwa imisebenzi, ukuze sikwazi ukudala imeko apho abatyali-mali kunye nenkunzi. uzakufumana kulula ukungena kweli lizwe, apho kuza kudaleka imisebenzi, kwaye ulutsha luzakuba yinxalenye yemisebenzi yezoqoqosho.”

en: Few Demonstrators Turn Up for Zimbabwe Protest in Bulawayo

en: Few people have turned up for an opposition protest in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe's second city, on Monday as armed police maintained heavy presence on the streets and at a courthouse where the opposition is pressing to be allowed to hold the demonstration.
xho: Bambalwa abantu abathe bazimasa  uqhankqalazo eBulawayo, isixeko sesibini saseZimbabwe, ngoMvulo njengoko amapolisa axhobileyo ethe gqolo ukuhlala ezitalatweni nakwinkundla yamatyala apho amaqela aphikisayo anyanzelise ukuba avunyelwe ukuba enze umboniso.

mt0: <pad> Movement for Democratic Change, the opposition party, had called the protest as part of a planned series of protests to push President Emmerson Mnangagwa to agree to a transitional government amid a rapidly deteriorating economy and rising political tensions.</s>

en: Government calls on all progressive Zimbabweans to desist from being used by negative forces to destabilize their own country, as this will only prolong the hardships which the government is tirelessly trying to address in a more sustainable manner, she said.
