en: UN Condemns Government Crackdown on Peaceful Protests in Zimbabwe
xho: I-UN Igxeka urhulumente ngokuqhawula uqhankqalazo olunoxolo eZimbabwe.
mt0: <pad> UN Condemns Government Crackdown on Peaceful Protests in Zimbabwe</s>

en: The U.N. human rights office is condemning a crackdown Friday in Zimbabwe by riot police on peaceful protesters in the capital, Harare.
xho: I-Ofisi yamalungelo oluntu ye-UN igxeka intshukumo yangoLwesihlanu eZimbabwe eyenziwe ngamapolisa  kubantu abaqhankqalaza ngoxolo kwikomkhulu iHarare.
mt0: <pad> UN human rights office is condemns a crackdown Friday in Zimbabwe by riot police on peaceful protesters in the capital, Harare.</s>

en: The agency is calling for an investigation into excessive use of force by security forces.
xho: Le arhente imemelela ukuba kwenziwe uphando malunga nokusetyenziswa kakhulu kwezigalo ngoonogada.
mt0: <pad> The agency is calling for an investigation into excessive use of force by security forces.</s>

en: U.N. Human Rights spokesman Rupert Colville says there are better ways to deal with the populations legitimate grievances on the economic situation in the country than by cracking down on peaceful protestors.
xho: Isithethi samaLungelo oLuntu kwi-UN uRupert Colville uthi kukho iindlela ezingcono zokujongana nezikhalazo ezisemthethweni zabemi malunga nemeko yezoqoqosho kweli lizwe kunokuba kunqandwe abaqhankqalaza ngoxolo.
mt0: <pad> UN Human Rights Spokesman Rupert Colville says there are better ways to deal with the people's legitimate grievances on the economic situation in the country than by cracking down on peaceful protestors.</s>

en: We are deeply concerned by the socio-economic crisis that continues to unfold in Zimbabwe.
xho: “Sixhalabile kakhulu ngemeko yezoqoqosho nentlalontle eqhubeka eZimbabwe.
mt0: <pad> Sikhathazeke kakhulu ngenxa yengxaki yezoqoqosho kunye nezemveliso eqhubekayo ukubakho eZimbabwe.</s>

en: While acknowledging efforts made by the government, the international community and the U.N. in Zimbabwe to mitigate the effects of the crisis and reform
xho: Ngelixa sivuma iinzame ezenziwe ngurhulumente, uluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe kunye ne-UN eZimbabwe ukunciphisa iziphumo zobunzima kunye nohlaziyo.
mt0: <pad> Nangona uxabisa iinzame ezithethwa ngumbuso, uluntu lwamanye amazwe kunye ne UN eZimbabwe ukunceda ukunciphisa i-effects of the crisis and to mitigate the effects of the crisis and to reduce the impact of the crisis and to minimize the effects of the crisis.</s>

en: process, the dire economic situation is now impacting negatively on the realization of economic and social rights of millions of Zimbabweans," Colville said.
xho: Inkqubo, imeko yezoqoqosho emaxongo ngoku inefuthe elibi ekufezekisweni kwamalungelo ezoqoqosho nezentlalo ezigidi zabantu baseZimbabwe,” utshilo uColville.
mt0: <pad> "The dire economic situation is now impacting negatively on the realization of economic and social rights of millions of Zimbabweans," Colville said.</s>

en: Zimbabwes citizens are struggling with hyperinflation, which has sent prices soaring for essential commodities such as fuel, food, transportation and health care.
xho: Abemi baseZimbabwe batsala nzima ngenxa yokonyuka kakhulu kwamaxabiso ngokuhamba kwexesha , ebangele ukuba amaxabiso anyuke kwizinto ezibalulekileyo ezifana namafutha, ukutya, izithuthi kunye nokhathalelo lwezempilo.
mt0: <pad> Zimbabwe's citizens are battling hyperinflation, which has sent prices soaring for essential commodities such as fuel, food, transport and health care.</s>

en: Compounding the problems is the ongoing impact of cyclone Idai that hit Zimbabwe in March and a severe drought.
xho: Okongeza iingxaki yimpembelelo eqhubekayo yenkanyamba i-Idai ehlasele iZimbabwe ngoMatshi kunye nembalela enkulu.
mt0: <pad> Ukuxhasa iingxaki kukuqhubeka kweempembelelo ze-cyclone Idai ezihlasele iZimbabwe ngoMatshi kwaye ukoma okunzima.</s>

en: The United Nations says one third of Zimbabwes population of 16 million people is in need of humanitarian aid.
xho: Umbutho weZizwe eziManyeneyo uthi isinye kwisithathu sabemi baseZimbabwe abantu abazizigidi ezilishumi elinesithandathu badinga uncedo loluntu.
mt0: <pad> UN says one third of Zimbabwe's population of 16 million people is in need of humanitarian aid.</s>

en: The fallout in terms of casualties and possible arrests from Fridays protests is not yet clear.
xho: Ukuwa malunga nokwenzakala kunye nokubanjwa okunokwenzeka kuqhanqalazo lwangoLwezihlanu akukacaci.
mt0: <pad> I-fallout in terms of casualties and possible arrests from Friday's protests is not yet clear.</s>

en: But Colville tells VOA his office has received disturbing reports of human rights violations over the past few months.
xho: Kodwa uColville uxelele iVOA ukuba iofisi yakhe ifumene iingxelo eziphazamisayo zokunyhashwa kwamalungelo oluntu kwezi nyanga zimbalwa zidlulileyo.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa uColville uthi i-ofisi yakhe iye ifumane ingxelo ezikhathazayo zokunyhasha amalungelo abantu kwiinyanga ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo.</s>

en: There are, as I said, reports coming through right now of very recent abductions, beatings and so on of activists or human rights defenders.
xho: “Kukho, njengoko benditshilo, iingxelo ezizayo ngoku zokuxhwilwa kwabantu, ukubethwa njalo njalo kwamatsha ntliziyo okanye abakhuseli bamalungelo abantu.
mt0: <pad> Kukho, njengoko ndithethile, iingxelo eziza kubakho ngoku ngee-abductions, beatings, njl.njl. za activists okanye abakhuseli babantu.</s>

en: We have not had a chance to verify those and look in detail apart from the two that occurred a few days ago," Colville said.
xho: Asikhange sibenalo ithuba lokuqinisekisa ezo kwaye sijonge ngokweenkcukacha ngaphandle kwezi zimbini zenzekileyo kwiintsuku ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo, utshilo uColville.
mt0: <pad> "Asinayo ithuba yokukhangela kwaye sijonge ngakumbi ngaphandle kwembini eyayenzeka kwiintsuku ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo," Colville said.</s>

en: So, it is clearly a very tense situation.
xho: Ngoko, kucacile ukuba yimeko enzima kakhulu.
mt0: <pad> Ngoko, ngoko kubonakala ukuba lixesha elinzima kakhulu.</s>

en: Colville says state authorities have a duty to ensure peoples rights to freedom of expression and to protect the right to peaceful assembly.
xho: UColville uthi abasemagunyeni banoxanduva lokuqinisekisa amalungelo abantu okuthetha ngokukhululekileyo kunye nokukhusela ilungelo lokuhlanganisana ngoxolo.
mt0: <pad> Colville says authorities have a duty to ensure peoples rights to freedom of expression and to protect the right to peaceful assembly.</s>

en: The U.N. human rights office is urging the government to engage in a national dialogue to ensure that civil society in all its guises can carry out its activities without fear of intimidation or reprisals for its work.
xho: I-Ofisi yamalungelo oluntu ye-UN ibongoza urhulumente ukuba abandakanyeke kwingxoxo yelizwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba uluntu kuwo onke amaqhinga alo lukwazi ukwenza imisebenzi yalo ngaphandle koloyiko lokugrogriswa okanye impindezelo ngomsebenzi walo.
mt0: <pad> UN Human Rights Office is urging the government to engage in a national dialogue to ensure that civil society in all its guises can carry out its activities without fear of intimidation or reprisals for its work.</s>

en: Despite Oil and Gas Reserves, Africa Feels Pressure of Rising Energy Costs
xho: Ngaphandle  koovimba be-oyile negesi, i-Afrika ifumana uxinzelelo lokunyuka kweendleko zamandla ombane
mt0: <pad> Despite Oil and Gas Reserves, Africa Feels Pressure of Rising Energy Costs</s>

en: Africans are feeling the pinch caused by soaring global energy prices, say analysts, even in countries like Nigeria and Angola that are major exporters of crude oil.
xho: Abantu baseAfrika baziva becinezelekile ngenxa yokunyuka kwamaxabiso ombane ehlabathini, batsho abahlalutyi, nakumazwe afana neNigeria neAngola angawona athumela ioli ekrwada kwamanye amazwe.
mt0: <pad> Afrika ijongene nexhala elibangelwa kukunyuka kwexabiso le-eneji kwihlabathi, bathi abaphandi, kwaye kunjalo nangamanye amazwe afana neNigeria neAngola eziziinkulu izikhuphisana ze-oli ekrwada.</s>

en: While that handful of oil producers is seeing an increase in revenue – especially since the Russian invasion of Ukraine on February 24 – much of the continent lacks refining capability, forcing countries to pay high prices to import gasoline and other petroleum products from Asia and Europe.
xho: Ngelixa elo qela labavelisi be-oyile libona ukunyuka kwengeniso - ingakumbi ukususela ekuhlaseleni kweRussia i-Ukraine ngoFebruwari 24 - ininzi yelizwekazi ayinakho ukucokisa, okunyanzela amazwe ukuba ahlawule amaxabiso aphezulu ukungenisa i-petroli kunye nezinye iimveliso zepetroliyamu ezivela e-Asia naseYurophu.
mt0: <pad> Nangona abambalwa abavelisi be-oil bafumana inkcitho engakumbi – ngakumbi emva kokuhlaselwa kwe-Ukraine ngoFebruwari 24 – uninzi lwelizwekazi alunawo amandla okucoca, evumela amazwe ukuba ahlawule imali enkulu ukuthenga i-gasoline nenye imveliso ye-petroleum evela e-Asia nase-Europe.</s>

en: The continent is further affected by increasing costs for natural gas, a key component of nitrogen-based fertilizers used in food production.
xho: Ilizwekazi lichaphazeleka ngakumbi ngokunyuka kweendleko zegesi yendalo, inxalenye ephambili yezichumisi ezisekelwe kwinitrogen ezisetyenziselwa ukuveliswa kokutya.
mt0: <pad> Izwekazi lichaphazelwa ngakumbi ngumsebenzi ophezulu we-natural gas, isiseko se-nitrogen-based fertilizers ezisetyenziswayo ekuvelisweni kwe-food.</s>

en: With salaries largely stagnant, more than two-thirds of Africans feel pressured by the rising prices, said Franklin Cudjoe, founding president of the Ghana-based Imani Center for Policy and Education.
xho: Njengoko imivuzo ubukhulu becala imile, ngaphezu kwesibini esithathwini sabantu baseAfrika baziva becinezelekile ngenxa yokunyuka kwamaxabiso, utshilo uFranklin Cudjoe, umongameli owaseka i-Imani Centre for Policy and Education yaseGhana.
mt0: <pad> With salaries largely stagnant, more than two-thirds of Africans feel pressured by the rising prices, said Franklin Cudjoe, founding president of the Ghana-based Imani Center for Policy and Education.</s>

en: The continent is affected simply because we depend largely on global oil suppliers, since not many African countries have [their own] oil products, Cudjoe told VOA.
xho: “Ilizwekazi liyachaphazeleka nje kuba sixhomekeke kakhulu kubathengisi be-oyile behlabathi, kuba amazwe amaninzi ase-Afrika engenazo iimveliso ze-oyile,” utshilo uCudjoe.
mt0: <pad> Izwekazi lichaphazelekile kuba sithembele kakhulu kwiinkampani ezithengisa i-oyile, njengoko amazwe amaninzi aseAfrika anawo [amashishini] oyile.</s>

en: Prices spiked on the global oil market after the invasion of Ukraine triggered a wave of international sanctions against
xho: Amaxabiso onyuke kwimarike yeoli yehlabathi emva kohlaselo lwase-Ukraine olubangele ukohlwaywa kwamazwe ngamazwe
mt0: <pad> Ixabiso le-oil likhuphe kwimarike yehlabathi emva kokuba i-invasion yaseUkraine ibangele ukuba kukho uqhushumbho lweemfazwe ezimanyeneyo.</s>

en: Russia, one of the worlds leading exporters of crude.
xho: IRussia, yenye yamazwe ahamba phambili ekuthengiseni izinto ezikrwada kumazwe angaphandle.
mt0: <pad> Russia, one of the world's leading exporters of crude.</s>

en: The price briefly climbed to over $120 per barrel this month before settling down to $103 per barrel on Friday.
xho: Ixabiso linyuke ngokufutshane laya kuthi ga kwi-120 yeedola umphanda kule nyanga ngaphambi kokuba lihle liye kutsho kwi-103 yeedola umphanda ngoLwesihlanu.
mt0: <pad> Ixabiso linyuke kancinane ngaphezu kwe-120 ibarrel kulenyanga ngaphambi kokuhlala kwi-103 ibarrel ngoLwesihlanu.</s>

en: The surge in energy prices is helping to fuel inflation across Africa.
xho: Ukunyuka kwamaxabiso ombane kungunbangela wokunyuka kwezinga lwamaxabiso kwi-Afrika iphela.
mt0: <pad> The surge in energy prices is helping to fuel inflation across Africa.</s>

en: In Ghana, for example, overall consumer price inflation was pegged at 15.7% year-on-year in February compared with 13.9% in January, the countrys Statistical Service said last week.
xho: E-Ghana, umzekelo, ukunyuka kwamaxabiso omthengi kuwonke kwakuxhomekeke kwi-15.7% ngonyaka-nonyaka ngoFebruwari xa kuthelekiswa ne-13.9% ngoJanuwari, i-Statistical Service yelizwe yatsho kwiveki ephelileyo.
mt0: <pad> In Ghana, for example, the total consumer price inflation was pegged at 15.7% year-on-year in February compared with 13.9% in January, the countrys Statistical Service said last week.</s>

en: In Zimbabwe, prices are climbing sharply – even overnight.
xho: EZimbabwe, amaxabiso enyuka kakhulu – nangobusuku.
mt0: <pad> In Zimbabwe, prices are rising sharply – even overnight.</s>

en: At a TM supermarket in the capital of Harare, a crate of 30 eggs cost the $6.70 on Tuesday and about $7.81 on Wednesday.
xho: Kwivenkile enkulu yeTM kwikomkhulu laseHarare, ikhreyithi yamaqanda angama-30 ixabisa i-6.70 yeedola ngoLwesibini kwaye malunga ne-7.81 yeedola ngoLwesithathu.
mt0: <pad> At a TM supermarket in the capital of Harare, a crate of 30 eggs cost $6.70 on Tuesday and about $7.81 on Wednesday.</s>

en: The price of a loaf of bread went from $1.49 to $1.84; for a kilo of beef, the price jumped from $3.35 to $5.22.
xho: Ixabiso lesonka lasuka kwi-1,49 yeedola ukuya kwi-1,84 yeedola; ngekhilogram yenkomo, ixabiso lenyuke ukusuka kwi-3.35 ukuya kwi-5,22 yeedola.
mt0: <pad> Ixabiso le loaf yebhanana lisuka kwi-$1.49 ukuya kwi-$1.84; ikilo yenyama yabuya kwi-$3.35 ukuya kwi-$5.22.</s>

en: Gasoline costs climbed, too. In Harare, the per-liter price climbed from $1.41 to $1.69 from Tuesday to Wednesday.
xho: Amaxabiso epetroli anyukile, nawo. E-Harare, ixabiso le-litha linyuke ukusuka kwi-$ 1.41 ukuya kwi-$ 1.69 ukusuka ngoLwesibini ukuya ngoLwesithathu.
mt0: <pad> Gasoline costs also climbed. In Harare, the per-liter price climbed from $1.41 to $1.69 from Tuesday to Wednesday.</s>

en: The surge in food prices was the biggest driver behind consumer inflation in Egypt, it rose by 8.8% in February – the sharpest increase in nearly three years, according to the state statistics agency, CAPMAS.
xho: Ukunyuka kwamaxabiso okutya kwaba ngoyena mqhubi mkhulu wokunyuka kwamaxabiso e-Egypt, anyuke nge-8.8% ngoFebruwari – okona kunyuka kuphezulu phantse kwiminyaka emithathu, ngokutsho kwe-arhente karhulumente yezibalo, iCAPMAS.
mt0: <pad> The surge in food prices was the biggest driver behind consumer inflation in Egypt, it rose by 8.8% in February – the sharpest increase in nearly three years, according to the state statistics agency, CAPMAS.</s>

en: Cudjoe said it was crucial for governments and regional bodies such as the African Union to build defenses to cushion consumers in times of economic uncertainty.
xho: UCudjoe uthe kubalulekile ukuba oorhulumente kunye namaqumrhu engingqi anje ngeManyano yase-Afrika bakhe ukhuselo lokukhusela abathengi ngamaxesha okungaqiniseki kwezoqoqosho.
mt0: <pad> Cudjoe said it was crucial for governments and regional bodies such as the African Union to build defenses to cushion consumers in times of economic uncertainty.</s>

en: Even if it means building defenses in terms of the provision of food, said Cudjoe, adding, "I could imagine Nigeria, if it had had its way, it could be selling foodstuff to most countries at reduced rates by now."
xho: Nokuba oko kuthetha ukwakha ukhuseleko malunga nokubonelela ngokutya, utshilo uCudjoe, esongeza, "Ndiyayicingela iNigeria, ukuba yayinendlela yayo, inokuthengisa ukutya kumazwe amaninzi ngexabiso elithotyiweyo ngoku."
mt0: <pad> Nangona ukuba kuthetha ukukhusela ukutya, uthe Cudjoe, "Ndiyakwazi ukucinga ukuba iNigeria, ukuba ibinendlela, ingathengisa ukutya kwihlabathi liphela ngexabiso eliphantsi ngoku."</s>

en: There must be that urgency of building for themselves defenses, funds that would make us sustain ourselves -- at least to prevent us from being completely annihilated by these uncertainties in the world.
xho: Kunokuba khukho ukungxamiseka kokuzakhela ukhuseleko ngokunokwabo, iimali ebezinokusenza ukuba sizigcine-- noko ukusithintela ekutshatyalalisweni ngokupheleleyo koku kungaqiniseki emhlabeni.
mt0: <pad> Ifanele ibe khona loo mngcipheko wokuzikhusela, imali eya kusinceda sihlale - ubuncinane ukuze singanqunyulwa ngokupheleleyo ngale nkxaso yehlabathi.</s>

en: Chibamba Kanyama, an economist in the Zambian capital of Lusaka, said suspending fuel taxes would be "the most ideal thing to do now under the circumstances" to cushion consumers and industries.
xho: UChibamba Kanyama, ingcali yezoqoqosho kwikomkhulu laseZambia eLusaka, uthe ukunqumamisa irhafu yamafutha kuya kuba "yeyona nto ilungileyo ukuyenza ngoku phantsi kwelemeko" ukuxhasa abathengi kunye namashishini.
mt0: <pad> Chibamba Kanyama, an economist in the Zambian capital of Lusaka, said suspending fuel taxes would be "the most ideal thing to do now under the circumstances" to cushion consumers and industries.</s>

en: African governments must find a way of responding," he said.
xho: “Oorhulumente baseAfrika kufuneka bafumane indlela yokusabela,” utshilo.
mt0: <pad> Ii-African governments must find a way of responding," he said.</s>

en: It is a choice of whether to reduce taxes to lower the prices or to maintain the price levels and use the revenues to subsidize the most vulnerable in society."
xho: Kufuneka kukhetwe phakathi kuncitshiswa irhafu ukuthoba amaxabiso okanye ukugcina amaxabiso aphantsi kunye nokusebenzisa ingeniso ukuxhasa abona bantu basesichengeni kuluntu."
mt0: <pad> Ikhetho ukuba ukunciphisa iibhasi ukuze ukunciphise ixabiso okanye ukugcina ixabiso kwaye usebenzise imali mboleko ukuze uxhase abo bancinci kwixesha.</s>

en: But Kanyama also suggested that the geopolitical crisis involving Russia and Ukraine – both big grain exporters to Africa – may create opportunities for African producers.
xho: Kodwa uKanyama ukwacebise ukuba ingxaki yezelizwe kunye nezopolitiko ebandakanya iRussia ne-Ukraine - omabini amazwe angabathengisi abakhulu bokutya okuziinkozo e-Afrika - ingadala amathuba kubavelisi baseAfrika.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa uKanyama wabonisa ukuba iingxaki ze-geopolitical ezibandakanya iRussia neUkraine – zombini zithengisi ezinkulu ze-grain eAfrika – zingadala amathuba kubavelisi baseAfrika.</s>

en: Supply countries like South Africa, with robust and highly mechanized systems, may find a window of exporting [commodities]
xho: “Amazwe abonelela ngeenkonzo afana noMzantsi Afrika, aneenkqubo ezomeleleyo noomatshini abaphezulu, anokufumana ifestile yokuthumela ngaphandle [impahla]
mt0: <pad> Nangona iinkampani ezifana ne-South Africa, ezineendlela eziqinileyo kwaye ziphantse zibe zenziwe ngezixhobo, zingafumana ithuba lokuthengisa [impahla]</s>

en: like wheat and other products to fill the gaps left by Russia and Ukraine," Kanyama said.
xho: njengengqolowa kunye nezinye iimveliso zokuvala izikhewu ezishiywe yiRussia ne-Ukraine," utshilo uKanyama.
mt0: <pad>, like wheat and other products to fill the gaps left by Russia and Ukraine," Kanyama said.</s>

en: Kanyama also said support by the international community – for instance, in the form of debt relief for some African nations – is welcome.
xho: UKanyama uphinde wathi inkxaso yoluntu lwamazwe ngamazwe - umzekelo, ngendlela yokunciphisa amatyala kwamanye amazwe aseAfrika - yamkelekile.
mt0: <pad> Kanyama added that support from the international community – for example, in the form of debt relief for some African nations – is welcome.</s>

en: He noted that the Group of 20 – which encompasses seven industrialized nations, some countries with strong or fast-growing economies, and the European Union – "is trying to offer some debt relief."
xho: Waphawula ukuba iQela lama-20 - eliquka amazwe asixhenxe aphuhlileyo, amanye amazwe anoqoqosho oluqinileyo okanye olukhula ngokukhawuleza, kunye ne-European Union - "izama ukunika isiqabu kwityala."
mt0: <pad> Uthe i-Group of 20 – ebandakanya amazwe asibhozo aneziqoqosho eziphucukileyo, amanye amazwe anezikhonomi ezinamandla okanye ezikhula ngokukhawuleza, kunye ne European Union – "izama ukunika uxolo lwexesha elincinane kwixesha lentlekele."</s>

en: Some other countries, such as Zambia, [are] undergoing debt restructuring processes and an IMF program, and to me, this is the only way out of the crisis," Kanyama added.
xho: Amanye amazwe, afana neZambia, aphantsi kweenkqubo zokuhlengahlengisa amatyala kunye nenkqubo ye-IMF, kwaye kum, le kuphela kwendlela yokuphuma kule ngxaki, wongeze watsho uKanyama.
mt0: <pad> Amanye amazwe, afana neZambia, [are] undergoing debt restructuring processes and an IMF program, and to me, this is the only way out of the crisis," Kanyama added.</s>

en: This story originated in VOA's English-to-Africa service, with contributions from the Zimbabwe service.
xho: Eli bali liqale kwinkonzo ye-VOA yesiNgesi ukuya e-Afrika, ngamagalelo aphuma kwinkonzo yaseZimbabwe.
mt0: <pad> Ukuba ukwazi ukutolika, nceda uthi ukuba awuqiniseki.</s>

en: WHO Says Africa's COVID Vaccinations Rose by 15% in February
xho: I-WHO ithi ugonyo lwaseAfrika lwe-COVID lwenyuke nge-15% ngoFebruwari
mt0: <pad> WHO Says Africa's COVID Vaccine Rates Rose by 15% in 2020</s>

en: The World Health Organization says Africas COVID-19 vaccinations rose by 15% between January and February, as several countries embarked on mass inoculation drives to expand coverage and protect populations from the pandemic.
xho: IWolrd Health Organisation ithi ugonyo lwe-COVID-19 eAfrica lunyuke nge-15% phakathi kukaJanuwari noFebruwari, njengoko amazwe aliqela aye aqalisa ukuqhubela phambili ngokugonywa ukuze andise ukhuseleko kunye nokukhusela abantu kwesisifo sikazwelonke.
mt0: <pad> The World Health Organization says Africa's COVID-19 vaccinations rose by 15% between January and February, as several countries embarked on mass inoculation drives to expand coverage and protect populations from the pandemic.</s>

en: Zimbabwes government says it is launching a "national vaccination blitz" targeting those who have not yet been vaccinated in a country where resistance to the shots has been an issue since the program started last year.
xho: Urhulumente waseZimbabwe uthi usungula "inational vaccination blitz" elijolise kwabo bangekagonywa kwilizwe apho abantu banokungawethembi amayeza okugonya ukususela oko yaqalayo inkqubo yogonyo kulo nyaka uphelileyo.
mt0: <pad> Zimbabwe's government says it is launching a "national vaccination blitz" targeting those who have not yet been vaccinated in a country where resistance to the shots has been an issue since the program started last year.</s>

en: The drive come amid government concern over rising COVID-19 cases.
xho: Eli phulo liza phakathi kwenkxalabo karhulumente ngokunyuka kwamanani abantu abafunyenwe bene-COVID-19.
mt0: <pad> Iphulo lifika njengoko urhulumente ukhathazeka ngenxa yokunyuka kwee-COVID-19 iimeko.</s>

en: Dr. Matshidiso Moeti, WHO regional director for Africa, said in a statement that the increase in COVID-19 vaccinations on the continent was driven mainly by campaigns in populous countries, including the Democratic Republic of Congo, Ethiopia, Kenya, and Nigeria.
xho: UGqr. Matshidiso Moeti, ongumlawuli wengingqi ye-Afrika kwo-WHO, uthethe wenjenje kwingxelo, ukwanda kogonyo lwe-COVID-19 kwilizwekazi kuqhutywa ikakhulu ngamaphulo kumazwe anabantu abaninzi, ukuquka iDemocratic Republic of Congo, i-Ethiopia, iKenya kunye neNigeria.
mt0: <pad> Dr. Matshidiso Moeti, WHO regional director for Africa, said in a statement that the increase in COVID-19 vaccinations on the continent was mainly due to campaigns in populous countries, including the Democratic Republic of Congo, Ethiopia, Kenya, and Nigeria.</s>

en: Dr. Thierno Balde, the WHO Africa regional COVID-19 incident manager, he says the continent must remain vigilant.
xho: UGqr. Thierno Balde, umphathi we-WHO kwingingqi yaseAfrika kwicandelo le-COVID-19, uthi ilizwekazi kufuneka lihlale liphaphile.
mt0: <pad> Dr. Thierno Balde, the WHO Africa regional COVID-19 incident manager, he says the continent must remain vigilant, he said.</s>

en: We have seen what is happening around, in China, and the risk of also having new imitations, new variants still possible.
xho: Siyibonile into eyenzekayo eChina, kunye nomngcipheko wokuba nohlobo lwesifo olutsha, uhlobo lwalentsholongwane ohlustha lusenokwenzeka.
mt0: <pad> We have seen what is happening around, in China, and the risk of also having new imitations, new variants still possible.</s>

en: We really need to continue to safeguard our population by taking the vaccine by not relaxing totally.
xho: Ngokwenene kunyanzelekile siqhubeke nokukhusela abantu bethu ngokuthatha inxaxhwba kugonyo ngokungaphumli ngokupheleleyo.
mt0: <pad> Nangona sifuna ukukhusela abantu bethu ngokuthatha i-vaccine, singakwazi ukuhlala ekhaya.</s>

en: The situation might change.
xho: Le meko inokutshintsha.
mt0: <pad> Indawo inotshintsha.</s>

en: So we really need to continue adapting some of these social measures and also to get vaccination," Balde said.
xho: Ke kunyanzelekile ukuba siqhubeke sihlengahlengisa amanye ala manyathelo asekuhlaleni kwaye sifumane ugonyo, utshilo uBalde.
mt0: <pad> Ngoko ke, simele siqhubeke ukuvumela indlela zokuphila ezithile kwaye ufumane i-vaccine," uthe uBalde.</s>

en: The WHO said to boost African COVID-19 vaccine acceptance, it and other organizations were supporting mass vaccination drives in at least 10 priority countries to reach 100 million people by the end of next month.
xho: I-WHO ithe ukonyusa ukwamkelwa kwesitofu sokugonya i-COVID-19 eAfrica, yona kunye neminye imibutho ixhasa ugonyo lwesininzi kumazwe ali-10 aphambili ukufikelela kubantu abazizigidi ezili-100 ekupheleni kwenyanga ezayo.
mt0: <pad> WHO says to boost African COVID-19 vaccine acceptance, it and other organizations were supporting mass vaccination drives in at least 10 priority countries to reach 100 million people by the end of next month.</s>

en: Nqobizitha Mangaliso Ndlovu, Zimbabwes acting information minister, said his country would not be left behind.
xho: UNqobizitha Mangaliso Ndlovu, umphathiswa wezolwazi obambeleyo waseZimbabwe, uthe ilizwe lakhe alizukushiywa ngasemva.
mt0: <pad> Nqobizitha Mangaliso Ndlovu, Zimbabwe's acting information minister, said his country would not be left behind.</s>

en: Regarding the vaccination program, as of 15 March, 2022, a total of 159,628 third doses have been administered to date.
xho: Ngokuphathelele kwinkqubo yogonyo, ukusukela nge-15 kaMatshi, 2022, xa kubalwa i-159,628 yezigonyo zesithathu sele zikhutshiwe ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.
mt0: <pad> About the vaccination program, as of 15 March 2022, a total of 159,628 third doses have been administered to date.</s>

en: The national vaccination blitz campaign will kick off on Monday, 21 March, 2022, and [the] government is urging those that have not yet been vaccinated to take advantage of this exercise to do so," Ndlovu said.
xho: Iphulo leNational vaccination blitz liza kuqala ngoMvulo, umhla we21 kaMatshi, ngo-2022, kwaye urhulumente ubongoza abo bangekagonywa ukuba basebenzise eli thuba ukwenza oko,” utshilo uNdlovu.
mt0: <pad> The national vaccination blitz campaign will kick off on Monday, 21 March, 2022, and [the] government is urging those that have not yet been vaccinated to take advantage of this exercise to do so," Ndlovu said.</s>

en: A number of Zimbabweans have refused vaccination, saying they do not trust the mainly donated Chinese-made Sinopharm and Sinovac vaccines.
xho: Uninzi lwabantu baseZimbabwe abalufuni ugonyo, besithi abaluthembi izitofu zogonyo ekunikelwe ngazo zohlobo lweSinopharm kunye neSinovac eyenziwe eChina.
mt0: <pad> Abanye abantu baseZimbabwe bamkela ukukhuselwa, besithi abathembi amayeza ase China Sinopharm and Sinovac.</s>

en: The country has lately recorded a rise in new infections – now cumulatively at 244,012 with 5,418 deaths, according to the Johns Hopkins University, which is tracking the global outbreak.
xho: Ilizwe kutsha nje lirekhode ukonyuka kohlobo olutsha lwesifo - ngoku lunyuke lwafika ku-244,012 kunye nabaswelekiyeyo abayi-5,418, ngokutsho kweYunivesithi yaseJohns Hopkins, elandelela esisifo sihlasele ihlabathi lonke.
mt0: <pad> Izwe liye labhala i-spike kwiziganeko ezintsha – ngoku zizonke ezili-244,000, ezine-5,418 iimfazwe, ngokweYunivesithi yaseJohns Hopkins, ejongene nophuhliso lwehlabathi.</s>

en: Dr. Cleophas Chimbetete, president of Zimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, attributes that to the recent lifting of restrictive measures, such as lockdowns.
xho: UGqr. Cleophas Chimbetete, umongameli weZimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, uthi loo nto ibangelwa kukushenxiswa kwamva nje kwemiqathango ethintelayo, enje ngokulwa kwezinto.
mt0: <pad> Dr. Cleophas Chimbetete, president of Zimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, attributed that to the recent lifting of restrictive measures, such as lockdowns.</s>

en: He says, however, it is not time to panic, just to enforce WHO protocols, such masking and social distancing.
xho: Uthi, nangona kunjalo, ayiloxesha lokoyika, lixehsa lokunyanzelisa imigaqo ye-WHO, efana nokufihla ubuso kunye nokuncitshiswa kwentlalo.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa, uthi, ayikho ixesha lokuxhalabisa, kodwa ukusebenzisa iprotocols zeWHO, ezifana nokuthimba kwaye uphephe abantu.</s>

en: After relaxing measures, it is expected that cases will slightly go up.
xho: “Emva kokuba kuncitshiswe lemithetho, kulindeleke ukuba amanani abantu abanesisifu anyuke kancinci.
mt0: <pad> Emva kokuxhasa iindlela, kulindeleke ukuba iimeko ziya kukhula kancinane emva koko.</s>

en: But I also think that it is too early to make any meaningful conclusions, I think it is just an opportunity for us to strengthen our preventative measures and continue highlighting to the rest of the population that COVID is still with us.
xho: Kodwa ndicinga ukuba kusekutsha kakhulu ukuba senze naziphi na izigqibo ezinentsingiselo, ndicinga ukuba lithuba nje lethu lokuba someleze amanyathelo ethu okuthintela kwaye siqhubeke nokungxininisa kuluntu ukuba i-COVID iseyinto ekhoyo.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa ndinokucinga ukuba kusenzima ukugqiba iingxelo ezicacileyo, Ndicinga ukuba sisihlandlo sokuqinisa iinzame zethu zokukhusela kwaye siqhubeke ukubonisa abantu abaninzi ukuba i-COVID isekhona nathi.</s>

en: The good news, though, is that severe cases have not gone up.
xho: Noko ke, iindaba ezimnandi zezokuba imeko zabagula ngamandla azikho phezulu.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa iindaba ezilungileyo kukuba iimeko ezimbi zange zibuye zibe ngaphezulu.</s>

en: What we need to do is to continue to get vaccinated and what is important is that the government should – as it is doing – is monitor these numbers.
xho: Into ekunyazeleke ukuba siyenzile kukuqhubeka nokugonywa kwaye okubalulekileyo kukuba urhulumente enze – njengoko esenza – abeke iliso kula manani.
mt0: <pad> Yintoni esifanele siyenze kukuqhubeka ukufumana i-vaccine kwaye into ebalulekileyo kukuba urhulumente kufuneka – njengoko usenza – ujonge ezi nkcukacha.</s>

en: There is no cause for alarm or cause for us to introduce new measures," Chimbetete said.
xho: Akukho sizathu soloyiko okanye isizathu sokuba senze amanyathelo amatsha, ”utshilo uChimbetete.
mt0: <pad> "Akukho mfuneko yokuxhalabisa okanye ukuzisa izinto ezintsha," uthe uMcebisi.</s>

en: Zimbabwe had a target of vaccinating at least 10 million people by the end of last year, a figure that some say was difficult to reach given the scarcity of resources and hesitance.
xho: Ilizwe laseZimbabwe belijolise ekugonyeni abantu abazizigidi ezilishumi ubuncinci ekupheleni konyaka ophelileyo, inani abathi bekunzima ukufikelela kulo ngenxa yokunqongophala kwezixhobo kunye nokuthandabuza koluntu.
mt0: <pad> Zimbabwe had a target of vaccinating at least 10 million people by the end of last year, a figure that some say was difficult to reach given the scarcity of resources and hesitance.</s>

en: It has yet to announce when it plans to achieve herd immunity.
xho: Kusafuneka ibhengeze ukuba iceba ukufezekisa ukugonyeka kwabantu abaninzi.
mt0: <pad> Iyonke i-China ayikaqinisekisi ukuba ijonge njani ukufumana ukhuseleko lwendalo.</s>

en: Finland Crowned World's Happiest Nation for Fifth Year
xho: IFinland ithweswe isithsaba sokuba lelona lizwe lonwabileyo kwiminyaka emihlanu elandelelanayo.
mt0: <pad> Finland Crowned World's Happiest Nation for Fifth Year</s>

en: Finland has been named the world's happiest country for the fifth year running, in an annual U.N.-sponsored index that again ranked Afghanistan as the unhappiest, followed closely by Lebanon.
xho: IFinland ibizwe njengelona lizwe lonwabileyo kwihlabathi kunyaka wesihlanu uqhuba, kwisalathiso sonyaka esixhaswe yi-UN ephinde yabeka i-Afghanistan njengelona lizwe lingonwabanga, ilandelwa ngokusondeleyo yiLebhanon.
mt0: <pad> Finland iye yakhethwa njengelizwe elilungileyo kwihlabathi okweshumi elinesihlanu, kwi-index ye-UN-sponsored annual that again ranked Afghanistan as the unhappiest, followed closely by Lebanon.</s>

en: Serbia, Bulgaria and Romania recorded the biggest boosts in wellbeing.
xho: ISerbia, iBulgaria kunye neRomania zirekhode ezona zinyuso zinkulu kwimpilontle.
mt0: <pad> Serbia, Bulgaria and Romania recorded the biggest boosts in wellbeing.</s>

en: The largest falls in the World Happiness table, released on Friday, came in Lebanon, Venezuela and Afghanistan.
xho: Ukuwa okukhulu kwi World Hapiness Table, ekhutshwe ngoLwesihlanu, yeza eLebhanon, eVenezuela nase-Afghanistan.
mt0: <pad> Iindawo eziphantsi kakhulu kwi-World Happiness Table, epapashwe ngoLwesibini, zavela eLebanon, Venezuela and Afghanistan.</s>

en: Lebanon, which is facing economic meltdown, fell to second from last on the index of 146 nations, just below Zimbabwe.
xho: ILebhanon, ejongene nokudodobala kwezoqoqosho, yawela kwindawo yesibini ukusuka ekugqibeleni kwisalathiso samazwe ali-146, ngezantsi nje kweZimbabwe.
mt0: <pad> Lebhanon, ejongene nokuwa kwe-mali, idlulele kwindawo yesibini ukususela kwindawo yokugqibela kwi-index ye-140 amazwe, ngaphantsi kweZimbabwe.</s>

en: War-traumatized Afghanistan, already bottom of the table, has seen its humanitarian crisis deepen since the Taliban took power again last August.
xho: I-Afghanistan ehlaselwe yimfazwe, esele isezantsi etafileni, ibone ingxaki yobuntu isiba nzulu ukusukela oko iTaliban yathatha isihlalo sokuphatha kwakhona ngo-Agasti ophelileyo.
mt0: <pad> I-Afghanistan, esiye phantsi kwetafile, iye yabona ukuba ingxaki yezoqoqosho yayo iye yakhula ukususela oko iTaliban ithathe amandla ngo-Agasti kulo nyaka.</s>

en: U.N. agency UNICEF estimates one million children under five could die of hunger this winter if not aided.
xho: I-arhente yeZizwe eziManyeneyo iUNICEF iqikelela ukuba abantwana abasisigidi abangaphantsi kweminyaka emihlanu banokubulawa yindlala kobu busika ukuba abancediswa.
mt0: <pad> U.N. agency UNICEF estimates one million children under five could die of hunger this winter if not aided.</s>

en: This (index) presents a stark reminder of the material and immaterial damage that war does to its many victims," co-author Jan-Emmanuel De Neve said.
xho: Esi (isalathiso) sibonisa isikhumbuzo esicacileyo sezinto ezibonakalayo kunye nomonakalo ongabonakaliyo owenziwa yimfazwe kumaxhoba ayo amaninzi, utsho umbhali uJan-Emmanuel De Neve.
mt0: <pad> "Le (index) ibonisa ubungqina obucacileyo bomonakalo owenziwa ngumlo kubantu abaninzi ababethelelweyo," uthe umbhali Jan-Emmanuel De Neve.</s>

en: The World Happiness Report, now in its 10th year, is based on people's own assessment of their happiness, as well as economic and social data.
xho: IWorld Hapiness Report, ngoku kunyaka wayo we-10, isekelwe kuvavanyo lwabantu lolonwabo lwabo, kunye neenkcukacha zezoqoqosho nezentlalo.
mt0: <pad> The World Happiness Report, now in its 10th year, is based on people's own assessment of their happiness, as well as economic and social data.</s>

en: It assigns a happiness score on a scale of zero to 10, based on an average of data over a three-year period.
xho: Inika amanqaku olonwabo kwisikali ukusuka kwiqanda ukuya kwi-10, ngokusekwe kumndilili wedatha kwisithuba seminyaka emithathu.
mt0: <pad> Ukuba awukwazi ukutolika i-translation, sithi uyazi.</s>

en: This latest edition was completed before the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
xho: Olu shicilelo lwamva lwenziwa phambi kokuba iRussia ihlasele iUkraine.
mt0: <pad> Ukuba ukwazi ukuguqulela, sithi uyazi.</s>

en: Northern Europeans once again dominated the top spots -- with the Danes second behind the Finns, followed by the Icelandic, the Swiss and the Dutch.
xho: Abantu baseMntla baseYurophu baphinde balawula iindawo eziphezulu - iDanes yikwindawo yesibini emva kweFinns, ilandelwa yi-Icelandic, iSwiss kunye neDutch.
mt0: <pad> I-Northern Europeans once again dominated the top spots -- with the Danes second behind the Finns, followed by the Icelandic, the Swiss and the Dutch.</s>

en: The United States rose three places to 16th, one ahead of Britain, while France climbed to 20th, its highest ranking yet.
xho: I-United States inyuke iindawo ezintathu ukuya kwi-16, enye ngaphambi kweBritain, ngelixa iFrance inyuke yaya kwindawo yama-20, indawo yayo ephezulu okwangoku.
mt0: <pad> U.S. ukhuphisile amaphuzu amathathu ukuya kwindawo ye-16, ngaphambi kweBritane, ngelixa iFrance iphakamile ukuya kwindawo ye-20, eyona ndawo yayo intle ngayo.</s>

en: As well as a personal sense of wellbeing, based on Gallup polls in each country, the happiness score takes account of GDP, social support, personal freedom and levels of corruption.
xho: Kunye nokuba sempilweni entle, esekwe kuvoto lweGallup kwilizwe ngalinye, amanqaku olonwabo athathela ingqalelo iGDP, inkxaso yezentlalo, inkululeko yomntu kunye nenqanaba lorhwaphilizo.
mt0: <pad> Ngaphezu kwendlela yokuba uziva ngayo, ngokusekelwe kwii-Gallup polls nganye ilizwe, i-happiness score ithatha into eninzi kubandakanya GDP, social support, personal freedom and levels of corruption.</s>

en: This year the authors also used data from social media to compare people's emotions before and after the Covid-19 pandemic.

en: They found "strong increases in anxiety and sadness" in 18 countries but a fall in feelings of anger.
xho: Bafumene "ukwanda okunamandla kwixhala kunye nokungonwabii" kumazwe ali-18 kodwa ukwehla kweemvakalelo zomsindo.

en: The lesson of the World Happiness Report over the years is that social support, generosity to one another and honesty in government are crucial for wellbeing," report co-author Jeffrey Sachs wrote.
xho: Imfundiso yengxelo yeWorld Hapiness Report  kwiminyaka edlulileyo kukuba inkxaso yentlalontle, isisa komnye nomnye kunye nokunyaniseka kukarhulumente kubalulekile kwintlalo-ntle, utshilo umbhali uJeffrey Sachs.

en: World leaders should take heed."

en: The report raised some eyebrows when it first placed Finland at the top of its listings in 2018.

mt0: <pad> I-report ephakamise iinzwane xa iqale ukubeka iFinland kwindawo yokuqala kwi-2018.</s>

en: Many of the Nordic country's 5.5 million people describe themselves as taciturn and prone to melancholy, and admit to eyeing public displays of joyfulness with suspicion.
xho: Uninzi lwabantu belizwe laseNordic lizizigidi ezi-5.5 zabantu bazichaza njengabantu abapholileyo kwaye bathanda ukuba nosizi, kwaye bavume ukuba bajonga imiboniso yoluntu yolonwabo ngeliso lokukrokra.
mt0: <pad> Abantu abaninzi kweli lizwe laseNordic bazichaza besebenza kanzima kwaye bathanda ukuxhalabisa, kwaye bayavuma ukuba babukele ibonakaliso zobuqaqawuli zabanye ngokungabaza.</s>

en: But the country of vast forests and lakes is also known for its well-functioning public services, ubiquitous saunas, widespread trust in authority and low levels of crime and inequality.
xho: Kodwa ilizwe elinamahlathi namachibi amakhulu likwadume ngeenkonzo zalo zoluntu ezisebenza kakuhle, iisaunas ezifumaneka kuyo yonke indawo, ukuthembela ngokubanzi kwabasemagunyeni namanqanaba aphantsi olwaphulo-mthetho nokungalingani.
mt0: <pad> Kodwa ilizwe elikhulu leentlango neelwandle likwaziwa ngeenkonzo zayo ezisebenzayo, i-saunas ezikhoyo kwindawo zonke, ukholo olukhulu kulawulo kunye nolwaphulo-mthetho oluncinci kunye nokulingana.</s>
